1b1(rgyud): // rgya garu skad du/ bo d+hi ka gar+b+he driSh+Ta yak+Sha d+hA ra Ni/ 
1b2(rgyud): bod skad du/ byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum gyi gzungasi/ sas
1b3(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 
1b4(rgyud): oM na mo b+ha ga~M ba ti bi pu la ba dra na kAny+tsa nodak+Shi b+hA/ pra b+ha sa ke tu mur+d+ha/ 
1b5(rgyud): ye/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a ra ha ti/ sa~Mmya k+saM bud d+hA ya/ na mo b+ha ga pa// 
2a1(rgyud): te shA mu na ste/  thA ga tA ya/ ya te/ samya k+Sha bud da pa/ d+hAr+dz+dza/ rbad+hA rbad+d+ha/ na
2a2(rgyud): d+hIni/ b+hod+ha ni sur+m+ma t+ta She ga ta noHre/ d+hAd+b+hir/ d+hArAt+tA ra/ b+hU ha pr-I ti / ma d+hA bid+d+haMsl-i d+hAnAM/ r+m+ma tsu ru/ 
2a3(rgyud): ta lo/ br-i ti ti/ sarba ta thA ga ta idz+nyASh+TitI/ na b+hU s+yA l-I/ sham sha ma/ pra sha ma tha
2a4(rgyud): sarba bAd+h+wi gau d+hA ni/ hrawa h+ne l+la/ mu tsA ba~M d+ha man sarba ti/ bat+tA ga d+hA rmA rba tI/  shud d+d+he It+ma/ sgyu
2a5(rgyud): man+t+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta b+hA ba lo ki te/ dza ya dza ya swA hA/ hr-i da yaM/ oM hu lu hu lu
2b1(rgyud): oM badz+ra A yu She swA hA/ dge slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma 'am/ gzhan yang rigs kyi 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis
2b2(rgyud): gzungs 'di bris te/ mchod rten byas la mchod rten de'i nang du gzungs 'di bcug na/ des mchod rten gcig byas na 'bum byas par 'gyur ro// lha rdzas kyi me tog dang / 
2b3(rgyud): phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan la sogs pas kyang mchod par 'gyur te/ mchod rten 'ba' zhi
2b4(rgyud): mchod pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang / chos dkon mchog dang / dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad de dag gis mchod par 'gyur
2b5(rgyud): dga' bo ngas mdo 'di bshad pa ni bsod nams zhan pa dang / ma dad pa dang / lta ba log pa dang / the tsom za ba dang / mtshams med pa byed pa dang / tshe thung ba dang / sem
2b6(rgyud): can dmyal ba dang / byol song dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / mtshams med par 'gro ba'i sems can de lta bu dag gi phyir gzungs 'di bshad do// dga' bo phyi ma
2b7(rgyud): dus phyi ma'i tshe khyim na gnas pa dang / dge slong las phal cher gzungs 'di mi klog pa dang / mchod par mi byed pa rnams ji ltar khyim pa rnams sdug bsngal bar bshad pa de
2b8(rgyud): durab tu byung ba rnams kyang sdug bsngal bar 'gyur ro// de snyed bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod cing 'di las nyan pas mchod rten gcig byas ni chos kyis brgyan pa brgya
3a1(rgyud): sngags la/ oM d+harma hA tu ga swA t+ma/ tsai t+ya bor bur 'bi 'ab bzhug pa'i sngags la/ oM bar+pa d+hA tu gar+b+he swA d+ha/ po bas deg cing gdub pa'i sngags la/ oM bAn mung+ga ra a kaH
3a2(rgyud): hUM phaT swAt+ma/ tsaN+Da tshung bu na sa phy-ir dbyung ba'i sngags la/ oM d+ha mar te swAd+d+ha/ 'tshar lo dang / da gu na gsal ba'i sngags la/ oM b+h+ra ma Na ye stun+ta/ tsai kye'i dkyil 'khor la
3a3(rgyud): zhugs pa'i sngags la/ oM su pra tiSh+Thi ta badz+re swA hA/ cho ga de ltar byas ni tse t+ya gcig btab pas bye ba btab par 'gyur ro// thams cad du skye ba dran par 'gyur ro// dkyi
3a4(rgyud): 'khor byas pa'i lag pa 'jim pa can gyis gang na bar bskus na nad mdze'i rnam pa bco brgyad la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par zhi bar 'gyuraro// mchod rten gcig btab na
3a5(rgyud): ba btab par 'gyur ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gaR+Sha skad du/ Ar+ya sarba ta thA ga tA a d+hiSh+ThA na hr-i da ya gu hA d+hA tu ka rad na nA ma d+hA ra NI ma hA yA na sU tra/ bod skad du/ 2
3a6(rgyud): pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi snying po gsang ba ring bsrel gyi za ma tog ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo/ sangs rgyas dang / byung na
3a7(rgyud): sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das yul ma ga d+hA na dri ma med pa'i kun dga' ra ba na rin po che ste
3a8(rgyud): bdun gyi rdzing ngan byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang / nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po dang / lha dang klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / lha ma yin dang / nam ma
3b1(rgyud): bzhi stong rnams kyang mchod par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med par 'gyur ro// sdod pas brgyan pa bklags shab
3b2(rgyud): du byas par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor du yang zhugs par 'gyur ro// byang chub kyi snying po'i rgyan 'bum las btus pa 'bum
3b3(rgyud): gyi gzungs rdzogs s+ho/ @#// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal
3b4(rgyud): po la phyag 'tshal lo// de la mchod rten gcig btab na bye ba btab par 'gyur ba'i sngags dang / cho ga ni 'jim pa la sogs pa yo byad thams cad la sngags 'di la
3b5(rgyud): shu rtsa gcig bzlas par bya'o// oM na mo b+ha ga ba te bai ro tsa na pra b+ha rA dzA ya/ ta thA ga tA ya/ A ra ha te sa myag+ni bud d+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ oM sU k+Sha me sU k+Sha me sa me sa
3b6(rgyud): shUn te dAn te a sa mA ro pe A nA laM bai/ ta ra laM be/ ya shro ba ti/ ma hA te dzi na rI ku le nirbA Ne/ sarba bud d+ha oM d+hiSh+Tha na swA hA/ a d+hISh+Ta~M tI swA hA~M/ tsai t+ya 'deb
3b7(rgyud): 'jim pa'am/ sngags bris pa'i tshe lan bdun du gdab pa'i sngags la/ na maHsa man+ta bud d+ha nAM/ oM badz+ra A mr-i She swA hA/ 'bi'i ba'i sngags la
3b8(rgyud): dzad+da bA ya swA hA/ tse bye bor bu'i nang dang / sa tsha'i nang du phye ma gdab pa 'am/ 'bru mar byug pa'i sngags la/ oM ar dze bir dze swA d+haM/ phyag rgya'am/ sngags gzhug
4a1(rgyud): lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa bye ba mang po rnams dang / yul gyi mi 'bum phrag du ma rnams kyis yongs su
4a2(rgyud): bskor cing mdun du byas nas thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas 'khor gyi nang de na bram ze chen po shad sA la chen po lta bu mkhas pa/ mdzangs pa/ gsal ba yid
4a3(rgyud): gzhungs pa/ mthong na dga' ba/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam yongs su gzung ba/ dri med legs snang zhes bya ba zhig yod de/ de yang gcig tu dkon mchog gsum la
4a4(rgyud): da cing gus la phyag byas pa'i dge ba'i bsams pa dang ldan pa/ zhib mo btags pa/ sems can thams cad dge ba'i don la brtson pa/ nor che ba/ 
4a5(rgyud): rdzas mang ba/ yo byad phun sum tshogs pa yin no// de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang / bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song te phyin nas/ yang bcom ldan 'das
4a6(rgyud): lnga lan bdun bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la me tog dang / bdug pas mngon par mchod do// na bza' rin 'bum ri ba yang gsol/ bcom ldan 'das la mu ti
4a7(rgyud): do shal 'bum rib gsol nas zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar 'dug nas/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// 
4a8(rgyud): com ldan 'das sras tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa/ bdag gis sdum par gdugs chod la spyan 'dren ni de'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang / 
4b1(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis sman drangs par thugs su chud nas cang mi gsung bar gyur pas gnang ngo // de nas bram ze chen po dri med
4b2(rgyud): legs snang bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sna nas cung mi gsung bas gnang bar rig nas de rings pa rangs par rang gi khyim du song ste/ de nyid kyi mtshan ma 'das pa dang / zhal zas da
4b3(rgyud): zhal zas ro brgya pa mang po mang po bshams nas bkod pa chen pos bkra shis kyi gzhal med khang dang / gzhal mad khang chen po sna tshogs dang / me tog dang / bdug
4b4(rgyud): pa khyer te/ 'khor mang po dang / sil snyan dang / pheg rdob pa sa bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la dus la bab pa gsol to// de nas
4b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das la bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di ni gshegs pa'i dus lags te/ bcom ldan 'das gshegs
4b6(rgyud): pa'i dus kyi tshod la baban bdag la gnang bar mdzad par ci gnang / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze chen po dri med legs snang dbugs phyung nas nyid kyi 'khor la gzigs
4b7(rgyud): te bka' stsal pa/ 'khor ji ltar lhag pa thams cad deng don chen po mdzad par 'gyur gyis tshur sheg/ de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de las bzhengs nas/ bcom ldan 'das
4b8(rgyud): gdan de las bzhengs ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyi sku las 'od zer tha dad pa sna tshogs byung ste/ 'od zer gyi snang ba des phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad snang bar byas
5a1(rgyud): nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang dag par bskul te/ gzigs nas gshegs par shes so// de nas bram ze chen po dri med legs snang gis mchod
5a2(rgyud): pA dang / bkur sti chen pos mchod cing bcom ldan 'das kyi gshegs shul mdzes pa cher byas so// 'khor mang po dang / lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri ze dang / lham
5a3(rgyud): yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi'am ci dang / lho phye chen po dang / brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / sred med kyi bu dang
5a4(rgyud): rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang gshegs shul mdzes par byas so// de nas bcom ldan 'das dang ha cang mi ring ba'i lamo gyi bar
5a5(rgyud): zhig yod do// skyed mos tshal de'i nang na mchod rten rnying pa chen po zhig yod de/ zhig pa/ tsher mas gang brtsa dang / shing dang / kye mos kun tu gdab phyag dar gyi blong
5a6(rgyud): lta bu zhig yod do// de nas bcom ldan 'das de'i drung du gshegs pa dang / mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de yang kun nas 'bar zhing 'od zer 'bur bu kha dog
5a7(rgyud): rdzogs pa dag byung ngo // phyag dang deng gyo mo'i phung po de lngas kyang legs so zhes bya ba'i sku byung ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa legs so legs so// de ni
5a8(rgyud): gshegs pa'i bltas babang po'o// bram ze chen po de bzhin gshegs pa spyan drangs pa ni yang khyod legs so// deng khyod la don chen po mdzad par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan pa
5b1(rgyud): de 'azhin gshegs pas mchod rten rnying ba phyag dar gyi phung po lta bu de la ldan lag lngas phyag mdzad nas lan gsum bskor ba mdzad nas/ nyid kyi sku las na bza' bsil nas mtsho
5b2(rgyud): na rnying ba b+hag dang kyi bu pa lta bu de la gsas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis ma mabyung po chen po byung bas pa sulus pa ma nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyis mdzum pa bsgyun to// 
5b3(rgyud): rdum pa bstan pa des phyogs bcu 'di bzhin gshegs pa thams cad lag mchil ni bzhugs pa bzhin du mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyis kyang 'od zer
5b4(rgyud): / da/ na no pa'i du sa so// den nga mang po 'dus pa de dag chen por// sri la ba par gyur / 
5b5(rgyud): napa lagan rdo na lus ni 'ad / snyi ni 'gul/ ro rngon gsor shing rings pa 'ings par bcom ldan 'das gal ba der song te byen nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabaso gnyis la
5b6(rgyud): mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das pa shums pa'i snga ltas chen po gda' ba gang gis ni bcom ldan 'das kyis
5b7(rgyud): bachims gang bar bstan pa'i snga ltas gda' ba bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ ci'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 'di'i nang du zhu ba 'di skabs dbye bar tsi ka nang / de nas
5b8(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpan chen po la gan rdo rje la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// lag na rdo rje ring bsrel gyi phung po de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten de bzhin
6a1(rgyud): gshegs pa bye ba'i til gyi gang bu snyed thams cad kyi snying po'i gzungs kyi phyag rgya'i mchod rten gyi chos kyis rnam grangs yod de/ lag na rdo rje chos kyi
6a2(rgyud): grangs 'di gang na gnas pa der/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag be pa til gyi gang bu skyed gnas shing de bzhin gshegs pa khang yas khar yas zhes bya ba snyed kyi
6a3(rgyud): gdung ring bsrel rnams gnas so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi steng gnas so// de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bya ba til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i gtsug
6a4(rgyud): spyi bo yang de bzhin du gnas so// lag na rdo rje gang na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten du lung bstan to// lag na rdo rje chos kyi
6a5(rgyud): ma grangs 'di ni 'di ltar phan yon che zhing mthu che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni phan yon che ba yin no// lag na rdo rje chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni bkra shi
6a6(rgyud): tham sa nAd rdzogs par byed pa yin no// de nas bcom ldan 'das las 'khor mang po 'dus pa de dag gis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos nas chos rnams la chos kyi mig
6a7(rgyud): med cing dri ma dang bral la nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dang bral lo// kha cig gis ni kun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob po// kha cig gis ni dgra bcom pa nyid thob po// kha cig gi
6a8(rgyud): rang byang chub kyis 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'i// kha cig gis ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// kha cig gis ni byang chub sems
6b1(rgyud): / da ba'i sal gnas s+ho// kha tsug gis ni byang chub tu lung bstan pa thob po// cig gistan sna dang bye'o// c-ig gis rnaMs gnas pa'o// khatsug gis ni sa gsum pa'o/ 
6b2(rgyud): kiswA nI sa bzhi pa'o// kha cig gis nis lnga dro'o//  tsi/ na ni sa drug pa'o// kha cig gis nis bdun pa'o// kha cig gis rnaMs brgyad pa'o// khacig gis na sa dgu pa'o// 
6b3(rgyud): kha cig gis ni sa bcu pa la gnas par gyur to// kha cig gis ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs so// bram ze chen po de yang mngon par shes pa lnga thob cing dri mad
6b4(rgyud): bral ba dang / ser sna dang / phrag dog dang bral bar gyur to// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes cho 'phrul chen po 'di lta bu mthong nas ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba
6b5(rgyud): por gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs kyi mtshan thos pas kyang phan yon gyi yon tan gyis brgyan po 'di lta
6b6(rgyud): bong ni/ bcom ldan 'das gang gis skad du phu dud dang / bkur sti shin tu mang po bgyid par 'gyur ba lta ci smos te/ bcom ldan 'das de bsod nams kyi phung po ji
6b7(rgyud): yang mthong bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lagan rdo rje nyon cig rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo 'am dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge bsnyen nas
6b8(rgyud): dge bsnyen ma gang la las chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dre bar byed na/ lag na de ji des de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu
7a1(rgyud): nams kyi phung po dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa de rnams kyis rjes su bzung bar 'gyur ro// gang na
7a2(rgyud): klog byar byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyisku gsungs pa'i mdo sde rnams bcang bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig zlos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu 'dzin pa de
7a3(rgyud): dag phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
7a4(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis bzung bar 'gyur zhing / nyin gcig bzhin gzigs par 'gyur ro// gang dag chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la mchod pa byed
7a5(rgyud): khong du chud par byed pa dang / me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dri dang / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / rgyan gyis mchod pa byed pa'i rigs kyi bu
7a6(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma des phyogs bcu dang / phyogs re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'bum phrag bye ba khrag khrig til gyi gang bu snyed dgu
7a7(rgyud): ban+d+ha rtsa dgu lu lU rdzas kyi me tog dang / bdug pa dang / dI dong / me tog phreng rgyud dang / byug pa dang / na bza' dang / lhub lbub dang / rgyun gyis mchod par 'gyur ro/ 
7a8(rgyud): sa re re'i de bzhin gshegs pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa'i sprin rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i ri rab tshin po tsam gyis phung po'i yon tan byung
7b1(rgyud): 'byung bar 'gyur ro// de nas lha dang / klu dang / gnod sbyin dang / dri za dang / l+h+wa ma rin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / myi'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / me dang / mi ma
7b2(rgyud): pade rnams dang / sems can gyi tshogs chen po de rnams kyang ya mtshan du gyur nas gcig la gcig 'di skad du mchod rten rnying pa phyag dar dang / gyo mo'i phung po de bzhin
7b3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i byin gyi brlabs kyis byin gyi brlab nas 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul chen po ston pas mthu che ba yin no zhes zer ro// dra nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyim
7b4(rgyud): sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di sus phyag dar gyi phung por bgyis pa las rin po che'i mchod rten du gdab par bgyis/ 
7b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje 'di phyag dar gyi phung po ma yin gyi 'di ni rin po che sna bdun las byas pa rin po che'i mchod rten chen po yin no// ldag na rdo rje lod
7b6(rgyud): kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras bu rnam par sman pa ston pas nub par 'gyur / sangs rgyas rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod
7b7(rgyud): narnams ni 'jig pa'am/ 'gyes par mi 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje'i snying po'i sku dI stAr 'gyes bur 'gyur 'on kyang sems can rnams kyi las kyi 'bras
7b8(rgyud): rnam par smin par snang ba las kyang nub par gyur to// lag na rdo rje gzhan yang phyi ma'i dus phyi ma'i tshe/ sdig pa'i kun du spyod pa dang / sdig pacan dang / dmyal ba la
8a1(rgyud): gzhol ba shin tu tshabs cher 'byung bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas ma yin/ chos ma yin/ dge 'dun tshol ba ma yin zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba dag kyang bskyed/ 
8a2(rgyud): par mi byed de rgyu de dang / rkyen des dam pa'i chos nub bo// lag na rdo rje de'i phyir nga'i mig gnyis mchi mas gang la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mchi ma byung
8a3(rgyud): dam pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu ni nub par 'gyur gyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten ni ma gtogs te/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams
8a4(rgyud): kyis byin gyis rlobs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rjes 'dri skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang zhig chos kyi
8a5(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog na dge ba'i rtsa ba ci zhig skye bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lag na rdo rje gang zhig chos kyi rnam
8a6(rgyud): 'di bris te mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag pa de de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i snying po ring bsrel gyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
8a7(rgyud): kardzas kyi snying po gsang bus byin gyi brlabs pa'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa til gyi gang bu snyed dgu bcu rtsa dgu'i mchod rten du 'gyur ro// 
8a8(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyi ga ga tor dang / spyan gyi mchod rten du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brlan nam/ mchod rten thams cad
8b1(rgyud): du 'jog par byed na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// 'khor le'i phreng ba dang / dril bu g.yer ka'i dra bar ste
8b2(rgyud): ba dang bcas pa dang / bak+Sha shis dang / tshwar kab kyi gzugs dang / dril bur bcas pa rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs
8b3(rgyud): gyis brlabs dang / bden pa dang / dmi tshig gis byang chub kyi snying po la thug gi bar du byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur
8b4(rgyud): sems can gang dag mchod rten la phu dud dang / sti stang byed pa de dag nges par phyir mi ldog par 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par
8b5(rgyud): rdzogs pa byung rgya las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro// gnas gdun mchod rten nam gzugs brgyan 'di sa bu gnas pa'i sa thogs de yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
8b6(rgyud): kyis byin gyis rnas par 'gyur ro// phyogs //  ldan pas mi myigs par 'gyur/  dang sabyangs kya ma rmugs pa byung/ kran srog chags mi kun pa'i
8b7(rgyud): sa pas bya// na can kyi mtshugs par 'gyur/ byami sbed pa dang / ni co dang / re shegs dang / bya ba dang /  ma / gasmang dang / spre lung
9a1(rgyud): ba dang / spang ma mchu gsum pa dang / mchu rings dang / ha bla'i 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ sbrul gdug pas mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// phyogs der
9a2(rgyud): yams kyi nad dang / nad 'go ba dang / 'khrug pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / yi dgas dang / 'dre dang / rjed byed kyi 'jigs pa
9a3(rgyud): yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur/ gdon thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rims thams cad kyis kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ nad thams cad dang / 'bras dang / bol mig
9a4(rgyud): dang / lhog pa dang / mtshan par rdol dang / rkang shu dang / g.yan pa dang / mdzes kyang mi tshugs par 'gyur zhing mchod rten de mthong ba tsam gyis thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur
9a5(rgyud): phyogs deng ba lang gi nad dang / phyugs nad dang / dud 'gro'i skye gnas rnam pa mang po gzhan dag gi nad dang / skyes pa dang / bud med dang / khye'u dang / bu mo'i nad kyis
9a6(rgyud): kyang nam yang tshugs par mi 'gyur ro// dus ma yin par 'chi bas kyang dus ma yin pa'i 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ dug gis ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin zhing me dang / rgyus
9a7(rgyud): kyang rnam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'jigs pas ma yin/ lo nyes kyi 'jigs pas kyang nam yang mi tshugs par 'gyur/ rgyal po chen po'i
9a8(rgyud): dmag gis 'jigs pa yang mi 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po bzhi yang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par srung bar 'gyur ro// sa phyogs der srung bar byed/ yongs su spyong
9b1(rgyud): bar byed do// gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag kyang rtag tu rgyun ma chad par srung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sbed par byed par 'gyur ro// rba skar nyi shu
9b2(rgyud): brgyad dang / zla ba dang / nyi ma dang / mjug rings chen po yang nyin mtshan 'thun par byed par 'gyur ro// klu'i rgyal po thams cad kyang rtag tu rgyun mi chad par mdangs mi 'phrog
9b3(rgyud): de legs pa kho nar char gyi rgyun 'bebs par 'gyur ro// lha thams cad kyang mchod rten chen pod la phyag 'tshal ba dang / bkur sti bya ba dang / mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ga
9b4(rgyud): sumacu rtsa gnyis nas dus gsum du 'ong ngo // yul na gnas pa thams cad kyang mchod rten dang / gzugs brnyan de'i drung du dus gsum du 'ong ngo // bstod par byed/ 
9b5(rgyud): dra par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin kyang lha'i bu mo dang / lha'i tshogs rnams dang lhan cig rtag tu rgyun mo 'chad par mchod rten nam/ gzugs brnyas
9b6(rgyud): du nyin mtshan dus gsum du 'ong ste/ bgra' tshul ba dang / mchod pal ring ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang rtag par dgongs pa dang / byin
9b7(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di yang bres te/ de'i nang du bzhag na bzhag ma thag tsam gyis rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du byin gyis brlab par 'gyur ro// 'phang dang / them skas pa
10a1(rgyud): khA ran dang / 'khor lo'i phreng ba dang / bkra shis dang / gdugs dang / dril bu 'byung ba dang / ba dan dang / dril bu g.yer kwa'i dra ba thams cad
10a2(rgyud): rin po che sna bdun gyi rang bzhin du 'gyur ro// phyogs bzhi kun na yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs brnyan rgyas par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
10a3(rgyud): dkyis byin gyis rlabs kyis byin gyis parlabs pa mamacho narten rgya dang / sku gdung gi snying po mchod nyid da na gnas sa su re// hUMg drug sa dang / chod rten de gas
10a4(rgyud): kyi gnas kyi lhas kyang yongs su bskyang ba dang / mchod pas yongs su gzungs par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi snga dpon chen po la rgan de rjes
10a5(rgyud): dad ces gsol to// bcol ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yon tan gyi khyad par 'di lta bur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshe
10a6(rgyud): thams cad kyi byin gyis rlabs kyi snying po gsang ba rnying bsrel gyi za ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs yin te/ lag na rdo rje des na mthu 'di ni yon tan gyi khyad par 'dis
10a7(rgyud): byin gyis parlabs kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin no// rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsil po/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che'i ba ma tog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs kyi
10a8(rgyud): ngoso'i ga pa cig nang / bcom ldan 'das kyis bka'i sel pa/ lagan rdo rje nan cig de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / mo byon pa dang / da ltar byung
10b1(rgyud): dang/ de bzhin du stsal pa'i sku ste/ dus gsus pa thams cad kyi ring bsrel gyi bam tog gi phyal gyi ga ma minam rmong sa yin no// na ma s+t+rai la d+ho kAn+d+he/ sab ti thA ga tAnA/ 
10b2(rgyud): tsa lan+tu sarba A ba ra d+hA naM/ sarba pA paM ki ga te/ hu ru hu ru/ sarba sho ka bi ga te/ sarba ta thA ga ta hr-i da ya badz+re naM/ sam+b+ha bau sam+b+ha ba/ sarba ta thA ga d+hA gu bye/ d+hur NIH
10b3(rgyud): // sanaH/  k+Shakan+d+he swAH/ ma na / \u0f7f/  dz+nyA ta rjod pa na su rbe swAH/ ma to dz+nyA su
10b4(rgyud): hUMsmAt+ma/ oM sad+yata thAg tA uSh+mit+tad+d+ha r+b+bANaM sarbat+tAr+dz+dza ka ta rbAm d+hA //  A/ tsa ruHru/ tsu ru hu ru/ tAM sAH
10b5(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyis ring bsrel gyi ma/ phyog rgya'i gzungs bshad ma rig tu phyogs bcu dang / 
11a1(rgyud): de bcud gshegs pa 'bum phrag ba ba khrag khrag tal gyi glang bu srad dgu bcu rtsa dgu gshegs nas/ bcom ldan 'dus shAkya thub pa la shAkya thub pa sarba/ 
11a2(rgyud): can thams cad kyi don du 'dzam bu'i gling du chos kyi rnam grangs 'di lta bu'i chos kyi gter bzhag pa dang / ring bsrel gyi snying po'i mchod
11a3(rgyud): legs so zhes bye ba byin no// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmatshig dang / byin gyis 'drubs pa yin no// gang na ring bsrel gyi phyag rgya'i gzungs 'di
11a4(rgyud): son par byed dam/ mchod rten gyi nang du 'jog gam/ gzugs rnyan gyi nang du 'jog par byed pa deng / de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang gcig tu rtog tu rgyun mi chad par
11a5(rgyud): sa su 'brid ning bzhugs par 'gyur ro// thams cad du de bzhin ga shegs pa'i byon gyis brlabs kyis byin gyis bdebs par 'gyur ro// de nas ga'angs
11a6(rgyud): ba shad pa dang / des yin mchod rten rnying pa dag dang kyi phung po lta bu darin pa che sa bdun ste rang bzhin gyi mchod rted du mngon par 'phags shing 'bang ba dang / 
11a7(rgyud): sa padang/  'i drang ba dang /  shes dang sa par / sem ldan 'das dukyis nas de ska rjes paka smras nas
11a8(rgyud): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la san rdo rje dang / lha dang / klu dang / gdod sbyid dang / dri ba dang / nam mkha' lding dang / me 'am ci dang / lho'i byi chen po da
11b1(rgyud): lha dang / mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la yi rangs te mngon par bskyod do// 'phags pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis
11b2(rgyud): snying po gsang ba'i ring bsrel gyi za la tod ces bya ba'i gzungs theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs s+ho// pa Na DI ta bid+yA ka ra pra b+ha ba dang / lo ts+tsha btsangs de ben+d+ha rak+Shi tas bskur cing
11b3(rgyud): gtan la phab pa yang zhus te/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya be shA lI pra be sha ma hA yA ne sUrba/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa yangs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mdo chen po
11b4(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dam bu'i khrod na gzings pa'i 'du
11b5(rgyud): na bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan po kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' 'i yangs bu'i grong khyer gal ba der dong ngo // btsun pa de ltar bkyi'o
11b6(rgyud): gsol nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis ltar mnyan to// de nas bcom ldan 'das yul bri dzer yul rgyu zhing gshegs te/ yangs pa'i grong khyer du
11b7(rgyud): nas yangs pa'i grong khyer gyi e mra bsrung ba'i tshal na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/ kun dga' bo yangs pa'i grong
11b8(rgyud): song la phyin nas sgo'i them pa la rkang pa zhog te/ gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras shig/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ be sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs
12a1(rgyud): rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs pa/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bsams pa/ dgra
12a2(rgyud): bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bden pa'i tshig dang ldan pa thams cad kyis
12a3(rgyud): bsams pa/ chos kyis bsams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pa so sos bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gis bsams pa/ dbang pos bsams pa/ lhas pas
12a4(rgyud): ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 'byung po thams cad kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bI sa ra ta/ bi sA ra ta/ 
12a5(rgyud): sar ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// muny+dza ta/ muny+dza ta/ muny+tsa ta/ muny+dza ta/ ma 'dug shig/ yams kyi nang
12a6(rgyud): rnams ni bar gyur cig/ nitsits+tsha ta/ ninats+tsha te/ ni rmA ts+tshatA/ ninats+tsha ta/ sangs rgyas lha chen po lce'i lha/ lce'i bla ma go shegs shig/ dbang po dang bcas pa'i lha rnams
12a7(rgyud): dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang 'ong / lha 'bum phrag du ma dag dang / 
12a8(rgyud): ma yin gyis dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon por dad pa'i 'byung po 'bum phrag du ma dag kyang sems can thams
12b1(rgyud): dam/  ma maldan sa sa sa/ s+yA //  kyi /  ma gas/ nga
12b2(rgyud): sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / nyes pa mi 'dod la srung bar 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khor cig/ lus la yang 'jug
12b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can mis bka' stsal pa/ su mu su mu/ thA sa? sa su/ sra mu/ su mr-i ru/ su mu ru/ swa pu ru/ su mu r+ya/ su mu ru/ su pu ra/ 
12b4(rgyud): su mu ru/ su mra ru/ su ru/ sAr+Ya/ su ru/ su ru/ mu ru/ mU r+Ya/ mu ru/ su r+ra/ mi bi mI r-I/ miri/ mA r+YaM/ mor/ sr-i raM/ mi r+ra/ sur+Ya/ m-i / mu ru/ mi dI/ mu ru/ mI mI sa?
12b5(rgyud): pri ri/ mu ru/ mi rI/ mu ru/ mI / mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mr-i ri/ mu r+Ya/ mi rau/ mA ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu ru/ mi ri/ mu d+ha ti/ 
12b6(rgyud): kAH/ kaH/ kaH/ kan+sa// kraH/ kaH/ kr-iro tI tre// / tsho ro ring / ti te prasa?/ rab / da bu bu/ 
12b7(rgyud): bu/ nAb+hU b+h+ya ba/ rebre/ dbuM/ nA d+hU ba/ ts+tshata/ ri buM/ ripa?/ nam ta/ ba wA ga/ ri pA re thA/ pa lA ya ta/ sangs rgyasag nyid la 'gas brtse bca
13a1(rgyud): sems can thams cad nga phan par lhag par dgangs pa dang ldan pa/ byams pa la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas go btang
13a2(rgyud): la gnas pa gshegs kyis k+Shi phran ni rgats+tsha tA swA hA/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad dang / 'byung po thams cad la bka' stsal pa'i
13a3(rgyud): gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni grub pa'o// tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag ni grub pa'o// gang la ser sna rnam chags pa// rnam bcom dri ma med mdzad cing // thugs zhi gnod pa
13a4(rgyud): mi mnga' dres// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang zhig 'gro ba rnams// thar pi'i lam du 'dzud mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa des/ 
13a5(rgyud): da la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// ston pa rgyug pa rnams kyi rten// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// gang gis bde ba mnga' mdzad des// khyed la bde legs
13a6(rgyud): dra bar 'gyur// skyob pa gang zhig byams pi yi// thugs kyi 'gro ba 'di dag kun// bu gcig bzhin du rtag bskyangs te// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 
13a7(rgyud): zhig 'khor bar 'khor ba yi// sems can kun gyi rten gyur cing // gling dang dpung gnyen gyur pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// gang zhig chos kun
13a8(rgyud): mngon sum gyur// gtsang zhing bslub mi mnga' la// gsung gtsang gtsang mar mdzad pa des// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// dpa' bo chen po gang skyes pas// 
13b1(rgyud): na sum rdzogs don 'byor gyur cing // don grub tshogs kyang grub pa des// khyed la bde lags mdzad par 'gyur// glang zhig skyes pas sa rnams no// nags tshal bcas pa shA ga
13b2(rgyud): shing // sems can thams cad rab dga' das// khyed la 'di legs mdzad par 'gyur// byang chub snying por gang zhig gis// sa dag nam drug g.yos gyur cing // bdud yid mi
13b3(rgyud): bder gyur pa des// khyod la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ban// 'phags pa'i bden pa nam gsung ba// thub pa'i snyan pa gang byung des// khyod la
13b4(rgyud): sa bye pa gyur// yi thog gang gis su sa // khams ca sa kyis pa // ga ldan ma /  de gas nga pa / 
13b5(rgyud): sangs rgyas byed la pa legs mdzang// N+Da byin ska banas de legs dang // babyung ba kun gyi bde legs ni// khyod la rtag tu sbyin gyur cig/ sangs rgyas bsod dmas sang+gA
13b6(rgyud): dngad+ya // lha rnams kyis ni thasams pa yi bya// snod rnams don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring gru gyur cig/ dang gnyis byed cikri pa de legs shog/ rkang du ni kye cag pade legs
13b7(rgyud): legs so// khyod ga/ sdig param gyur che// sangs rgyas spyarnams stong dag shes// yongs su bskor te gshegs ma da kyis// snang sems ldan pa rnams kyi / 
14a1(rgyud): nyid ca rnams mad// sas rgyas 'angs sa rgyas rnams dang // dgras ma slob pa gnas// 'ag nam pan byed nas// 
14a2(rgyud): // se smran da na// 'byung yo na sa/  g+sag /  dun pas med pa na
14a3(rgyud): na gyis babang rnams na yod gyur cig/ gang yang sdig pa ma gyur cig/ 'byung po gang dag 'di ni lha gyur cing // sedang bar sdang dag la gnas pa rnams// skye ba sa
14a4(rgyud): la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos btsun pa de ltar bgyi'o zhes gsol te/ bco
14a5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyi sa ltar ma nyan nas yangs pa'i thong kyid du so ste/ sgo'i them pa la rkang pa bzhag nas gsang sngags gan 'di dag dang / tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag kyang smraso// 
14a6(rgyud): sa // bes rAH/ bi saraH/ bi sa te/ ba~Ms te/ ngas rgyas lag rten lazugs brtse bcan kyil bka'asum to// sangs rgyas thams cad kyis dgongs
14a7(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyis bsams pa/ dgra bcom pa thams cad kyis bsams pa/ slob ba thams sa dkris bsams pa/ nyan thos thams cad dkyis bsnams pa/ 
14a8(rgyud): tshig dang rdzun pa thams cad gyes bsams pa/ chos thams cad kyis pasams pa/ tshangs pas bsams pa/ tshangs pas sa sa bsams pa/ 'dod pa'i dbang byug gis
14b1(rgyud): bsams pa/ lhas bsams pa/ lha ma yin gyi dbang pos bsams pa/ lha ma yin thams cad kyis bsams pa/ lha ma yin mngag gzhug pas bsams pa/ 
14b2(rgyud): kyis bsams pa/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ bI sa ra ta/ bi sa ra ta/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can gyis bka' stsal to// muny+tsa ta/ muny+dza ta/ muny+dza ta/ muH
14b3(rgyud): sangs rgyas lha chen lha'i yang lha/ lha'i bla ma gshegs shig/ dbang po dang
14b4(rgyud): bcas pa'i lha rnams dang / tshangs pa dang bcas pa rnams dang / dbang bdag dang bcas pa rnams dang / skye dgu'i bdag po dang bcas pa rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi po dag kyang
14b5(rgyud): 'ong / lha stong phrag du ma dag dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams dang / lha ma yin stong phrag du ma dag kyang 'ong / bcom ldan 'das la mngon par dad pa'i 'byung po brgya stong mang po dag kyang
14b6(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir 'ong ste/ de dag/ khyod la gnod pa chen po byed par 'gyur gyis/ nI gats+tsha ta/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ nairga ts+tsha ta/ nirba n+na ta/ myur du byed cig/ khyed cag las gang dag
14b7(rgyud): sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa de dag ni phung bar gyur cig/ gang dag byams pa'i sems dang ldan zhing nyes par mi 'dod la srung ba 'jug par 'dod pa de dag ni 'khod cig/ lus la yang 'jug
14b8(rgyud): par gyis shig/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la khrugs rtse ba can gyis bka' stsal pa/ su mu/ su mu/ su muHsu mu/ su mu/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ su mu ru/ 
15a1(rgyud): d+hASh+Tas / m+b+ha sa nas rnam su ma lda ma/ ma su mU m+bu gyu ru / rtswa m+bu/ 
15a2(rgyud): du mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mr-i rI/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi re/ mu ru mi ra/ mu ru mi ri/ mu ru mi ri/ su nu ri ti/ ri ri mi re ri/ r-im mi tshor ti/ mi ri mi ri/ mi ri mi re/ maM ri mi re/ 
15a3(rgyud): kaM ka rA ka ra ka ta/ ka ra ka ra ka ra/ kA tsa/ kuM kA rA/ kaM ka R+Sha/ kai kA rA/ kr-i ka rA/ kaM kA rA/ kaM ka rA/ kr-i ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ kaM ka rA/ 
15a4(rgyud): nirgats+tsha ta/ ri pu ri pu/ ni rgats+tsha ta/ pa la yA tra/ ri pu ri pu/ pa la yA tra/ sangs rgyas 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba can sems can thams cad la phan par lhag par dgongs pa dang ldan pa byams
15a5(rgyud): la gnas pa/ thugs rje dang ldan pa/ dga' ba la gnas pa/ btang snyoms la gnas pa/ gshegs kyis kyi bran ni nats+tsha t+ta swAH/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi mchog dang / chos nyid kyis lha thams cad
15a6(rgyud): 'byung sa seM la bka bum pa'i gsang thugs gan de ga ni grub pa// tshigs su paca bya dag ni grub pa'o// gang sa gsed stan ma chags pa// rnam pacom drim med mdzad cig
15a7(rgyud): thugs niganod pa mi mnga' das// khyed la bde legs mdzad par 'gyur// 'dren pa gang shig 'gro ba rnams// thar pa'i lam du mdzad mdzad cing // chos rnams thams cad ston pa des// khyed la
15b1(rgyud): sa sa da na tshun sus ra/  // gsug namam ma // 
15b2(rgyud): skye hA/ A sa nga ba /  sa/ yad la pa mas byung//  khyis pas
15b3(rgyud): 'a ga// thams na thams cad nga ga das/ 'dul byed myigs myed da par 'gyur//  sa pa ga dag shes// yang sa
15b4(rgyud): 'dud med mi bder kyang bdes/ byed pa 'a de legs mdud par gyur// chos kyi 'khor mo basbyor ban// 'phags pa'i bdon pa nas gsung ba/ grub pa'i snyan pa gang /  des/ 
15b5(rgyud): gas nga//  mdun gyi de gas/  / sas rgyam pa sod da sa nga
16a1(rgyud): bsams pa yi// khyed kyi don 'dod gang yin pa// don de de ring grub gyur cig/ rkang gnyis khyed cag bde legs shog/ rkang pa ni yid cag bde legs 'gyur// byed cag la
16a2(rgyud): 'gro ba de legs shog/ phyir ldog dag kyang bde kur cig/ nyi mo bde legs mtshan bde legs/ gnyi ma'i gung ladang bde le bla shing // khyed cag kun du bde legs shog/ yid pag sdig par ma gyur
16a3(rgyud): cig/ sangs rgyas lha rnams stong dag gis// yongs su bskor te gshegs mdzad kyis// sdang sems ldan pa rnams byer cig/ snying rje'i bdag nyid can rnams 'khod// sangs rgyas rang sangs rgyas
16a4(rgyud): rnams dang // dgra bcom slob pa'i bden tshig gis// 'jig rten mi phan byed pa rnams// grong khyer 'di ni slong gyur cig/ sems can kun dang sreg chags kun// 'byung po kun dang khyed cag sun/ 
16a5(rgyud): 'de ba 'ba' shig ldan gyur cig/ thams cad nad rnams med par shog/ kun gyis bzang rnams mthong gyur cig/ gang yang sdig par ma gyur cig/ 'byung ba gang dag 'dir ni lhag gyur cing // sA/ 
16a6(rgyud): dang bang snang dka la gnas pa rnams// skye dbu rnams la rtag tu byams byed shog/ nyin dang mtshan du chos kyang spyod gyur cig/ 'phags pa langs pa'i grong khyer du 'jug pa'i mang/ rdzogs ste/ 
16a7(rgyud): nyidang chen gyi lo ts+tshab ban+de laM shes sdes bskur ning bus te gtan labab pa// gus dag de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA thul pa la
16b1(rgyud): 'phags pa shAkya thub pa'i snying po'i gzungs/ rdzogs s+ho// dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'brang com pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'phags
16b2(rgyud): ba rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo// tatA thA/ ka la ka la/ ki li ki li/ bi ri bi ri/ 
16b3(rgyud): rudu ru/ bai ro tsan riSh+Ti sany+tso di te A gats+tsha/ Ad+ya AkA sha gar+b+ha ma hA kA ru NI ka pU ra ya ha shAn/ d+hA ra ya bud+d+ha bi shu ya na/ tsa ra tsa ra/ tsi ri tsi ri swA hA/ bton pas 'grub ste/ mtshonaH
16b4(rgyud): dang me dang / chu dang / drug dang / dug sbyar ma dang / byed sim rnams kyis mi tshugs so// rgyal po dang / chom rkun la sogs pa thams cad kyis glegs mi rnyed do// gang du dris te bzhag pa
16b5(rgyud): dang khams kyi nad dang / gnod pa dang / rig 'i'i nad thams cad mo'i byung bar 'gyur ro// dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro// 'phags pa rnam par snang mdzad
16b6(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyal ba'i bla mas pa
16b7(rgyud): ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i bla ma'i gzungs sngags kyi gzhi 'di gang gis bzung bas chos thams cad bzung ba dang bcang bar 'gyur ro// mi khom pa
16b8(rgyud): las 'das par 'gyur ro// tshar bas thams pad du yang gan kun del bzung ba dang / 'dub pa dang / smra bar byed pa de la 'ang thams cad kyis 'jigs pa med do// yadu byed/ pa te/ ba
17a1(rgyud): mad+har/ ba d+ha ni/ bo d+ha ni/ saM bo d+ha ni/ ma hA sa ma bo d+ha ni/ ad+hi sar+b+bo d+ha ni/ ta la hA ra ta la/ hi li hi li hi li/ hu lu du lu hu lu/ sarba budaH/ d+harmarmA pa ba d+ha ni/ s+pha sru rba
17a2(rgyud): spun ni/ sarba dA pa ni/ bad+d+hA/ d+hI/ nen swAH// 'phags pa rgyal ba'i tha gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar rma nga/ swAd+ha mA rba
17a3(rgyud): zungs/ bcom ldan 'das mi 'khrugs pa la brag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ e ka kan ni/ 
17a4(rgyud): na/ tron ni rngo Ta ni/ trA sa na~M trA sa ni/ pra ti ha na pra ti ha naM/ sarba kar+sa pa raM pa rA Ni me swA hA/ gzungs sngags 'di'i tshi ga ni 'di yin te/ rtag tu bzlas brjod byed na las gcig
17a5(rgyud): byas nas gcig tu rgyud pa thams cad rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na mtshams med pa lnga yang byang bar 'gyur ro// lan gcig bzlas brjod byas
17a6(rgyud): lhas ngan pa dang / rmi lam ngan pa dang / bkra me shis pa rnams med par 'gyur ro// lus la 'chang ngam/ glegs pa mal bris nas mgul du thogs te 'chang na de la dus pa yin pa
17a7(rgyud): 'arnams gtar du 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// / gang zhig snying rjes non te ri dgas dang / bya dang / me dang le ma yin pa rnams kyang rung ste/ 'chi ba'irakhung du brjod na de ngan song/ 
17a8(rgyud): 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// yang na she ste dus las 'das na she 'phos pa'i mang nas smos te de'i phyir byams pa dang / snying rjes lan brgya 'am/ stong ngam 'bum brjod na sem
17b1(rgyud): can dmyal bar skyes su zin kyang de'i modo la thar bar 'gyur ro// sa 'am/ til lam/ yungs kar ram/ chu gang yang rung ba la bzlas brjod byas te shi ba'i lus la gtor ngam/ khrus byas nas de
17b2(rgyud): 'og tu bsreg pa'am/ yang na mchod rten gyi nang du bcug ste bzhag la/ rig sngags kyang bris te mgo bo la btags na de ngan song du skyes pa yang zhag bdun gyis gdon mi za bar thar te bde 'gro mtho
17b3(rgyud): ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur ba 'am/ yang na rang gi smon lam gyi dbang gis skye bar 'gyur ro// gang zhig zla ba nya ba'i tshe khrus byas la gtsang mar byas te dus gsum du gos brje zhing kha zas mi za
17b4(rgyud): ba 'am yang na zas dkar bag bza' zhing / sku gdung dang ldan pa'i mchod rten skor bzhin du gang gi ming dang ldan pas lan 'bum bzlas brjod byas na deng na song nas par te gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i ris su skye
17b5(rgyud): nas grub pa po'i thad du 'ongs te mchod pa byed cing lus kyang ston la/ legs so zhes bya ba yang byin nas lan gsum bskor ba byas te mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de'i ming bris la gzungs sngags bzlas brjod bya
17b6(rgyud): mchod rten 'bum byas gdags dang / rgyal mtshan dang / bdan la sogs pas legs par mchod nas rgya mtsho chen po dang / yaben chu klung du btang na des sems can dmyal pa la sogs pa nas thar
17b7(rgyud): gyur ro// yangan de lar mchod pa bras la ga tu lam myi ga zhes dor mchod rten chen po brgyad byas te/ gdugs dang / rgyalam tshan dang / bdun gi sogs pas legs par mchod la 'phags pa'i dge 'dun la
17b8(rgyud): chos ston gsol nas yod yang bul te legs par mchod nas che ge ma zhig gi dge ba'i rtsa bar gar cig/ 'di kho nas pa de 'gro ma ze ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar gyur cig ces kyang shes par byas na/ ro yin pa
18a1(rgyud): du skyes nas lus kyang ston cing legs so nas bya ba yang byin nas mi spang bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'am/ dam pa'i chos spong ba'am/ 'phags pa la skur ba btab
18a2(rgyud): pa yang rung te 'tsho kar rtsig pa la gzungs sngags 'di bris pa mthong na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad zad par 'gyur na/ 'don pa dang bzlas brjod byas pa lnga ci smos te/ de bzhin gshegs pa// 
18a3(rgyud): de nyid byon nas 'di skad du rigs kyi bu tshur nga'i gan du shog ces kyang gsung bar 'gyur ro// 'phags pa las kyi sgrub pa thams cad rnam par sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// sa
18a4(rgyud): chos la phyag 'tshal lo// dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo// 'phags pa sman ras gzigs dbang po byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la bya
18a5(rgyud): 'tshal lo// de rnams la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di 'dzin gyis/ rig pa 'di bdag la grub par gyur cig/ tad+ya thA/ ha na ha na s+thA ni/ na bstani/ dz+wal dz+wa la me/ tsa la tsal ne/ purba yo
18a6(rgyud): sar+tha skA baH/ mAh+ma hAd+ha yA swAH/ nga gi rigs pa 'di gas pa de tsha rabs tham stod du skye bdun par mgyur ro// 'di nas shi bos nas kyang ba de ldan gyi 'jig rte du skye ba
18a7(rgyud): di ldan gyi snying pa rdzo s+ho// / rgya gar smad du/ An+ta prad+hA d+hi sa nas b+hU NI/ bod ma dang/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying gi zhes bya ba'i gzu ma~M/ 
18a8(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dis de bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgya mtsho'i 'gram gyi skyed mos tshal na/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul gyi
18b1(rgyud): brdzun pa kun nas sangag 'grol bzhugs te/ lhan ma'ir chos kun nas padun gyis bltas te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dbang drug chen po dka' thub bzang ma/ 
18b2(rgyud): sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams la bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la rung shig dang bshad do// de bzhin gshegs pa bye ma'i dus dang
18b3(rgyud): ba bsdu ba dang / rjes su gzungs pa dang / kun du rjes su gzung ba dang / khyad par du 'gro bar bya ba dang / de na thams cad dang / sa khams cad dang ldan pa ldangs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / 6
18b4(rgyud): chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa rnams rnam pa thams cad du khyad par thob par bya ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs ston to// 'chang
18b5(rgyud): dade khyed kyi zung yang lder dang nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas phyi ma'i dus na theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor rnam pa pa'i rnams la sdod cig/ shod cig phal mar med
18b6(rgyud): riris ma ldan par bya/ bsgrag par bya'o// de cam du drangs par gyur ba rnams dang / sgrib pa bldan pa rnams pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung bgang me ces par bstan pa bya/ 
18b7(rgyud): ru'o// gsal pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du bgyis/ de bzhin gshegs pas ji srid bka' stsal bde bzhin du 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' bzhin 'di nan tan gyis yid
18b8(rgyud): bu rdzogs par bkye'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag sangs rgyas kyi slong ba ma bya ba'i chom chen ma grangs gang zhen/ tad+ya ba/ a ma le/ neme le/ sas A kAr ma dral/ 
19a1(rgyud): ri prAp+te/ a sa man+ta sarbakra na A kA re d+ha NA/ a sa sha an+t+ra br-i te/ sa man+ta da sha di ka/ pa ri p+pad+ha nA ne/ sarba a sa ga dang+ka na prA p+te/ sarba d+ham ma bi sha ta pa ri pUH/ 
19a2(rgyud): a kA ra/ a se ga samanA te/ sa man+ta a pra ti ha ta dza ta tA da sha su/ dir+dz+dza ba raM prAp+tA awe/ shUn+ta/ pra shAn+ta/ yu~M pa shan+ta/ sa ma shan+ta/ bI m+'uk+Sha A nu prA b+he/ su pra ti bud+d+ha d+harmadz+nyAH/ 
19a3(rgyud): t+yan+ta su ni sri te/ sarba Ak+Shar ni sa sa rA \u0f7f/ an pa sho Sha pU rad+ha te/ bi pra mu k+She/ a saM yog bi pra yo ga sI te d+harma te/ ga gnas ma/ pra kr-itI pa ri shud+d+ha/ rIH le/ a sa~M man+ta/ b+h+yaH
19a4(rgyud): a nug ta/ su prAp+te pU dAn+ta/ a pa ran+te/ ma d+h+ya d+had+g+ha sa man+ta a ru prA pye/ a nad shi Sha/ pa ri drA rba ha na/ b+ha ba na/ sak+Sha kri ya ba ra ma ran te/ ya thA bA da ta thA kA ri/ sarba Ak+Sha ras
19a5(rgyud): sarba A kA ra ma hA/ mai tri ma hA ka ru NA/ sarba A kA rA sa ma sa grA ha a nu prA p+te/ lha'i bu dge 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs te/ theg pa chen
19a6(rgyud): la yang dag par zhugs pa'i 'khor bzhi po las rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis lus la thogs sam/ legs par kha ton du byas te 'dzin pa des dman pa'i sems su mi bya
19a7(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta ba bzhin du de dag gi spyi gtsug gis steng gi mtshams su gnas par 'gyur ro// kha cig gi ni nges par sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ro//  cig
19a8(rgyud): bos par 'gyur/ kha cig ni chos ston par 'gyur/ la cig ni gzungs mi brjed par 'gyur/ slob pa lam la gnas pa rnams ni lam gyi rgyun mi 'chad cing chos ston pa rgyun mi 'chad par 'gyu
19b1(rgyud): kun du 'dzin pa mi brjed par yang 'gyur/ skye ba gcig gis thegs pa grub par 'amyur/ de dag dang ldan na thos pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi gzungs thob par 'gyur/ mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par
19b2(rgyud): ba nas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar ba sgrib pa med pa dang / yongs su rdzogs pa'i bar du rjes su thob par 'gyur ro// rkyen gyi mche 'dri la ba'i bstan pa'i dgongs pa khong du chud par bya'o// rigs kyi
19b3(rgyud): rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang nges par bstan par bya zhing bsgrag par bya'o// yal bar mi 'dor/ phyi ba shol mi bya/ brjed par mi bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du ba
19b4(rgyud): papar bgyi'o// bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di skad ma'i dus na 'khor bzhi rnams la phyi ba shol ma mchis pa dang / mi bskrad par bstan par
19b5(rgyud): bkye/ bshad par bgyi'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo do dag la yang nges par bstan par bgyi zhing bsgrag par bgyi'o// de na de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' lung dang 'thun par 'gyur/ bad
19b6(rgyud): cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos yongs su bzung bar 'gyur/ rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag la yang don chen po dang phan pa'i dngos po chen por 'gyur lags so// bco
19b7(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lha'i bu dag de'i phyir ji skad smras pa de bzhin gyis shig/ 'di ni khyed la rjes su bstan pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas dbang phyug
19b8(rgyud): / po dka' thub bzang po la sogs pa gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 
20a1(rgyud): 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / gus chen gyi lo slob pa na de ye shes sdes
20a2(rgyud): bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar bcad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// 
20a3(rgyud): snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan
20a4(rgyud): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul chos kyi dbye dgon pa rin po che bkod pa'i 'khor gyi khyams/ ye shes kyi rnam par dpyad pa/ sngon sangs rgyas kyis byin gyis brlabs pa
20a5(rgyud): sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i gnas rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su spyod pa kun nas/ 
20a6(rgyud): 'od kyi khung bzungs kyi dbus na byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa nas lung bstan pa/ thams cad kyang 'jig rten gyi khams
20a7(rgyud): tha dad pa nas 'dus pa/ thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po'i sras/ thams cad kyang gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin sna tshogs pa sha stag gis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas
20a8(rgyud): bas gcig tu bzhugs te chos ston to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rgya chen po la bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi drug skye bo mang po la phan pa dang / 
20b1(rgyud): bo mang po la bde ba dang / 'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang / lha dang mi yi skye bo phal po che'i don dang / phan pa dang / bde ba'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sa
20b2(rgyud): / rgyas gaN+DI klung gis bye ma snyed kyis gsungs pa sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs yod do// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la sangs rgyas kyi snying po zhes bya
20b3(rgyud): ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chang ngam/ 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun chub par byed dam/ gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston tam/ dad dam/ lhag pa'i bsams
20b4(rgyud): pas mos par byed na/ de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur/ chos thams cad 'dzin pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
20b5(rgyud): dadang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa la lta ba dang / bsnyen bkur byed pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/ dge 'dun pa rim gro byed pa dang mi la
20b6(rgyud): bar 'gyur/ bskal pa stong du 'khar ba'i srid pa'i rgya mtsho phyir bsrel bar 'gyur/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du tshe rabs du
20b7(rgyud): 'gyur/ myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ de la 'byung ba'i tshogs thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur/ lha dang / klu dang / gnod
20b8(rgyud): dri ba dang / la ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / mi 'am ci dang / lho 'phye chen po dang / mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad dga' bar 'gyur/ de'i lus la nad kyis mi tshogs pa
21a1(rgyud): pha rol gyi gnod pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ chad pa spang ba dang / mtshon cha spang ba dang / dug bcil nas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ de la bdud sdig
21a2(rgyud): can gyis klags rnyed par mi 'gyur/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis skasu rnyed par mi 'gyur te/ gang du yi la byas pa dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha de dag thams cad skrag cing dngangal dang bar
21a3(rgyud): 'gyu zhing phyogs bcur 'byos par gyur ro// spel 'di dag sangs rgyas kyi chen go// sangs rgyas kyi tshig chen po'o// sangs rgyas kyis na rten // sangs rgyas thams cad kyi
21a4(rgyud): anum te/ sasarbad+d+ha/ a nu dz+nyAn te/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ buH/ prad+d+ha/ praH/ ts+tsha/ bud+d+ha/ bud+d+ha/ brAd+d+haM/ bud+d+ha/ sangs rgyas kyi yul mtha' yas te/ chos bstan pa yang mtha' yas yod kyi
21a5(rgyud): gcig tu yid la bya ba ni mdor ni bsgom pa'o// gzungs 'don sems can rnams la thugs brdzi ba'i phyir sangs rgyas thams cad gsungs pa te/ chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya yin no// tAtra/ 
21a6(rgyud): / su shud+d+he/ sU shud+d+he// sho d+ha ni sang gdun ko ni/ nim le/ me la sa 'griH/ gtes mA tIHn+ti/ kra mes mas re/ sa rA sa ra pa ri u sho ke/ bi sho// sho ka sha ma na/ 
21a7(rgyud): u pa~M shwan+te/ pr-i shAn+ta/ oM ba thA sa/ sarba puN+ye ba ri ma ti te/ sarba d+harma ma ti man+ti te/ ha ra ha ra/ ma la dA ra/ tsa ra tsa ra/ saM tsa ra/ tsa latshal/ saM rtsa la/ ta la ta la/ ma ta la ra ma ta/ 
21b1(rgyud): rI Ne/ bu ri Ne/ sa ma ri Ne/ ri Ne ma ti log / log rte ne/ d+ha ra d+ha ra/ Da ra DA ra/ rod+ha ro d+hi/ mahA bi dza ya/ bA ti ni/ ha na ha na/ sarba pran+te/ pre shi/ tra si/ sarbadz+nyA ba / 
21b2(rgyud): bA ra mi ti/ mahA prA tiSh+ThA na sa~M b+hAn+de/ swA san/ A lo ke pUt+te/ bi Sha ya/ prad+d+ha/ pra ti maN+Di te/ b+ha ga ba te sa ra sa ra/ bras pa pras pa/ bi sar/ bis r+yA/ pra sa ra sarba sh+lo ka oM ba gat+ta
21b3(rgyud): snying po'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad ma thag tu ri dang gnas su bcas pa dang / tshal rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
21b4(rgyud): rten gyi khams kyis yang g.yos so// rab tu g.yos so// kun tu rab tu g.yos so// rgya mtsho chen po yang 'khrugs/ rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so// 
21b5(rgyud): sdig cing 'gul to// bdud kyi gnas thams cad skrag nas/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams dang / bdud sdig can rnams shin tu sdug bsngal yid mi bde bar gyur nyam thag go// sems ca
21b6(rgyud): dedag pa chen po g.yos par mthong ba de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
21b7(rgyud): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa lan gsum du brjod do// lha gang dag sangs rgyas la mngon par dad pa de dag gis lha'i me tog mAn dA ra ba dang / mAn dA ra
21b8(rgyud): sos bamam ldan 'das la gtor/ mngon par gtor nas/ gang dag sangs rgyas la skyabs su dang pa de dag mams cad rab tu dga' ba skyes so// de la 'di sad ces bya ste/ shAkyas ge yang das
22a1(rgyud): pa yi// sangs rgyas sgrub pas skad cig yud gang la// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ni snying po yi// gzungs 'di dag ni rab tu bshad pa yi// skad cig yud der sa yang rnam drug
22a2(rgyud): g.yos// rgya mtsho 'khrugs shing bdud kyi gnas kun kyang // rab tu g.yos nas bdud kyi ris rnams kyi// lha dag rab tu dngangs shing 'khrugs par 'gyur// bdud yid mi bde sdug bsngal mya
22a3(rgyud): dran nono// de tshe lha rnams ngo mtshar rab thos nas// 'jig rten ma gon la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir// namam khar gnas nas me tog man dA 'byor// gang du/ sangs rgyas mngon dang gizhan rnams
22a4(rgyud): sem do dang do shal spos rnams dang // phye ma dag dang thugs pa gos rnams dang // rgyan dang dpung rgyan dag kyang rab tu 'bul// brgyad po 'di dag ni de'i yon tan gyi phan yon gyi rgyun du 'gyur
22a5(rgyud): pa'o// brgyad gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi sems mi brjed pa'i rgyan dang / thos pa thams cad yongs su tshol bas mi ngoms pa'i rgyan dang / chos rab mo rnam par nges pa rten cing 'brel
22a6(rgyud): bar 'byung ba'i rgyan dang // sems can thams cad kyi dbang po mchog dang mchog ma yin pa shes pa'i rgyan dang / ji ltar thos pa dang ji ltar khong du chud pa'i chos rnams la tshul bzhin sos
22a7(rgyud): cing dpyod pa'i rgyan dang / sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i rgyan dang / rgyan de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis thabs la
22a8(rgyud): mkhas pa'i rgyan dang / gzungs thob pa'i rgyan te/ brgyad pa do dag na de'i yon tan gyi ban lon gyi rgyan du 'gyur ro// gzungs 'di rtag par kun du yid la bya'o// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgo
22b1(rgyud): babya'o// gzungs kyi gzhi 'di rnams yid la byas na las kyi sgrib pa thams cad yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro// pad ma rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang thob pa// nad thams cad dang / na
22b2(rgyud): thams cad la lag pas khyab par bya'o// bzlas brjod kyang dpag tu med par bya'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dedadag dang
22b3(rgyud): pos chen po de dag dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas kyi snying
22b4(rgyud): zhes bya ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang / rA na shI la dang / shu chen gyi lo n+yA pha ba na de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang
22b5(rgyud): bcos nas gtan la phab pa/ @#// rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya sarba bud+d+ha ang+ga ba ti nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungags
22b6(rgyud): rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das gang klu'i klung chen po'i 'gram na 'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang thabs sa
22b7(rgyud): tu 'azhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis rnam thos kyi bul sogs pa rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rgyal mi chen po dag skyes pa dang / bud med dang / kye'u dang / bu monams
22b8(rgyud): la 'jigs pa chen po bzhi po 'di dag 'byung ngo // bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ rga ba dang / na ba dang / rgud pa dang / 'chi ba'o// de la yang 'jigs pa chen po gcig ste/ 'di ltar 'chi bdag gis 'jig
23a1(rgyud): bachen pos/ brtsam pa med pa/ gtan po yod pa/ rtag kyi bzhin 'thang ba'o// rgyal po chen po dag de la 'jigs pa chen po gcig po de'i gnyen pongs 'di brjod pa bya
23a2(rgyud): denas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gang gi slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis srog rab tu btsal ba/ skye dgu rjes su gzungs pa ni deng bang
23a3(rgyud): cag gi rnyed pa legs par rnyed do// de nas bcom ldan 'das shar phyogs su mngon du phyogs te bzhugs nas/ se gol gyi sbas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bskul te/ 'di skad ces de ba'i
23a4(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs paras
23a5(rgyud): sa pa de dag bdag gi grogs mdzod cig/ des na bdag cag 'dir sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyis brlangs nas sems can thams cad kyi dus ma yin par 'chi ba rab tu bzlog par bgyi'o// 
23a6(rgyud): nam bskor ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo gnyis pa yang bskor bar bgyi'o zhes gsung ngo // de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / steng dang / 'og gi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsku
23a7(rgyud): deskad ces/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang su dag sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i don du blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i kyang
23a8(rgyud): ngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag bdag gis grogs mdzod cig ces gsung ngo // de bzhin du phyogs mtshams rnams su yang 'di skad ces gang gi phyir 'di dag tshe dang / stobs dang / 
23b1(rgyud): dog dang ldan pa yongs su 'grub cing dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur bar sangs rgyas thams cad bdag gi grogs mdzad cig ces gsung ngo // de nas phyogs bcu'i sa
23b2(rgyud): khams ji snyed sangs rgyas kyi sman la snang bar 'gyur ba de snyed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis til gyi glang bu bzhin du gang ste/ de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i
23b3(rgyud): grogs mdzad par zhal gyis bzhes nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad 'di skad gdung ngo // tad+ya thA/ tsa lA tsa lA tsa le/ bin ti/ swas+t+ri ki/ tsakra/ ang+ga ti/ pra sham nu/ sarba rog/ 
23b4(rgyud): tre/ kun Te/ ma hA kun Te/ tsa re tsa ri rI/ he ma gau ri he mgo re/ te ma ni shun+ti/ hwe mas si/ kor le ko ba ba/ he kur re/ ku rare re/ kum ti/ ging sa ma Ne/ shrISh+Ta bi tsa le/ tsa le/ bi tsa la/ 
23b5(rgyud): be lam+ba/ d+ha mu d+ya mu sA hA/ gsadab pa'i bdag zer stod pamams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang nye bar 'dug nas de dag gis smras pa/ hUM hUM si si swA hA/ de skad ces bka' stsal pa
23b6(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mi snang bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang de bzhin gshe
23b7(rgyud): byin gyis brlabs kyis bsrung ba res gyi'o// dus ma lags par 'gum pa las bzlog par brdzi'o// tAd+ya thA/ shwe te/ shwe te/ le le li/ 'phags skyes pos kyang / smras pa/ mA tASh+Tha
23b8(rgyud): rme/ A ta rde ga/ shU mA shU lu/ yul 'khor srung gis kyang smras pa/ tsa re tse re re swA hA/ mig mi bzang gis kyang smras pa/ ba lam+bi pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// 
24a1(rgyud): rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig sangs rgyas thams cad kyis gzigs pa'i rig sngags 'di nyin re la lan re 'dron na rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mod la ston par 'du she
24a2(rgyud): bskyed par bya'o// rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bum ngan song gsum du 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro// 'das sems can thams cad kyi srog la phan btag par 'gyur ro// gang zhig sems can
24a3(rgyud): thams cad kyi don du nyin gcig bzhin du tshig tu 'dod pa dang / gang yang 'di klog pa de la dus ma yin par 'chi ba'i 'jigs pa med do// de'i lus la nad ngan pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// chus
24a4(rgyud): 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// mes ma yin/ mtshon gyis ma yin/ dug gis ma yin/ lce 'bab pas ma yin no// gang na rgyal po'i bu dag rig sngags 'don pa'i sa phyogs de sangs rgya
24a5(rgyud): dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis dgongs par rig par bya'o// yi ger 'bri'am/ yi ger 'brir 'jug pa des sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la rim gror bya ba thams cad kyis
24a6(rgyud): dubyas par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhen/ sems can rnams la rim gro byed pa ni sangs rgyas la rim gro byed pa yin no zhes de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsungs pa'i phyir ro// su zhig
24a7(rgyud): pa 'di bris nas yan lag la btags na de'i yan lag thams cad bsrung bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / thams cad dang
24a8(rgyud): ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// // 'phags pas
24b1(rgyud): rgyas thams cad kyi yan lag dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs s+ho// / rgya bar gyi mkhan po dza na ma tra dang / dA na shI la dang / thu chen gyi yo rgyab pan de ye shes sdes bskur cing zhus te skad
24b2(rgyud): gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgya gar skad du/ Ar+ya d+hA da sha bud+d+ha ka nA ma ya hA yA ra swA \u0f7f/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po zhes bya ba theg pa
24b3(rgyud): po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge
24b4(rgyud): nga stong nyis brgya lnga bcu'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa' mi pham pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' khri nyis stong gi byang chub sems dpa'i
24b5(rgyud): ge 'dun chen po dang yang thabs gcig go// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la bka' stsal pa/ byams pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shar
24b6(rgyud): lo/ su sangs rgyas kyi ning bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brjod du med pa bcu'i rdul bla rab kyi rdul snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu ti gA can zhes bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin
24b7(rgyud): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha' dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi tog gi 'od me tog pad+ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od zer rin po che'i gzugs lta bu'i sgra dang
24b8(rgyud): spos mchog dam pa'i mchod pa skurnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od zer dpag med zla 'ad smon lam gyis brgyan pa rab sprul bkod pa chen po chos kyi dbyings
25a1(rgyud): las mngon 'phags chags med rin chen rgyal po zhes bya ba da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho ning gzhes la chos kyang ston to// su rgyal ba'i mtshan 'dzin pa de bskal pa chen po 'arab
25a2(rgyud): gling gi rdul brangab kyi rdul snyed kyi bskal par 'khor ba las ldog go// des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa 'dra ba med ces bya ba lung bstan te/ de de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
25a3(rgyud): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nam mkha'i dpal dri med rdul sel rab mdzes yon tan gyi 'od me tog pad ma bai DUr+ya'i 'od par rin po che'i gzugs lnga bu'i sku dang ldan pa spos mchog dam pas
25a4(rgyud): mchod bskurnam par spras shing legs par brgyan pa gtsug tor gyi gtsug nas nyi ma'i 'od par dpag med zla 'ang smon lam gyis brgyan par basprul bkod pa chen pa chos kyi dbyings las mngon la
25a5(rgyud): chags med rin chen rgyal po de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i dam pa'i chos nub ma thag tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de bzhin ga
25a6(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo bskur ba bla na med pa/ lha dang mi rnams
25a7(rgyud): ston pa/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das chu lha gzhon nu nyi ma'i sgron ma zla ba'i me tog pad ma gser srug nam mkha' lta bu'i sku ldan rnam par snang mdzad 'od zer rab brgyan thogs me 'khor lo'i
25a8(rgyud): 'khor phyogs bdur 'od zer rab 'byin 'jig rten khams kun sdang byed tog gi rgyal mtshan rgyal po zhes bya ba 'jig rten tu 'thung bar 'gyur ro// shar phyogs kyi de nyid kyi de bzhidan gshegs pa
25b1(rgyud): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pal sangs rgyas bkad pa thams cad dri med 'od ces bya ba'i mtshan par bzung ngo // tshig gtan to// phyag bya'o// lnga phyogs kyi bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
25b2(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgya spon pa'i brgyan la dgongs pa nas bya ba'i mtshan yang bzung ngo // yid la bya'o// nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dri med narna pa'i rtag gi rgyal po grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang / 
25b3(rgyud): srung ngo // phyag bya'o// byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa ma chog gi bkod pa sdang bar mdzad pa zhes bya ba'i mtshan dang bzung ngo // paka th+ya'o// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
25b4(rgyud): 'od ma radwa ces bya ba'i mtshan yang bzung ngo // phyag kyang bya'o// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen mchog gi tog grags ldan zhes bya ba'i mtshan yang bzung ngo // phyag bya'o// 
25b5(rgyud): dub byung gi phyogs patshams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa 'jigs med rnam par gzigs shes bya ba'i mtshan yang gzung ngo // phyag kyang bya'o// byang shar kye phyogs mtshams kyi de bzhin gshegs
25b6(rgyud): 'dogs thas bgan se ma sa sa byed ces bya ba'i mtshan pa dgra nga // ga cang bya'o// 'og gi phyogs nyid padi dag gagal sa ga 'a skyes pa'i med pa shes rna
25b7(rgyud): kyang s+ho// gang gi gags byed bzhin gshegs pagaser bdogami brjin degs bral rgyal banas bya'ams can la grazung ngo // phyag sa bya'o// byams pa dad pa'i rigs kyi bu'ab rig
25b8(rgyud): bubs bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gaganas pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcu gnyis po 'di dag gis can 'dzad la nyel 'acur sdig pa thams cad kyi nyes pa bshags par/ 
26a1(rgyud): bya/ dge ba'i rtsab thams cad la rdzas su yi rang bar bya/ sangs rgyas thams cad la bskul ba dang / sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdapa pa dang / dge 'ang rtsa ba
26a2(rgyud): cad chos kyi dbyings su yongs su baspobs mangs su ba 'o//  / ram pa ga kyang / dpas kyi sgrib pamams cad rnam par byu shA gyur ro/ 
26a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi ning gi yon tan pagad brdzun pal tshogs pad+mong/ yi gas pa can su mchogs padang/ yo chun su ma tshogs pa dang / byang nu ze sem mo pa'i dge 'dun can
26a4(rgyud): bdang / gnangs can sum tshogs pa yang pag/ na ldan su tshogs pa' 'tho go// sas pa dreg pa bzhin sangs rgyas kyi nga yongs su na pa zhan su mchags pa dang / 
26a5(rgyud): dge ba'i bshas gnyen phun sum sogs pa yang myur du yongs su 'dzin to// blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las nyams par mi 'gyur zhing yongs su nyams par mi 'gyur ro/ 
26a6(rgyud): khor ba nag par bachi tshe yang kun du mangs pa dang / de'i long sa spyod phun su ma chags pa dang / rigs phun nu ma tshogs pa dang / skye ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /  rus phun sum chags pa dang / kaH
26a7(rgyud): thun bu tshogs pa dang / ris 'a ba'i phyi 'i can rgya sa paya gas // bzhig tus ste/ shi gang kyis 'ge ngam cher ma thams das// shAn
26a8(rgyud): da dang / 'a da na da// byam yin su ba sa nag sa ga rdza gi sems ca mab/ ya shes
26b1(rgyud): / skyes / Am/ na/ 95/ su/ bad+hU me// zas/  le/ stan te/ sa ma mchi// 
26b2(rgyud): d+ha matsi te/ ts+tsha ta pad be/ a pak+Sha be/ ra d+ha~M DA me/ skur ba bge te/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis
26b3(rgyud): kyis gsang sngags kyi gzhi 'di rnams grub par gyur cig/ de la 'di skad ces bya ste/ gzungs 'di dag ni 'azung byas na// phyogs bcu dag na gang bzhugs pa// bye ba drug cu'i drang srong rnams// de dag de
26b4(rgyud): dgongs par 'gyur// skye ba dag ni kun du yang // dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnyed par 'gyur// cung zad dag pa gang yidapa// don rnams thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur// pad ma'i snying por bzhugs pa mi// sangs
26b5(rgyud): rgyas rnams ni mngon su mthong // gzungs 'di dag ni 'dzin byed pa// mkhas pa dpal ldan rdzus te skye// dran dang blo gros rtogs pa dang // mos pa shes rab rab tu 'phel// thos pa thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// 
26b6(rgyud): thos mas sa cad 'dzin pa mas// les rnam sa shin pa 'di na kye ya 'anam sa shed yos twA// ngan thathams cad na ste/ rang khrod spyang du 'grob phur/ ting na dang gnas
26b7(rgyud): deb de la mngon pa // bya gu pa rab tu de cing bya// ning ni bye ba phrag stong dag/ gser kyis bkang gi skyed byin 'ang// ga shig de bzhin gshig la rnams kyi// mtshan rnams 'dzin par byed pa yi/ 
26b8(rgyud): bsod napas phung po dems mang // rtag tu mo rabs dran par 'gyur// byang chub spyad pa spyad pa'i tshe// me khos thams cad nams spangs te/  sangs rgyas 'byung ba rab sadzes rmed// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
27a1(rgyud): mnyes par byed// dad pa bla na med pa thob// sangs rgyas rnams la rabadad cing // mchod pa dam pa byed par 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'byung ba mnyes byed de// mthong nas ston la rab tu dad/ 
27a2(rgyud): 'jig rten sgron ma mthong nas ni// mchod pa bzang po byed par 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa/  bkral pa bye ba grangs med tu// 'khor ba rnam par spangs nas su// byang chu 'a myur du 'tsha
27a3(rgyud): // nyin dag bdun du tshang bar ni// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed na// gang gis 'dren rnams mthong 'gyur ba'i// rgya chen mig ni spang bar 'gyur//  jig rten mgon pa de dag gi/ mtshan rnams pa
27a4(rgyud): gang 'dzin byed pa// skye ba gang dang grwar skye bar// de ni phyag bya'i 'os su 'gyur// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// bskal pa bye ba bsam yas su// bkur sum yin thob mi 'gyur// 'jig rten dag
27a5(rgyud): grags pa 'thab// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// de la bskal pa du mar ni// lhan pA sti stang byed par 'gyur// byang chub myur du tshang lang rgya// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed ka// mas med shas
27a6(rgyud): rab 'tshal mi 'gyur// g.yo dang sbyin rnab par spangs// rtag tu sangs rgyas rnams kyang mthong // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// lha dang drib d+ma dbang dang // mkha' lding lha min gsang ba ba// rtag
27a7(rgyud): tu de la srung bar byed// gzugs dang mtshan ni phun sum tshogs// nor chen khyim du skye bar 'gyur// sems can kun la sbyin par byed// dpal zhing gtong 'od ser sna med// bskal dbye ba brgya yang
27a8(rgyud): // lha'i tsen na dmar ba dang // shin 'a dri zhim srag kud kyi// sus dang de ye khanas 'byung // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dir byed pa// bskal pa bye bar smra skad ni// mangs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan parang sdug
27b1(rgyud): rtag tu chos rgyal tshul dang ldan// mtshan nams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// ran can sna bdun padam 'dab// bye ba skyong phrag yang yod las// 'byor chen de ste sku gzugs ldan// mtshan nams 'di dag su
27b2(rgyud): 'dzin pa// de ni pas sun drug dang // kye ba dag gi tshogs rnams dang // 'bral par 'gyur ba mi mthong ngo // nga kyi chen po rnams kyi sa// dadu med kyis ni bzung byas na// bud ma lus pa
27b3(rgyud): dag/ rgya badz+ra gros ldan par 'gyur// pi 'i lung ni thob kur nas// bra ma dbyang chub thob 'gyur te// chos kyi maror lor rab bskor nas// 'dod pa ni bzhin mya ngan 'da'// mtshan rnams 'di dag su 'dzin pa/ 
27b4(rgyud): da mi lus la mtshan da she// dug dang mi dang rgyal po dang // g.yon can rnams kyis mi tshugs pa// mtshan rnams de ga su dzin pa// da yi sams la rnams kyang ni// dadung dang ba'od par bcas pa/ 
27b5(rgyud): bdud kyis glab rnyed ma 'gyung // 'di dag gi ni mtshan gyi rnams// ma gang 'dzin par byed pad// zhing ni bye ba bas ma yas par// nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas bstan pa rnams
27b6(rgyud): chedan// 'dzags pa med par zhe zhu// da da grad yi bsamam nyan nas// rgyal ba da ga zung ston 'gyur// sangs rgyas mazhan pa de dag las// lung bstan pa ni la gyur nas// de
27b7(rgyud): rgyal ba'i bstan la tha tsam med// mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin byed pa// 'jig rten mgon po rnams las ni// zab mo'i chos ni thos 'gyur te// thos nas thams cad 'dzin par 'gyur// de nas pha rol phyin
27b8(rgyud): pa dang / mi 'jigs pa dang stobs rnams dang // mtshan dang dpe pyad babang po rnams// ma lus par na rdzogs par 'gyur// sangs rgyas de dag rnams kyi ni// gang gi zhing du 'dod kur ba// der ni bla med yang dag
28a1(rgyud): rdzogs// byang chub rtogs nas 'tshang rgyar 'gyur// skyes pa'am ni bud med gang // mtshan rnams 'di dag 'dzin pa 'i// yon tan 'di dang gzhan dag kyang // sangs rgyas bska
28a2(rgyud): kun du gsung // phig yod ldan par gyur nas ni// yon tan phun bum 'di'os nas// dgas pa'i sangs rgyas grags ldan pa/ de dag mtshan rnams 'dzin par 'gyur/ sangs rgyas 'di dag dpa
28a3(rgyud): skal par gang nyan dang // gang dag 'di rnams mtshan nyan cing // thos nas gus par byed 'gyur ba// de dang de dag shes rang
28a4(rgyud): dang ga tid rnams kyi mchog tu 'gyur// drang srong chen po de dag gi/ 'di 'dra'i mtshan dag thos gyur nas// bag yod ldan zhing mkhas gyur la// shes rab ldan pa su ma 'dzin// bcom ldan 'ang
28a5(rgyud): deskad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang / dge slong dadag dang / thams cad deng ldan pa'i 'khor dadang // lha dang / maM
28a6(rgyud): dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig tan yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa sangs rgyas bcu gnyis pa zhes bya ba zag patshan na
28a7(rgyud): mad rdzogs sa/ ga kyi mkhan po ngan mi dang / dAn shIl dang / zhu chen gyi lo tsA ba zhin de la shes sdes 'askur ci zhus te/ sa gas pa cad kyis kyang btsocos nas gtan la 'ang ga/ 
28a8(rgyud): Ad+yas pa bud tuka/ nA ma ma hA ldan pU d+ha/ 'ad skad du/ 'phags pa sangs rgya che 'dun pa zhes bya 'phag pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems
28b1(rgyud): thams cad ma byuga'al lo// 'di skad bdag gis dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das ti ser rab rtse mo lha' gnas drang srong ga spyod pa dang ha cang yang mi ring bzhag na dge slong lnga brgya tsam gyi dge slong
28b2(rgyud): dge 'dun chen po dang byang chub sems dpa' lnga brgya la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po dang / sun
28b3(rgyud): nga po dang / mtha' yas me tog dang / kun nas me tog dang / de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa sha stag dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das
28b4(rgyud): rirtse mo'i rags khrod de nyid na dge slong zhig/ 'byung pos zin nas brdol zhing gcer bu gos med pa la lag pasgreng te ngu zhing 'dug pa gzigs pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas
28b5(rgyud): ba'i snying pos blags phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/ pus mo ka ras pa'i lha ngas la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gal pa de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gas
28b6(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' kyi lan gyi hud ces skra 'byin pa 'di dang / dge slong gcer thugs ma mchis la lag pa stong pa cig shos 'di yang su nig lags/ de nas bcom ldan 'dus kyis byang chub
28b7(rgyud): ras dpa' sems dpa' chen po nas mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po 'di ni na dkyis btag pa yin no// cig shos 'di yang nad kyi btab ba yin no// de nas bcom ldan
28b8(rgyud): 'das la byang chub sa mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos 'di skad ces gsol to// nad thams cad rab tu nye 'ar bgyid pa dang / 'byung po thams cad 'azlog pa'i reg sngags bcom ldan
29a1(rgyud): kyis bstan du gsol/ bka' stsal du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sangs rgyas sprul pa zang dad/ de nas nam mkha' la de bzhin gshegs pa drug byung // 
29a2(rgyud): pa ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shA kya thub pa'o// de nas pazhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs steng gi rnams 'khrugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don da
29a3(rgyud): dbams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung 'o thams cad pazlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud+d+hA ya/ na mo d+harmA ya/ na \u0f7fsaM g+hA ya/ tad+ya thA/ a~M ha
29a4(rgyud): tel sa/ na mong kar mi tsanA ya/ na mo na maHswA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par gzigs kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam ngam ba'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal
29a5(rgyud): rab snying po gang la la zhing // rig sngag pa 'di 'chang ngam/ klag/ gas/ kun chub par byed na/ de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ chu dang me'i sdug bsngal ba'i nad kyis 'chi ba
29a6(rgyud): ra sde 'gyur// dus ma yin pa'i 'chu bas 'cha ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur ro// dngug zos kyang bas bzhin du 'gyur ro// bas dang skom la lan bdun pa bras brjod byas te thosan par la
29a7(rgyud): gnod pa mi 'byung ngo // nad thams cad kyis btab par mi 'gyur ro// ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zas pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa bdun gyi gzugs mthong bar 'gur
29a8(rgyud): na bta' ba'i na sngar 'bras brjod byas la snga ma'i mar ma srid// mde dang spangs nad kyi btab pa rnams la snga ma'i khar dang / ud pal sngon po dang / shu ti dang / te'u shing pa rnams
29b1(rgyud): bkris pa' bar byin na nad thams cad sam par 'gyur ro// las thams cad layang sbyar bar bya'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gtsug tar can sngang zhinam mtha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la
29b2(rgyud): don dang / nad 'ams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / baphung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phying gas sngags gzhi 'di dag paga'astsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/ nA mo d+hamA ya/ na maHsa~M rna ma/ oM barba pra tsa ba cwa la/ 
29b3(rgyud): tsin+tA ya/ kI lA ya/ par bi/ tA nAM swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying po sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / bsgomanyes pa dang / rmi la ma ngan
29b4(rgyud): rje babrog pa dang / dus mi yin par 'cha ba dgag pa byor sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya skyong phrag dums gsungs shi dengs kyang da ltar bshad pa'i snying po 'di 'ang shig nam mapa'i snying po gang la
