29b5(rgyud): dang po 'di nyid lan pasum yid la byed na/ de la pha rol gyi gnod pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// gnyid kyis log pa'i rmi lam na de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mthong bar 'gyur ro// gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi
29b6(rgyud): ro// 'di she' ma nas de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur zhing mnyes par byed pa pa gyur ro// den pa 'i'i chog gan ne dad bams cad bskud pas bcing bar bya'o// dus pa las gar pa la sna
29b7(rgyud): yang la bzlas brjod byas te byin no// chus phyogs bcing bar bya'o// skud pas bdag la 'asrung ngo // byes pa rnams kyi gdon dga' srud pa sngon po gdags so// mtshan btab pa'i na bar lan bdun brlag
29b8(rgyud): bya'o// gad dgal yang rang gis blas myur bar bya'o// denasang bzhin gshegs pa thams cad slob kyang / rnam pa 'al bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams ca
30a1(rgyud): zhi bar bya ba dang / dpung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyi gsang sngags gzhi 'ad dag bka' dul to// nam bud dra ya/ na mo d+harma ya/ na maHsa g+hA ya/ a ka la ka la/ ka
30a2(rgyud): ku lu Ta lu/ ku long swa r+tha r+than ku ru sa rbagra hA NA~M swA hA/ nam mkha'i snying pog sang sngags gzhi 'di dag ni bskal pa bzang ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / 
30a3(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po khyod kyi gsang sngags ga ni 'dir gzungs shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gas/ 
30a4(rgyud): par byed na de'i lus la mtshon gyis mi tshugs/ dug gis mi tshugs/ dbyig dug gis mi tshugs/ rims nad kyis mi 'debs shing / chu dang / dus ma yin par 'chi ba dang / 
30a5(rgyud): 'tshe bar mi 'gyur te/ sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa ni ma gtogs so// dag slong ngam/ dge slong ma 'am/ dge bsnyen nam/ dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig nang bar langs nas mgo bkrus te/ 
30a6(rgyud): gshegs pa'i spyan sngar lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod na/ de'i las kyi skyeb pa thams cad kyang bar 'gyur ro// de la sems can sdang ba gang dag rgyal po rnams thog mar smra bar 'gyur ro// sa
30a7(rgyud): nathams cad de'i dbang du 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad mi nang du yid la bya'o// 'thab pa dang / thab mo dang / rtsod pa dang / 'gyed pa thams cad du skud pa dkar po gdags so/ 
30a8(rgyud): paci la btags pa'i 'azas pasal lan brgyartsa 'argyad sbyin khrig bya'o// rang
30b1(rgyud): na shing sa na shA dgasan sang na sa / 'dag samatshan pa can kyi rlobapa mams ca dang // btung ga dam
30b2(rgyud): gis me pus la bsreg bya til dag lan stong sbyin bsreg bya'o// sdig pa ji snyed pa thams cad sbyang bar 'dod pa dang / rig sngags
30b3(rgyud): thams cad 'grub par 'dod pa dang / bdag bkru bar 'dod pas shu te dang / na la dang / khre dang / shai re sha dang / rgya spos dang / pur sum dang / gla sgang dang / oMn dra ba ru dang / byang chub kyi shing na
30b4(rgyud): sa mra'i mgo thogs dang / 'di rnams kyis bkru bar bya ste/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar nyin zhag gcig gis sbyang ba bya zhing bum pa sar pa bzhag ste/ zla ba nya la sangs rgyas kyi gzugs kyi spyan sngar snying pos lan
30b5(rgyud): stong rtsa brgyad bsngags la khrus bya'o// dug mi gdug par byed par 'dod pas sangs rgyas kyi kun sngar seng ldeng gzhung ma pa'i lci bar skrag pa brgya rtsa brgyad ming nas spos te sbyin bsreg byas na drug mi gdug
30b6(rgyud): par 'gyur ro// gdon dang / bsrung ba dang / 'byung po la sogs pa'i las thams cad la yang sbyar ba byas na bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa leg par dang
30b7(rgyud): ngagi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can thams cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gzhi 'di dag bka' stsal to// 
30b8(rgyud): rudu / nam tam ga/ na ma ma drwab/ rnam ban sdug tan tu sngags ma kyi rji phyug yo cag ca ka zhan du na / ga ke las AH/ nam ma
31a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas log par da sel ces bya ba gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'i snying po 'ang rgyan kyis
31a2(rgyud): zung shig/ blangs shing bzung ste kun chub par byas na phyi ma'i chidage slong dang / dge slong ma dang / dge basbyin dang / dge bsnyen ma dag da ci dkon mchog gsum la dang brnyed nas khrus byas te/ bcom ldan pang
31a3(rgyud): me tog dang / bdug pa dang / spros dag gis mchod pa byas nas gsang sngags 'di lan brgya rtsa brgyad 'byor par 'gyur te/ tshe rab bdun du tshe rabs dran par 'gyur ro// lha rnams kyi nang du lha'i che ba nyid thob par
31a4(rgyud): ra ro// yang na mi rnams kyi nang du 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur ro// yang na cho ga bdin du bsgrub na de mir skye ba tham thob par 'gyur te/ 'di shi 'phos nas 'jig rten gyi khams bde ba can du skye bar 'gyur ro// 
31a5(rgyud): 'di la yang rtag tu brjod nand thams cad lamathar bar 'gyur ro// bos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro// bas dang skom gyi rnam pa la lan bdun sngags te ror 'thung nand thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// 
31a6(rgyud): sgomazhu bar 'dod na gapa' thams cad la lan stong rtsa brgyad kyi 'akru bar bya'o// lhog rgal bcad na srungs khab kyis bya'o// 'tha' ba dang / rjod pa dang / bcing ba thams cad las thar par byan ldan
31a7(rgyud): bzlas 'dzid byed chub tu nor bang baphel bar 'gyur/ bgags dang myos dzin thams cad las kyang mar bar 'gyur ro// ci sa de bzhin gshegs pa 'thong bar 'dodon des phyogs gtsang bar 'dzi
31a8(rgyud): 'khor bar dkyir 'khor bslus la a ga rus bdugs te/ lan stong rtsa brgyad bzlas brjod byas la/ de'i drung du sA n+yas shar phyogs su bstan te ta la na de bzhin gshegs pas long bar 'gyur ro/ 
31b1(rgyud): maud kyi dim mad //  ma stobs so/  dun par ston to//  de 'azhi da gshegs pa gsor chub sang gin mapa'ang pa 'jug te/ sems can thams cad la dran pa'i
31b2(rgyud): dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'byung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags bzhi 'di dag thams cad bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA ya/ nam d+ha NA ya/ na maHsi r+m+ma la/ ma sa gan ga sun
31b3(rgyud): ta thA ga tA la/ a ra ha te saM mya k+saM bud d+hA la/ tad+ya thA/ oM pa ra sa ras ra sar/ sau ri si ri si ri si ri/ si rA la/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+ha ma d+ha ma/ d+hu ma d+hu ma dru ma~M d+hu mA la/ na maHkan ka mun ya~M/ te thA ga tA la/ yar
31b4(rgyud): saM mya kA~M bud d+he kAt+tha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gser nub kyis byang chub sems dpa 'a nam mkha'i snyi 'o lnga 'di phrad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po gang la la zhig snying po 'di 'dzin cing rtag tu
31b5(rgyud): zlas brjod byed pa de la mtshon gyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung / me dang / chu dang / lce dang / lce 'bab pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ dug thams cad kyang zas dang 'dra bar thub par 'gyur ro// dus ma yin
31b6(rgyud): ra 'chi bas 'cha ba'i dus byed par mi 'gyur/ gshis ngan du 'chi bar mi 'gyur/ tshe ring bar 'gyur/ longs spyod che bar 'gyur/ rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa
31b7(rgyud): de gyis 'arlabs par 'gyur ro// dus gsum du bzlas brjod byas na sngon gyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro// ji ste pha rol nad las thar bar byed 'dod na ci nus su gtar ma gtong zhing pog gas
31b8(rgyud): a su ru'i bdug pas bdugs la gapa' thams cad la zhus bya'o// mdza dang / spang sa nad dang / mchi kun la shu dga'angs po btags la sbrang rtsi dang bkras te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis spyan sngar
32a1(rgyud): man stong brgyad sngags la bslus na mdzend thams cad sos par 'gyur ro// zhag pani pa la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar snga ma'i me tog gi phreng ba la lan stong rtsa brgya
32a2(rgyud): sngags te mi'i mgol bcing na zhag bzhi pa'i rims sos par 'gyur ro// mtshan btab pa'i rna bar bzlas brjod byed na/ rjed byed las par par 'gyur ro// lus srul pos zin pa rnams la sangs rgya
32a3(rgyud): 'dul ba'i me tog gis bdug go// de la sogs pa'i lang rnams byed de/ las thams cad pazhes bya'o// de nas da bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung snang gi nam mkha' la bzhugs te/ sems can za
32a4(rgyud): cad la phan pa'i don dang / nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang / 'thung po thams cad bzlog pa'i phyir gsang sngags gan 'di dag bka' stsal to// na mo bud d+hA la/ na me d+ha mA ya/ na maHse g+ha sa/ 
32a5(rgyud): ha ra ha ra/ ha ra t+ta ra/ ha ha ha/ na baHkA sh+ya thA ya/ ta thA ga thA ga/ a te/ seMm kyi bud d+hA nga/ sid tu d+ham du prad swAd+ha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa 'od srung gis byang chub sems dpa' sems
32a6(rgyud): nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po snying po 'di ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang lnga ra klung sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi bye ma snyed dag gis gsungs pa ste/ nam mkha'i skang
32a7(rgyud): snying po 'di phreng shig kun chub par gyis shig/ gang la la zhig 'dzin tam/ klog gam/ kun nub bar byed dam/ nyin ma 'am/ mtshan mo lan gsum gsum pa zlas brjod byas na ma dongan mi lam na yang
32a8(rgyud): shin gshegs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro// de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang byang bar 'gyur ro// sngon gyi las ni ma gtogs so// las thams cad la yang sbyar bar bya'o// mdzo dang / sha gang ma sogs pa
32b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog la sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngang lan stong rtsa brgyad sngags te/ bklags shar bkrus nams par 'gyur ro// klad pa na pa lasangs rgyas la phul ba'i me tog sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bzhag
32b2(rgyud): na dun rna gyum/  du ya []pa shi ma rdzasate/ 
32b3(rgyud): nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAs thub pa pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// nam mkha'i snying po glad la'i nad pas lan 'tshon dang lag
32b4(rgyud): mamachil gyis bya'o// srid bathad na shing kar para'i lcag mas bya'o// drag skyong na tus bya'o// las gzhan rnams nga bya'o// khwan gyi tshogs sbyar bar bya'o// chog thams cad kyis thams cad du sbyar bar bya'o// @
32b5(rgyud): ldan 'das kyis de skad ces pa 'a stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' che dponamamapa'i snying po yi ngas te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// / 'bags pa sangs rgya
32b6(rgyud): bdun pa zhes bya ba zag pa chen po'i mdo// rdzogs so// // rgya ga skang nga// khrag blan a me hA bA d+ha Ni man tra/ bod ska da du// bcom ldan 'das snang bams las kyig zungs ldanas/ bcom ldan 'das
33a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa dgra tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ a mi ti/ a mi tot+taH/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha ga/ A ma ta bkrAn+taH
33a2(rgyud): a mi ta ga gan kI d+heg ris bkra sha k+She yi ka ri swA d+ha/ gzungs 'di'i yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du b.lags pa'i las kyi srib pa lang 'di lan gsum pa zlas brjod byas na spril ba de rnams 'ad
33a3(rgyud): / 'gyur ro// lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba dang sdig pa yongs su byang bar gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas rjes
33a4(rgyud): su drad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo rat+na tra yA ya/ ma hi du ha ke swA hA/ lus lan dbyung ba dang / nad yong skabs su gyur kyang rung ste/ lan nyi shu rtsa gcig sngags te/ bsil bar gyis de la ga yangs
33a5(rgyud): nad med par 'gyur ro// gzungs sngags de gsungs ma thag tu 'khor thams cad ye rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas kyi gzungs
33a6(rgyud): gas s+ho// bcom ldan 'das snang ba mtha' yas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// tAd+ya thA/ a mi ta/ a mi to d+ha be/ a mi ta sa~M b+ha ba/ 
33a7(rgyud): yamate bi krAn+ta k+Sha ma~M ni/ gagan kr-i d+hi ka ri/ sarbakle shak+Sha yang kA ra swA hA// gzung 'dor yon tan ni bskal pa brgya stong du bsags pa'i las kyis skye'i pa'ang lan gsum bzlas brjod byas na da rnams
33a8(rgyud): par rig par bya'o// nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bzlas pa byas na rtsa ba bzhi'i ltung ba dang sdig pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur te/ sangs rgyas stong la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun par yang 'gyur ro// snang ba mtha' yas dzas
33b1(rgyud): rdzogs so// rnam rgod ldanan gshegs pa rba bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'asas rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo// N+DaH// s+'uhA// ra sa / 
33b2(rgyud): ki li/ d+harma a d+hiSh+Thi te/ ki li ka ye/ saM g+ha ya d+hiSh+Thi te swA hA/ rigs kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis rtag tu nang par langs te/ dra ba'i 'od de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan dran par byed pa de bskal pa bzhi khri
33b3(rgyud): tshe rabs dran par 'gyur te/ de ni ngan song du ltung bar mi 'gyur ro// bla ba'i 'od kyi mtshar nges su dran pas yon tan de rnams thob par 'gyur ro// phra ba'i 'od kyi mtshan rjes su dran pa rdzogs s+ho/ na maHsarbata
33b4(rgyud): nAg ta dzid ya/ arbu ga te oM ku rung gi ni swA hA/ 'di lan gcig bzlas pas kyang bskal pa 'bum phrag brgyad stong du bsags pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang bad par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa spyi'i snying po rdzas
33b5(rgyud): napa rdzogs so// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo// na mo ra t+na shi khine/ ta thA ga tA ya/ a rakA te sa ba mya smai bud d+ha ya/ tad+ya thA/ rat+ne rat+na shi Shi ne swA hA/ 'chi ba'i tshe dran na ngan
33b6(rgyud): song kun las rnam par grol bar 'gyur/ 'che ba 'os nas kyang sum cu rtsa gsum gnas kyi lhar skye'o// sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan ras su dran pa rdzogs s+ho// @#// rgya gar skad du/ ar+ya bi ma la
33b7(rgyud): rAmad+hur NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba 'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das
33b8(rgyud): pa'i khab na/ bya ga kyi phung po'i 'de la bzhugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rnam par dag pa la bka' stsal pa// blo thos rnam par dag pa tshul khrims yongs su dag pas ni
34a1(rgyud): bzhin gshegs pa 'angs su dag ga// dragro rnam par dag pa ting nga dzin yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gro ba rnam par dag pa bzad pa yongs su dag pa
34a2(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa phan pa'i dngos po yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// bla gros rnam par dag pa bya bra ba yongs su dag pas de bani dgashes
34a3(rgyud): papayongs su dag go// blo grob rnam par dag pa snying rje yongs su dag pa dang / dka' ba yongs su dag pa dang / btang snyoms yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa rnam pa
34a4(rgyud): kol ba yongs su dag pa dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go/ blo gros rnam par dag pa stobs yongs su dag pa dang / mi 'jigs pa yongs su dag
34a5(rgyud): pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go// blo gros rnam par dag pa thams cad mabyed pa'i ye shes yongs su dag pas de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag go rlob
34a6(rgyud): dam par dag pa de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su dag pa la su zhig me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan la sogs pa dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / byug pa rnams kyis pa sti snang du byed pa
34a7(rgyud): de'i bso na pas kyi phung ba'i mang 'atogs par mi nus te/ de'i mtha' ni theg pa gsum po las theg pa gang yang rung bas mya ngan las 'das pa'i mtha 'jug pa la ga ga par bsad rnams kyi phung po dpyi ma'i mab yang
34a8(rgyud): bad par mi nusas// da ci byor ne/ blo gro rnam par dag pa ji sa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi tshang mad pa de 'izhin du/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba yang tshad med do// 
34b1(rgyud): // khasam gyis mi khyab bo// mtshungs pa med do// zangab med do/ da pag gis pa' // rjod du med do gro rnam par dag pa su ni ga zhan gshegs pad ltar bzhubs te/ ni gan
34b2(rgyud): la kyi byed ba dang / tham da dang/  dang / mal /  sa [] zhig de 'azhi ga gags pa 'angs su bya na lam sa pa'i
34b3(rgyud): par byed pa dang / ri mor byed pa dang / mchod pa dang / rjed pa dang / yang dag par sems nye bar bzhag ste/ byang chub tu gzhol ba'i sems bskyed pas phyag 'tshal ba dang
34b4(rgyud): byed pa dang / kyi steng byed dang slos byed pa de ma da das rjod rjed pa dang / gsom pa dang / bsngags pa dang / skyong ba byed pa des pan lan sngang shes par bya ste/ lug shed/ dran pa dang ldan par 'gyur
34b5(rgyud): dngadang/ rtog pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / ngo tsha shes shing khrel yod pa dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang / myur du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mthong bar 'gyur ba dang / mthong nas kyang dad pa skyed par 'gyur ba ste/ 
34b6(rgyud): na lnga po dag tu shes par bya'o// denas gzhan yang chos bzhir shes par bya ste/ bkri gang shen/ de bzhin gshegs pas bstan pa'i tshig so sor 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang de skad bstan pa bzhin du bsgrub pa
34b7(rgyud): dang / seMngs byas bcom ldan nas rnams dang nye bar 'gyur ba dang / myur du 'angs rgyam gyi zhing yongs su dag par phye bar 'gyur ba ste/ chos 'ani 'di da ga yongs su 'dzin bapa gyung //  gro rnas pa dag pa kya
34b8(rgyud): khasems dpa' chos bzhi dang lan na 'dud dam bdud kyi ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis mi ji bar 'gyur te/ bzhig pa ne na/ rigs che ba dang / btsam ma thag tu sangs tam bcom ldan 'das rnams med la byed par
35a1(rgyud): phyi ma'i dus na dang pa 'tsho ba 'dzid pa dang / rtag tu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzog pa pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs kyang 'gyur bap+ta/ klong
35a2(rgyud): par dag pa byang chub sems dpa' chos bzhi po de dag dang ldan na bdud dam bdud kyi rim gyi lha'i bu rnams kyi mi rdzi bar 'gyur ro// pho gros rnam par dag pa byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa la yang dag par
35a3(rgyud): zhugs pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten mthong nas dad pa skyed de/ pus mo gnyis ka'i lhangs la btsugs nas phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin gshegs pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
35a4(rgyud): kyis sku legs par 'argyan pa de ci dra bar bdag kyang de 'dra ba'i sus rob bar gyur cig ces de ltar bos pa 'askyed na/ blo thos rnam par dag pa 'bod nams kyi zung po de'i mkha' 'arjod par mi nub te/ bla med
35a5(rgyud): payang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la gnas pa'i phyir ro// bsod nams kyi phung po de ni rgyal po nyid dam/ brgya byin nyid dam/ tshangs pa nyid dam/ nyan pos nyid dam/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dam/ bla na med pa yang
35a6(rgyud): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid ces kyang bdabar byar mi rus so// daci kyi shen/ blo gros rnam par dag pa rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu modas bsod na mas kyi phung po 'asam kyis me khyab pa yongs su
35a7(rgyud): bzung ba yin te/ blo gros rnam par dag pa 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa grong khyer du 'jug gam/ gtsug lag
35a8(rgyud): ngam/ grong du 'jug kyang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du rgya yang rung / 'chag kyang rung / 'greng yang rung / 'dog kyang rung / chos ba spyon kyang rung / stong gsum gyi chen po'i 'jig rten gyi
35b1(rgyud): dmas can lda'am/ kla'am/ gnod stan nam// stsam pan nas/ na tha ma' sngang ngam/ ma'am tsa'am/ lho' bya chen pa'am/ ma 'am/ si ma yin par ga/ shing ngam/ ri 'am/ lung bu'am/ 
35b2(rgyud): skyibs kyang rung ste/ thams cad de bzhin gshegs pagal ba de logs su 'dud pa dang / rab tu 'dud pa dang / kun tu 'dud pa mi byed pa de gang yang med de/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang
35b3(rgyud): sa kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de dag grong dang / grong khyer ram/ grong rdal lam/ yul 'khor ram/ pho brang 'khor na rgyu ba la sems can rnams 'dud/ rab tu 'dud/ kun tu rab tu
35b4(rgyud): 'dud par 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das 'dod pag med la phyag 'tshal lo// a mi t+tas mi te za b+ha ba/ sardzab sa/ thab+h+ya te/ thab+ha pa 'i thab+h+rUM bag+h+nAM pra b+hA ba te/ zlag pa te/ bAb+hU b-i ti~M/ zla b+hA bA ti k+ShaH/ 
35b5(rgyud): / prak+Sha thA ti/ zlathA ba ti/ com ldan 'das ma thus btsun du gcog/ bcom ldan 'das gabus bstan du gsol/ 6\u0f7f/ mnyis te/ gtis ti/ matam te/ mnyis te/ ma tis ti/ prA ti rAH/ 
35b6(rgyud): su pa nang /  na sa bu ngan dum/ sasan sa thu pan la/ socos su stsal na ma/ son bya mu pan la/ mayon bya su pa nas/ sog su sul na ga/ soson pa slu 'das/ yoyon kya / 
35b7(rgyud): 'i shi/ ni'aM shig/ shi'i shi 'aM/ shi li shi'i/ shi'i shig shes shi 'i/ zhi bar gyur cig 'ashegs med par gyur ci// rba ba te/ btAs/ k+Sha/ rar+thi/ rish+mi/ rak+Sha~M/ I// 
36a1(rgyud): da sh+ma/ ra sh+le/ rash+mi/ ra shrI/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag gi mtshan kyang gzung bar bya zhing phyag bya'o// 'di lta ste/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'byung dang / bcom ldan 'das rin
36a2(rgyud): nyi ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen bla ma dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'grags dang / bco ldan 'das rin chen tog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen mthu dang
36a3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das dbyangs dpag med dag/ bcom ldan 'das thu ba dka' dang / bcom ldan 'das grags pa mtha' bas dang / 
36a4(rgyud): ldan 'das rin ched 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das bde chen brnyes dang / bcom ldan 'das phre ba'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das 'den dbyangs dang / bcom ldan 'das nad kyi dri ma bral dang / bcom ldan 'das zla bar
36a5(rgyud): dang / bcom ldan 'das dri ma med pa'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag med dang // bcom ldan 'das rin chen mtha' las dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen snying po dang / 
36a6(rgyud): na 'das rin chen 'byung ba dang / bcom ldan 'das bla ba'i smon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sde dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i sre dang / bcom ldan 'das pad+ma'i mchog dang / bcom ldan 'das yon tan mcho
36a7(rgyud): / dang/ bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dang / bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang phyug rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das gser lta khur snang ba dang / bcom ldan 'das gsab kyi 'byung gnas dang / bcom ldan 'das klu'ing
36a8(rgyud): rgyal po dang / bcom ldan 'das me tog dang / bcom ldan 'das spros 'ams
36b1(rgyud): 'das da mau dang / 'am ldan das dpa kyi snying ba nor buran can sa dang / yo ldan 'das dpa ma rtogs na dang / bcom ldan 'das sang seM sma pa/ bcom ldan 'das sang gdabang phyugargyal po dang / 
36b2(rgyud): sus pa khyen rtson brtsung 'byu dang / bco na das mam ma dod dang / btsam lda dbang sa rgya mo dag/ pa song lu'adas 'a dam paci 'don dang
36b3(rgyud): gnyen ston pa dang / bcom ldan 'das me dang / bcom ldan 'das drug byed dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen du byung dang / bco ldan 'dug rtas rgya yongs su mya nalas 'das pa dang / bcom lda
36b4(rgyud): 'das blo yangs dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen dpag med sbrul 'ad dang / bcom ldan 'das ri ba ltar rnam par gnon pa dang / bcom ldan 'das phyagan rin chen 'chog dang / bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'dus pa
36b5(rgyud): dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo da po che'i tshig gi dpal dang / bcom ldan 'das kun nas rnam par snang mdza rnam par dga' brnyes pa dang / bcom ldan 'das nyi zla smon ma dgabatsho
36b6(rgyud): ldan 'das lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das spyan po chen po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri rab dang / bcom ldan 'das shin tu lhun po dang / bcom ldan 'das ri ra bkru bu'o// tad+ya thA/ ba tab ta/ dam dpa/ rnam
36b7(rgyud): ma swA hA/ shar phyogs na sang sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'di dag la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag 'khor dang bcas pa la nad med
36b8(rgyud): dang / zhi per bsrung du gsol/ lho phyogs legs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang zhi bar bsrung du gsol/ 
37a1(rgyud): phyogs rigs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dran pa da ka la phyag 'tshal la// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol// byang phyogs la/ 
37a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol// 'og gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas pa
37a3(rgyud): 'das gang dag bzhugs pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol// steng gi phyogs logs na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag
37a4(rgyud): pa 'dren pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag lan dmed pa dang / zhi bar bsrung du gsol// 
37a5(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// de dag gis kyang bdag la nad med pa dang / nye bar bsrung du gsol// tad+ya thA/ bis le/ bi ma lA ka re/ bim pa saM b+ha ba~M kAhA/ bi ma le/ bi ma le/ bi ba le/ bi me le/ bi ma la/ 9
37a6(rgyud): bem le/ di ma le/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ya lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma hA na re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ khi me lA ka re/ bi ma lA ka re/ bi ma la sa bung+ga te/ bi ma las
37a7(rgyud): bis la laphud te/ bi sa las mu te/ bisi las suH te/ bim las pud+ha d+ha/ bis la sa bud te/ brim la sa ma te/ rig sngags 'di de rig zugs sa// lharnams kyi ni brjod pa yin/ di ni dus gsus
37a8(rgyud): byas na// nad rnams las ni yongs su thar/ mi ma yin gyis gang byas dang // sdig pa gang dag sbyod byas dkrol// de dag dran pa brjed mi 'gyur// bzung ba rnams kyang chud mi pa// de dag skye na mas su yang / 
37b1(rgyud): tagatu sangs rgyas 'bral mi 'gyur// su nig dri ma med pa'i gzungs// 'di ni dga' bas 'dzin byed pa/ zhing rnams kun du rgyubs// dpal ldan pad ma'i snying por byung // mtshan rnams kyis ni lags par brgyan la
37b2(rgyud): lag 'od bar dra ba 'byug/ Nar+tha/ gzi gci/ btsu lo// A la/ a \u0f7f/ TuH/ kang tra'o// e re/ ri mr-i ti swA hrI/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpar
37b3(rgyud): chen po blo gros rnam par dag pa dang / sgra dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten me rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// 'phags pa dri ma med pa zhes byab
37b4(rgyud): gzung ma rdzogs phyag kyi ma khan byo bong dun li d+da dang / dA da shI la dang / bu chen gyi lo rgyab pa de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing rdzus te/ skad gsar tshad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la rabab/ @#// rgya gar skad du
37b5(rgyud): mAH bi she Sha ba ti d+ha ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa kya dper man zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gi sa thos pa dus gcig na/ 
37b6(rgyud): ljid das sngam gyi di tha pa'i chos nyi shul du ladug rod cadang/ grong kyi ma cizhes bya ba'i bcug la//  ra bdugs te// da dge slong tsho da cas bya bdod gcig ni byed grong bye gad sangs
37b7(rgyud): desalal 'igrong khyen nas dang gachad 'argyad pa mdu smin pa dang / dge slong dris par der mi lus chen po kun du 'gro sum cu yod pa/ bzhin mtho zhi bzhig kyang mi sonas mthong ngo // mthong nas
37b8(rgyud): de pa 'di snyam du bsams ta/ kye ma mi 'di ni lus che ste/ 'di di 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa yin du nges so ste nag/ de pus mo gnyis ka'i lungs la btsugs te/ mi lus chen po gal bde
38a1(rgyud): lags su thal sa sbyar ba ga nas/ mi lus chen po la 'di gad ces smrab po// mi khyod 'ang ba dngal gzhon nur gyur paste/ 'drin gda' ma/ 'jam dpal gyis smras pa/ dge slong dang
38a2(rgyud): dge slong des smras pa/ b.ram dpal khyod ci'i slad du 'di na gda'/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa/ dge slong 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams la nad rnam pa sna tshogs byang ste/ gnod
38a3(rgyud): ma yin dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri ba rnams ri'i rgyal po ri rab kyi ngos gcig la gnas so// des nyi zla'i 'od kyang mi mngon/ nyi ma dang / zla ba dang / gza' dang / rgyu skar rnams kyang nam mkha' bar
38a4(rgyud): bsnang ngo // de'i tshe lha dang / lha ma yin kyang ga bur 'gyed de/ g.yul bkye ba dang / lha rnams ni pham/ lha ma yin rnams ni rgyal te/ de'i tshe 'byung po dang / yi dgas rnams bud med kyi gzugs kyis sems
38a5(rgyud): rnams la nad gtong ste/ 'di lta ste/ lkog ma'i lha gor dang / 'bum phran dang / me dpal dang / ston pa dang / rims nyin gcig pa dang / nyin gnyis pa dang / nyin gsum pa dang / nyin bzhi pa dang / rlung las
38a6(rgyud): rab dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa dang / bad kan las gyur pa dang / 'dus pa las gyur pa dang / klad pa na pa dang / bol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / tshad pa dang / mig nad la sogs pa nye bar
38a7(rgyud): po// 'di lta ste/ chang rje ba dang / zan pa dang / dus ma yin pa'i char gyis lo tog/ phun sum tshogs pa'i 'od 'phrogs sems can rnams kye mdangs 'grog/ cha dang / stobs dang / mdog dang / gzugs
38a8(rgyud): dang tsha 'angam bu'i gling na sems can thams cad nad snga tshogs kyis yongs su nyan to// gtum po seng ge dang / spyang gi dang / stag dang / spul la sogs pa'i gzugs kyis sems can rnams
38b1(rgyud): gr-ig s+ho/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can rnams la dus ma yin par chud za bar lta bar gnas pas sems can rnams nad las thar par bya ba yang dka' stsa/ 'anga' bu'i gling 'dir sems can rgan pa dang / 
38b2(rgyud): ba ba dang / gnon pa dag las dkrigs phrag sum bcu 'chi bar 'gyur ro// de'i phyir nga dge slong khyod kyi gan du 'ongs kyis/ khyod kyis 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can thams cad la chos kyi rnam sa
38b3(rgyud): 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad ni 'di snyam du bdag cag ji ltar sdug bsngal gyis bcing ba thams cad las thar par 'gyur snyam du re ba'i phyir ro// de lta bas
38b4(rgyud): grong khyod kyis sems can thams cad la mdo 'di spogs te/ sems can thams cad la dge ba'i rtsa bskyed pa'i phyir nan tan gyis shika/ dkon mchog gsuMl rtan par rgyun du dad par gyis shig ka lha rjed cig de bzhinag
38b5(rgyud): ba'i mchod rten rnams sam/ sku gzugs rnams la spos dang / me tog dang / bdug pa rnams kyis mchod par gyis shig/ khyad par can gyi dazungs kyang lhogs shig/ nyi ma bdun yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i gas
38b6(rgyud): la nye bar gnas par gyis shig/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa blo yangs bab mo 'brug bsgrags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ pi ru la gaN+Di te/ bi bu la skA re/ bi pu la lo ni she/ an la se/ 
38b7(rgyud): sam b+ha ge/ yan las gtig te swA dz+dza/ de bzhin gshegs pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam pa das la pal phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya \u0f7f/ te mateg/ ta ma hA ra yAdz+ra/ de ban gshegs pa 'od pag med sa phyag 'tshal lo/ 
38b8(rgyud): a mai tad+ha be/ a me ta saM b+ha ga/ a ma ti bi rA ne/ a mi ta bi bAn+taM ka re/ a li ta ga gan ki ti ka re swA hA/ de bzhin gshegs pa yon tan 'byung gnas la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ ga gan sa A ka ra/ ka ga nas
39a1(rgyud): gan d+ha ta ga swA / de bzhin gshegs pa ku nas smos rdzogs phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yarmA/ sems sa nA n+ta/  zhan gshegs pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyam mtshan gyis 'jug
39a2(rgyud): bklags gshegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// rmaH/ yas mas men/ de yin gshegs pa rgyam gnon pa la phras 'tshal lo// 6\u0f7f/ na shu te/ ban+de tha / bar+b+bas sa be/ ki ga/ ta te
39a3(rgyud): AH/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa dag / bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgrib pa thams cad num par sel ba la phyag
39a4(rgyud): sa/ can rna// boso na pa b+hUH/ ma dz+nyAn bad+ha ceg// bas / gangagaso te ga mas/ mas cas dang / byang chub sams dpa thams
39a5(rgyud): prab+ha/ An gaH/ shAn ts+yaiH/ gibs pa ti/ sarbadud d+ha a /  A ma t+te swA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa'ang ma dpal la phyag 'tshal lo// rbaH/ 
39a6(rgyud): chub sems dbang kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+yaH/ heHdr-i/ mahAHdr-i/ a tiHdre/ sa man+ta b+ha dre/ bi ka ta rA dza me/ mahA bi ka ta rA nga phe/ Shas te bi ga ta rA dzag/ hem
39b1(rgyud): A a'ang Na'i gtan snahA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'bags byams pa la phyag mtshal la// tad+ya thA/ ma ma tra/ mai tra ma nas swA/ byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa nam mkha'i snyed pa 'i phyag 'a
39b2(rgyud): / ga/ ka/ gan ci ga tin na/ kyang chu gsems dpa' lags pa ma thos mi dad pa la phyag 'tshal lo// Na/ aShA Ta/ any+dza me bu/ maN+Dal ga mi gotan du ldan/ byang chub sems
39b3(rgyud): dpa' drim med par grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo// taHm+b+ha/ kIrti tA sarba dza ne/ ab+hi kI te tA sa badzi ni/ badz+ra a ka re/ badz+ra saM b+ha bi/ badra bi dA ka re swAhA/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrib pa thams cad rnam par
39b4(rgyud): la phyag 'tshal lo// d+haH/ sarba a ba da wa na bId+d+he swAh+mA/ trAN+Da bi kAr Ni swAH/ me b+ha bi s+phoT ma hA d+ha/ a ba rA dzi ta kA le hAH/ bawa dang N+Di thAH/ bod+ha dang rje thAH/ karba ni d+ha bi tA kA laM AH/ e/ 
39b5(rgyud): an+ta thA sa sa r+tha/ prog nA rA ma swAH/  bangs /  AhU~M/ zla drob yiswA/  / ga ye swAH/ sa dis / seMH/  she ga mas/ sa tha~Mng gA ye hrIH/ 
39b6(rgyud): sAr+tha/ a sa~M b+h+re tA li swA hA/ sab dun kho pra sham r+g+haM swA hA/ bre 'od gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo// tad+ya thA/ tsan+d+ra pra b+ha/ su prab+ha/ pra la pra ka re/ pra kro te/ pra b+ho te/ pra b+ha ba te/ pra b+ha ba ti/ 
39b7(rgyud): mAM bi shud+d+ha trA~M ba~M me swA hA/ tshe 'dzod dgang lal nig rig sdugapa de nyin zhag bdun du nyin lan gsum mtshan lan bdun du byab ba byas na/ de ribs kyi sgrib pa pa lus par rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// 
39b8(rgyud): 'dun laran sbyin no// me las me spel bar bya'o// mtshan mo mar me thogs te mtshan rten la sri stang du byas la bskor bar bya'o// dam pa'i chos brib dang / bklags pa la brtson par byagonags te la mas kyi nang
40a1(rgyud): thung na khyi mnas khyim dang / grong nas grong dang / grong khyer na grong khyer du gad d+ha ra sa' bdug pa dang gtor ma dang / lta ba shos kyis mchod par bya'o// nad pa gang yin pa des kyang cho ga 'a
40a2(rgyud): bzhin byas na de myur dund las thar bar 'gyur ro// de nas yang dang ma dpal gzhon dur gyur pas dge slong tsha brjod pa 'di skang ces smras so// dge slong tshigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig chos
40a3(rgyud): klogags/ yi ger 'brib la/ yi gar 'bri 'dug gas/ gzhan du gal yang rgya cher yang dag par stonon de ldan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la
40a4(rgyud): ga par 'gyur ro// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong che brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ci nas skye bo thams cad kyi na lam du grags par 'gyur bar yul nas yul dang / grong
40a5(rgyud): renas grong khyer dang / grong nas/ grong khyer du bkur bar bya'o// 'das dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// tshe brjod rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las chos
40a6(rgyud): rnam grangs 'di lan gcig bklags na de bdag nyid thar par 'gyur ro// sus lan gnyis bklags na de bu dang chung ma dang lhan cig thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan gsum bklags na de rtsa lag gi
40a7(rgyud): kho dang bcas te thar bar 'gyur ro// sus lan bzhi bklags na de yul 'khor thams cad kyang thar par 'gyur ro// sus lan lnga bklags na de nye 'khor gyi rgyal po dang bcas pa thar ba
40a8(rgyud): ro// yang 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod la 'di skad ces smras so// chos kyi rnam grangs 'di myur du yul gzhan du bkur bar bya ste/ der yang yon tan 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur/ 
40b1(rgyud): dod gang gis chos kyi rnam grangs cad thos pa 'i 'an tam/ ma glog gag/ le ge mi 'dri'am/ yi gar 'drir mi 'jug gam/ kun chub par mi byed dam/ gzhan dgal rgya cher yang dag par mi ston
40b2(rgyud): ma/ yul gzhan du mi 'byin tam/ sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te mi nyan tam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su mi sngon mtshams med pa lnga byed pa rnams
40b3(rgyud): 'gro ba ci 'dra bar de mngon par 'grub ste/ sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis smad pa'o// yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dge slong tshe brjod pa 'di skad rjes smras so// 
40b4(rgyud): brjod su zhig 'di tshad mar mi byed pa de ni ngas thog ma nyid du dad par byas pa ma yin no// 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir nga ri'i rgyal po ri ra
40b5(rgyud): la song ste/ lha dang dri ba rnams la rjes su bstan pa dang 'dun dbya ba'i phyir nan tan bya'o// de skad ces spras nas/ 'jam dpal gzhod nu gyur pa de nyid du mi snang bar gyur to// dge slong tshe brjod kyis kyang 'jam
40b6(rgyud): dpal gzhon nur gyur pas smras pa la mngon pa 'grod deg byang nas song ngo // 'phags pa khyad par can zhes bya ba'i gzungs/ rdzogs sa/ rgya gar kyi mdzan po chen midza dang / dAn shI la dang / ku chen gyi lo ts+tshab bad
40b7(rgyud): ye shes sdes bsgyud cing zhus te skadags tshad kyis kyang bcos nas gtan la phab pa// / rgyag gad du/ Ar+ya ya Sh+Ta ma N+Dal ka nA ma ma hA la na suH/ bod skad du/ 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba
40b8(rgyud): theg pa chen po'i mdo// sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bdag gas las pa dus gcigan/ bcom ldan 'das de klu 'dzin na/ 'phags pa spya ngas gzigs dang
41a1(rgyud): gaganas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po bra ba snang ba zhes
41a2(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur nas 'dug pa de stan las langs nas chos gos phrag pa gcig tu gar te/ pus mo gangs pa'i lhang sa la btsugs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gi la bde
41a3(rgyud): thal mo sbyar ba btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// gal te zhus nas zhu ba lung bstan pa'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la skabs phyen bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
41a4(rgyud): rang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la bdag phyogs 'ga' zhig zhu'o// de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen snying po zla ba sdang bal 'di skad ces
41a5(rgyud): bka' stsal to// drin chen snying po zla ba snang ba khyod ci dang ci 'dod pa dris shig dpangs dris pa de dang de'i lung bstan pas khyod kyi sems rangs par bya'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / 
41a6(rgyud): dpa' sems dpa' chen pom ni chen snying po zla ba sdang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsom to// bcom ldan 'das legs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig dkyil 'khor brgya dpa kyid par
41a7(rgyud): 'tshal nA des de ltas kyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byaka stsal pa/ rigs kyi su khyod skye bo mang po la shin tu ldan bdu/ hUM ba mang po la bde ba dang / dus gsum du skyes pa'i sems can nam
41a8(rgyud): bamed pa'i ye shes bsgrub pa'i phyir rigs kyi khyod thobs pa skyes pa ni 'bang ste/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu de'i phyir snying po gang brjod pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga 'bya shing dngos grub thams cad
41b1(rgyud): nga tso par 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' rgya stong pa nyon cig/ ma n+t+ra d+ha ma hA b+h+ri bAN+Da/ snying po 'din dbus kyi bamam ldan 'das mchad dang// ma sa ng+gA ngas swA / 'phags pa spyan ras gas
41b2(rgyud): phyag gi snying po'o// sosa~M d+hA rA Na sAtra/ byams pa'i snang po'o//  A k+Sha sha kan+d+ha ma swAtra/ nab lapa'i snying po'i snying po'o// mig rdzam laldan d+ha/ dun da pabang po'i snying po'o// i ku ru b+han ra ha swA hA/ lag/ 
41b3(rgyud): 'i snying po'o// ma~M shrI ma rig saH/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu gyur pa'i snying po'o// mai na sA ri b+ha swA \u0f7f/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i snying pa'o// oM Sh+yete rA dwa sAH/ sa'i snying po'i snying pog/ 
41b4(rgyud): khasems dpang brgyad kyi snying po bde gshegang ba dang ldad pa 'di rigs kyi bu ma/ rigs kyi bu ma gang ma la zhig zhes dkyis khor gyi mdun du lan gcig 'dzadun de badzin thams cad thub par 'gyur te/ sbyang duH
41b5(rgyud): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag 'i rangs te/ 
41b6(rgyud): na'adas kyis gsungs pa la mngon 'dab pyod do// 'phags pa dkyil 'khor brgyad pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs sa// rgyag kyi maman po dzi ni mi tra dang / dAn shI la dang / 
41b7(rgyud): nagyi yo babad de ye shes rjes bsgyur cing zhus te/ skad gsar chad kyis kyang bcos nas btan la phab pa// @#// rgya gar skadang/ Ar+ya a lA ak+Shar pra dA ba dA me tA nA ma
41b8(rgyud): / gas pa gams kyi ma byin pa lag rgyang du nas bya chen yin ci do// mas kyas dang byang chubs sa dpa bamangs da nal// di ga sa
42a1(rgyud): thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya rgod phung po'i ri la dge slong khri nyis stong lnga brgya'i dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag rngu
42a2(rgyud): bum phrag du ma dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ brgya byin dang / tshangs pa dang / 'jig rten skyong ba la sogs pa lha bye ba drag khrig 'bum gyis yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas te/ da
42a3(rgyud): snying po'i seng ge 'khril bzhugs so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug stan las langs te/ bla gos phrag pa gcig tu ga par nas thus mog
42a4(rgyud): gal ba de logs su bal mo sbyar ba btud nas/ 'dzum mul te/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rol tu
42a5(rgyud): pa yi ge 'ung ngu ba bsod nams che ba/ gang pos btsam kyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang ba 'gyur ba dang / byang chub la nges par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag sngas
42a6(rgyud): 'drab rtson pa de dag bgegs ma mchis par gsang sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags baspyan pa
42a7(rgyud): lags dbang phyug la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/ rigs kyi bu khyod yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i phyer brtson pa legs so legs so// de'i phyir rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la
42a8(rgyud): de rung shig dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'i gnyung ngul bsod pas che ba gang thos pa tsam gyis sems can thams cad kyi las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyang bar ltung ba dang / byang chub 'a
42b1(rgyud): par gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang / gang dag gsang sngags sgrub par brtson pade dag pagags med par sngags 'grub par 'gyur ba ngas khyod la bshad // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phags pa
42b2(rgyud): spyan rapa gzigs da'ang bag gis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// sems can thams cad la sman pa'i slad du bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe sems can thams cad
42b3(rgyud): dkrol ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// mnyam par bzhag pa des spen 'tshams kyi mdzod spu'i phrag nas 'od zer 'bus phrag du ma byung ste/ 'di per de dag gis sangs rgyas kyi ning
42b4(rgyud): thams cad khyab par gyur to// sems can gang dag 'od zer des reg pa sems can dmyal ba pa yan chad sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu ngem par gyur to// sangs rgyas
42b5(rgyud): ning thabs cad kyang rnam pa drug tug pos so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung du d+ha'i can dan gyi phye ba'i char yang bab po// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu byed pa gsungs pa
42b6(rgyud): byang chub sems dpas mnyam pa'i sems dang byams pa'i sebs dang byas pa 'tho ba dang / sdig pa bas cad dang bral ba'i sems su bya'o// shes rab kyi ba ror tu byed pa'i sring po 'di yang gdod/ 
42b7(rgyud): 'di da pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob bo// sang 'argyas thams cad kyang 'di las rgya
43a1(rgyud): mams dpa' sems da' chan po rnams kyis chogatu byung to// cod padzin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa pa dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yod zed rgyu nas 'a gas pad
43a2(rgyud): bsngags rgyal po nas bya bab kyang zhes sa ca nyid sung yang badzin to// gzhas khyod ci na dang / 'dzin pa dang / thos padang / gzhan nas lang rgya che ldan pa dang / thugs
43a3(rgyud): dbri nam mchod pa byed pa de dag thabs cad ma'ongs pa'i dus de bzhin gshegs par 'byung ro/ 6 gla yang 'ab su ste/ sa bshes papa da'i/ b+ha b+har shA ra/ de badz+ra/ nub bAn/ butu sa byung/ 
43a4(rgyud): bAr sa phyag ba te/ sam ma shas shams nas tanA~M/ sarbaka pa yA bar Na 'i sho d+ha la/ bud rdza ma tin rten snang / don dam par shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad paskyed pa
43a5(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i lum 'phral du sdig pa 'phrog pa/ byang chub sbyin par byed pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ bskal pa bye ba brkyang yang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis pad yon brjod par mi nus so// 'di bklags pas
43a6(rgyud): dkyil 'khor thams cad du dbang bsrung bar 'gyur ro// gsang sngags thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras ga rigs dbang phyug gis
43b1(rgyud): sprob chung bdedag / shes rab kyi 'arob tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / klog pa dang / yi ge 'bri ba dang / yi ger 'bring bajug pa de dag thams cad srabs byang chub la gnol par 'gyur te/ 
43b2(rgyud): nib 'o// de sa pa bral pa dang / ba sems dpa' sems dpa chen po'i pags pasnye pas gshegs dab shAn gas bcom ldan 'das la 'dis cas gsol to// bcom ldan 'das

43b5(rgyud): byang chub mam sa dpa' de dag dang / lha dang / me dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yir ma te/ bco ldan 'das kyis gsungs ba la 'angon par bskyed do// 'gas pa nas
43b6(rgyud): khyen pa mi ga nyung duzhes bya ba rdzog na med rdzogs s+ho//  dang/ ga pa t+ti pra d+d+he rA yi/ bod ska dang / bcom ldan 'das pa shes
43b7(rgyud): na bya rgo daphung po'i ril/ dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang / byang chub sems dpa'i dge 'dun chen po dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das phab mo snang 'azhes bya 'a chos kyi rnam
44a1(rgyud): grangs kyi ting nge 'dzin ma snyoms par btsun 'go// ya dmis byang chub sems dpa'as pas dpa' chen po lags pa spyan ras gcig sa dbang phyug shes rab gyi par man ldan pas
44a2(rgyud): natshung pa nyid das pa zhid/ phung po sngo po dgas yang banyin kyi thong brnas pa sdu'o// denas ngas rgyam yi las/ ldan pa shA bus byang chub sem mdapa' mas
44a3(rgyud): dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des de ltar bas
44a4(rgyud): par bya/ de skad ces smras pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gis tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so// shA ri'i bu tshe
44a5(rgyud): kyi bu 'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo spyod pa spyad par 'dod pa des 'di ltar rnam par blta bar bya ste/ phung po lnga po dag kyang rang bzhin gyis stong par rnam pa babang dang
44a6(rgyud): par ma su 'o// gzugs song ba'o// khyo nyi ga gas so// gzugs las stong pa nyid gzhan pa 'i// stong pa nyid las kyang gzugs gan pa yid no// de bzhin du tshor dang / 'du shes da
44a7(rgyud): 'a byed dang / nam pa shes na da // shA 'i pa co mam ca myong nyid/ man nyid mdag/ mabya pa/ 'ganas pa/ khri med pa/ dri 'das

44b5(rgyud): nas/ sma med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de lta bas na shes rab kyi rol tu phyin pa'i sngags/ rig pa chen po'i sngags/ bla na med pa'i sngags/ mim
44b6(rgyud): bdang nyam pa / sun pasngamams cad pa ni mkhyen pa'i gas/ mi brdzun papan she pa se ma gyi'o/ gsas kyi na kyi pa/ 
45a1(rgyud): bla dag te/ bAr sog ta/ po spyo / shA ri'i du tu chungs sam dpa' ma mthod pa can pas da stor shes rab kyi par ma tumed pa'ab mi la bslab par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan/ 
45a2(rgyud): 'das kyi dzin delas pa'is te/  chum sems dpa' sems dpa me po lags pa spyad sa gzigs dang phrag la leg pa'o zhes bya ba byin napa/ legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu
45a3(rgyud): bzhin do// rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/ ji ltar khyod kyis bstan pa de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab mo la spyad par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang rjes su yi rang ngo // bcom ldan dang
45a4(rgyud): kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ra dwa ti'i bu dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang / thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dang / 
45a5(rgyud): lha dang / mi dang / lha ma yin dang / dri bar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi pha gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do// bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i snying
45a6(rgyud): ngo zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so// rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi la la mi tra dang / lo sra pa dge slong rin chen sdes bskur cing / bu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba dge slong rnam papa' la sogs pas nus/ 
45a7(rgyud): gtan pa'o// dpal bas ma las spyan gyis grul pa'i gtsug lan ge ge rgyal byes gling gi cig ngas pa bris pa dang bu dag legs par gyis so// // phyag skad du/ bud+d+ha thA ga wAn ya
45b1(rgyud): shata nA ma d+hA ra NI/ bod skad du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa'i gzungs sngags dang bcas pa/ thams cad ma khyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo// bcom ldan 'das snying
45b2(rgyud): can dan dri nem po'i spos kyis byug pa'i bu/ zhabs pa dam lha dang lha ma yin gyi nor bu'i cod pan gyis gtugs pa/ rang pung re la ma dang/ blas/ 'jig rten thams cad la ben pa ma dpa / 
45b3(rgyud): ston pa de bzhin gshegs pa/ bu' pa/ nyes pa dang bral ba/ zhi ba'i bdag nyid can/ gzugs mdzes pa/ mtshan gsal pa'i ga'i brjid can/ sku dpe byad kyis brgyan pa/ yon tan ldam
45b4(rgyud): / cad yang dag par rdzogs pa la phyag 'tshal lo// pad ma rgyas pa ltar zhal bzhad de/ tshams dkar shing rnam ma la thags pa'ang bas rab tu rgyas shing snang la nor bu dri la med pa ltar 'od gsal zhing
45b5(rgyud): langs te/ smra zhing gsal ba/ nyi ma'i 'od zer stong 'bar ba mang po'i 'od snang ba'i dkyil 'khor bil gyis gnod pa/ thub pa'i mchog spobs bcu dang ldan pa la phyag 'tshal lo// 'dud do// 
45b6(rgyud): rab tu 'ad do// brjod // ma 'is ga N+DI ni/ gas shama?/ shas pas/ ta thA ga d+ha ma dra katA/ ba b+hA ba/ k+sha hA/ sa rbaSh+TA pa/ mams
45b7(rgyud): rab ba la/ a mr-i ta ba la/ a ti /  b+h+yAMb+h+yAM/ d+hAr+m+ma rbASh+ma/ duts+tshed/ hrIn+de/ b+ha ga bAn+ta// sur ta b+ha ga sa shATI ka ra/ pA pa ki li lan sha ke saH/ de nas dpe bya
46a1(rgyud): gsas pas// yan lag thams cad rab brgyan cing // nyi ma bzhin du gsal ba po// 'bar ba dkyil 'khong ldan mnga' bo// grags shing dri ma rab spongs la// dri med sbyin
46a2(rgyud): dram chos ni blo// ba bdag chen pa snabs bcur ldan// rdum bral dpal dang ldan pa 'o//  menas gzhi chen po la// so blang chemed dza'iH// rgyal ba'i bras rnams gnas gyur bu// nor bu ma
46a3(rgyud): 'gro zhing // 'od par dri med gsal bkod pa'i// rdo rje rje dkyil 'khor po brang da// rtsub pa'i longs spyongs gzhi la// se ng+ge'i khri chen yangs la bzhugs// na zung byig gis gzhid pe/ kri na rab byed nyi
46a4(rgyud): nagashegs pa dgyes chen gyis// phun sum tshogs pargyan bkod lta// thub pa me bla nor bu'i 'od// nyi zer non pa'i 'od ldan pa// bde brag shin tu bkra shis tshul// 'dags pa skyil mo krung bcas nas// sku 'od 'bar
46a5(rgyud): kyil 'khor can// 'od gsal rgyas pas thub dbang gi/ dri med 'od zer bkye ba ni// mig yo rdo rje can zhes bya// dkyil 'khor chen por zhugs pa le// rdo rje can dag rab btul ba// gang yin de kun dag byas nas// dkyil la
46a6(rgyud): da sor bar byed/ ngan so na tshig zim na/ legs par shen tu dag byas nas/ skyed gsum dkyil 'thor cheche ba/ rnam padus pa'o gsal pa/ khyod pa'i 'grom lus pa/ bskor nas 'di chen do can/ 
46a7(rgyud): rdongs kyi rdzogs pa de/ da pan ma gsason zhugs/ denapa 'jigs pa'i ska kyis/ gangs shing mig sog gang y-i/ deg gas she zhes snyogs pa po// de ji legs byed lags sbed pa/ ni
46a8(rgyud): 'jis 'dzus kyis rnam par brgyan// sdigs byed migs nad gyur cid// stan las langs te phyag 'tshal nas/ legs par mchod byas smras pas/ 
46b1(rgyud): rag sngags yon tan sgrub byed pa// thub mchog rnams kyis rab tu gsungs// de gzigs dge ba dum pa d+has// sang sa rgyas blo gris rgyas par gyur// byang chub sems dpa' blo gros che// bskal pa gcig tu spyad pas kyang / 
46b2(rgyud): hud mar sangs rgyas kun 'byung zhing // spyod pa du ma 'byung ba yi// yon tan brgya yi spos ldan 'di a thos pa spro bar mi nus so// longs spyod rgya mtsho chen po chen pa byang chub sems mchog dkyil 'khor du// rgyal mchog rnam
46b3(rgyud): sa dbang bskur ba'i// byar mi ldog pa'i chos can ldan// 'di thos sangs rgyas spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi sdig pa rnams// ma lus rab tu bsal nas ni// blo chen dri ma med par 'gyur// zhi zhing dag byed bkra shi
46b4(rgyud): dul med pabargyan te zhi bar byed// dge zhing mya ngan thams cad sel// sdug bsngal thams cad nges par 'joms// dbang byed gsang sngags dam pa ste/ sa steng sdig pa thams cad sel/ ma smad 'bras bu nges par sbyin// bstar
46b5(rgyud): te sdang ba 'dul// nyes pa byas pa sel ba yin// gzungs 'di gang gis po gyur des// sangs rgyas rnyed par dkara' ba yang // ring por ma rdzogs thob par 'gyur// sgrib pa thams cad rabazhi zhing // khyab bdag nyon
46b6(rgyud): mongs kun sel ba// gang nig nyon mongs shi byed pa'i// gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa yis// kun tu bzang po nyid dang ni// lag na rdo rje nyid kyang 'thob// rig sngags 'chang gi bdag po yang // 'di thos pas ni thob
46b7(rgyud): gyur// 'jig rten kun nas lham me ba// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyang // dkyil 'khor dam pa gting med pa// 'din ri brid pa gas na nas// rab ni nyon bongs 'dul ba yi// rang byung go 'phang ma rnyes te/ 
46b8(rgyud): dam par dag byer gsar gyur nas// gsan ma thag tu rnam par dag/ de pyid phun sum tshogs pa dang // legs par 'dod pas brjod par bya// gzhan gyis mi thub gzungs gsan nas// bub pa kun gyis ga
47a1(rgyud): brnyas pa// 'khor ba 'dir ni nam du yang // bdud kyi las dang 'khrug med dang // mya ngan med cing 'bab med pa// gnangs la gnas pas tho'i pa
47a2(rgyud): gnas kyi dam pa thob nas kyang // thub pa dri ma med pa'i blo// gzigs pa bzang rnams gar gshegs pa'i// bzung 'phyo der ni 'phro bar 'gyur// legs pa 'dod pa rnams
47a3(rgyud): tshig gi mdo 'di mnyan par gyis// nyon mongs zad par bya ba la// rgyal ba'i gsungs pa'i gzungs 'di mchog/ sdig pa byed cing dge ba sdang // sdig pa'i rang bzhin
47a4(rgyud): rab 'jungs pa// gang gis thos nas de spong ba// nga yi mngon sum 'byor par 'gyur// sdig pa gnan yang mi bya zhing // snga ma rnams kyang bshags par bya// gzungs mtsha
47a5(rgyud): 'di yi mthu stobs kyis// sdig pa thams cad 'byang bar 'gyur// tshwa rabs gzhan ni stong dag dang // tshe rabs bye ba phrag brgyar yang // sdig pa mi dge gang byas pa// ngag 'gyur 'di
47a6(rgyud): la bcom med// mar gyi doni ches brgyad dang // de bzhin ches ni bco lnga la// bsnyen gnas legs par ltar blangs la// cho ga bzhin du sangs rgyas mchod// de nas rmongs pa med
47a7(rgyud): par yang // nyon mongs dkyun rab 'joms shig/ shin tu thub dka' dab med pa// nyas pazlog pa'i gsungs brgyad cing // thub pa'i zhal gyi zla ba'i 'od// 'bar ba nges par mthong
47a8(rgyud): bya // de tshogs rnam sa rdzogs pa yi// rgya ma pa'i tham pa nyid du 'gyur// 'ad dpag med la mnga' ba la// yon tan mtha' yas rab rgyas pa// bskal pabye ba skang du yang / 
47b1(rgyud): tog pa thob par 'gyur// nganas rdo 'dzin gyi tshig/ dkyil ma khar dag kar rnams cas// thos nas can rnams snga chags pa// bcom ldan 'das la 'bul par byed//  rdu la grel lags pa// b+ha bdag sa
47b2(rgyud): 'thams cad dang // ri bo te me'i rab la// gnas pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // de bzhin dkyil 'khor chen po dang // 'khod pa'i rig sngags 'chang rnams dang // ma la ya'i ri bo la// gnas shing rgyan 'bar thogs
47b3(rgyud): rnams dang / khyab 'jug lha chen la sogs pa// b+ha mi bdag po rnams dang ni// lag na rdo rje la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' stobs chen rnam la// dor bu'i dpung rgyan rna chab// rgyan rnam sa rab tu g.yo ba'i lung // 
47b4(rgyud): rab tu spyod de langs nas ma/ sdig bram mabar bdag rgyal la la// phyag 'tshal ba la mo spyang byas na kun gyis ye dbang phyug 'o// chu lachog dam pa dal ni/ maNar brgya rtsa brgyad dag gis bstod namanyam nyid chos ci
47b5(rgyud): bzhizhin nyid// shin tu rtozla pa lam me ga/ dum pa brtan pa dri ma se la// dri ma med pa skyon bral ba// thub pa sangs rgyas shin tu gi// 'jig rten mgon po skyu bu'i bdag/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyon mongs thul// de bzhin rgyal ba rdul
47b6(rgyud): gad ba pa tan / ga pa med bdun zhug// 'dig rkye mgon pa ldang mad ga pa zhi gas gsang za'o// khyo mongs pas tsham pan dogs pa/ zhon 'i sa / 
47b7(rgyud): / dri med tshul bzang ba/ zab pa rnam par gnon pa brtan// btsan po thugs brtse rnam par rgyal// mgon po de bzhin mgon mdzad pa// zhi ba'i bdag nyid zhe sdang bral// bcings pa las grol nges par spropa/ 
47b8(rgyud): tad kun mchog 'khra ba'is/ bdag zhing mi 'dzin drim mad/ ngan mong sel ba dpa la dang ldan// dpal mdad de bzhin pan pa mdzad// mnyam pa med par pe mang ba// khyab bdag nyon mongs las rnams spong/ 
48a1(rgyud): med pa dman pa med// mnyam pa de bzhin mi mnyam mnyam// snang ba brnyes pa snang byed med// 'jig rten snang mdzad sdig med pa// sgrib pa thams cad spangs pa ste// 'jig rten kun la phan par
48a2(rgyud): 'aco dpa' bo ni bzhi mdzad ga/ nyon mongs san pas bdapa yang sa// mang bden zab pa sa khyen thabs chog/ sems can kun gyi 'bras lags/ den yod nad dka' bre dang sa na/ derdo dkyil 'khor rtsub
48a3(rgyud): dzin pa// dpa' bo chen po 'jigs pa med// gzugs bzang mtshan rnams gsal ba ste/ sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan mnga' ba// chos kyi
48a4(rgyud): yongs spyod rgya mtsho lags// dpe byed pazang sa bkod pa yis/ sbas pa'i bdag nyid la mtshan ston/ dga' ba med pa'i ston pa'o// de bzhin nges pa bde sbyin pa// ma thunan yangs pa rgya che / bdud bzhi'i stobs rnams/ 
48a5(rgyud): sal mdzod pa// brtson chan spro che blta// dkyis pa chen po stobs pom// mthu rnas brtan po chen pos// gnas ldan dbang gis dachar lags// kas la ra gsung ldan dpe med pa// dge bstong pa nyid kyis t+yal/ 
48a6(rgyud): ra de dun pa med/  bras chen pa tshas 'dzin pa// phun sum chogs ldan 'chen ba rtas/ 'dod pa rnams na 'du'abang yang pa yang dadapa pas 'a dpal dang ldan/ dpal te longs spyod zhin tu cas/ 
48a7(rgyud): ldan legs bsgres skyo bar mdzad// gsung ldan pa kra nas rgyal ba'i gnas/ mnyal nyid mnyam pa nyid mkhyen pa// mnyam pa nyid kyil mtshan dpag med/ ba tud gyes pa longs spyod gsal// gan cas sems pa
48a8(rgyud): mnyam pa lags// blod dag sgo ldan dril spangs// gnas chen brtan par ldan pa ste/ rgyas par long la spyod dri ma med// thub pa thugs 'i rgyan mnga' ba// skal pa bzang po 'jigs pa'i skyabs// de bzhin 'jigs
48b1(rgyud): nyon mongs sel// dri med skyon bral longs spyod can// sna tshogs 'od ldan dkyil 'khor mangs// sku ba'ang dge ba'i rim pa mchog thugs re rje 'od ldan 'od bzang ba// mi gnas longs spyod dam pa lags// chos
48b2(rgyud): yon tan gnas/ rjod mo mchogasanas yongs spyod de// rnam ma' mtshan rten mdag go// rin chen gzugs 'dab shes pa/ zug mchog sa ldan 'ji mtsham pa sngon pa tsho sa / sa
48b3(rgyud): / thabs dang ldan pa ste// 'jig rten mi dge kun las 'das// dag par longs spyod brtan pa can// sa dang stobs dang ye shes bzod/  rol phyin pa lun yang 'a// ting 'dzin mnyam par longs spyod pa// rnamathar skol
48b4(rgyud): don sum pa// gtong ba sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// chos chen bde bar 'char ba lags// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yul las 'das// spyod rdul sbrer pa mi mnga' ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po rgyal/ 
48b5(rgyud): dam pa'i don te tshul cheb// shes bya'i yul rnam mas 'a dag la// spel pa med par 'chang ba brnyes// rig sa chen mthun par skyes pa sa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dge ba'i gnas khyad par brnyes pa mnyam nyid
48b6(rgyud): rnyes// mi mnyam sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// don chen shin tu mthar phyin pa// nyon mongs bral ba thub par dka'/ dge sbyong sdig pa spong mdzad pa// gnod pa med par bde bar 'byin// blo
48b7(rgyud): thams cad mkhyen// thos pa'i mtshon ma ma lus gas// daston pa bdal pa 'gyur bya// mnyam pa cad par lal da ldan// 'jig rten rnas sa cad drung 'dzin mgon// zhesas
48b8(rgyud): thu par dka'// bsam gyis mi byab bas ma yas yul// dpe med pa ste dper bya ba// 'od bzang rab dkyis dpal dang ldan// lags gsung blo yi stobs kyi 'byung // mkhas pa dam
49a1(rgyud): bde sbyin pa// rab kyis 'das pa'i spyod yul can// gsung ba chen po ye shes che// gnas chen bkra shis chen po ste// mchod par gyur pa yul las 'ad
49a2(rgyud): bya ba'i mtshan nyid med pa'o// sangs rgyas yul du skyes pa ste// shes bya'i srod bral bu che ba// kun mkhyen longs spyod 'bras bu rgyan// 'jig tan dbang 'das spyod yul ba// kun mthu
49a3(rgyud): yul gyi snang ba ste// thabs mnga' phun sum tshogs ldan pa// rdzu 'phrul rol pa'i thabs dang ldan// chos kyi gar thabs ston pa po// rab ston yon tan skur mang da pa// spyod pa ma
49a4(rgyud): 'dul ba 'dzad// yongs su rdzogs pa rnam par dag/ sangs rgyas spyod yul rnam sangs rgyas// gagags byed ma legs byed pa bcom// bdud kyi drugasal sel ba ma da// gsal / 
49a5(rgyud): rnam par rgyal ba brnyes// dpa' bo chen po pham med stobs// theg pa chen po shing rta bcibs/ 
49a6(rgyud): la gnas// theg pa mchog la longs spyod pa// nyan thos 'das pa'i spyod yul can// rang rgyal las kyang 'das paste// sangs rgyas sa'i 'bras bur gnas// gong nas gong du khyad par maskye
49a7(rgyud): dan pa ya'i gnas na bathugs// d-i byu zhi na/ dadags songs par spyod// sangs rgyas dbang po sa byas// rgyan brgyan brgyad kyis paston so// des rgya sogs
49a8(rgyud): gas rnams kyis// phyag byas mgo smad phyogs gcig lakhod/ de nas dkyil 'khor chen po ni/ gnas pa ma gum chem mer 'khod// bod du dari'i bod 'ching gzhalangs nas cod pa na sa tug yos/ 
49b1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor mthon po thams cad du// skad per chen pos yongs bkang nas// nor bu'i rgyan ni rnam g.yo zhing // ha ha grags pa'i sgra rnams te// kye ma sangs rgyas yon tan che// bskal pa grangs med gsum
49b2(rgyud): bsags pa// byang chub sems sogs mchog rnams kyis// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad lags par 'arjod// rtse marnyed dang bde 'byung ba// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad thos nas kyang // gang zhig klog cing rgyal la
49b3(rgyud): spyod// 'bras bu chen po 'grub par 'gyur// mtshan brgyartsa brgyad sngags bcas pa// bcom ldan 'das drung brjon na ni// sgri ba dang kun nas nyon mongs dang // sdig pa thams cad dag pa 'thob// mtshan brgyartsa
49b4(rgyud): / chog bton na// sgrib pa kun las nges grol zhing // nyon mongs mtha' dag rnam par spongs// shes rab chen po nyid du 'gyur// de nyid longs spyod chen po dang // bde ba las kyang nyams mi 'gyur// de li tshe rab
49b5(rgyud): thams cad du// blo ldan tshe rabs dran par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje'i thod 'ching ba// yon tan mtha' yas sras de la// bcom ldan 'dud las rgyal ye mas// mngon sum gzigs nas bka' stsal pa// rgyal ba'i sa
49b6(rgyud): ni ba ste// nga rgyal la sogs nyon mongs 'joms// 'jig rten bde ba kun las 'das// de bzhin gshegs pade mngon du phyogs// gzhan gyis mi tshugs gzungs dang ni// mtshan brgya rtsa
49b7(rgyud): brgyad nyan byed pa// de dag nas dag bdag nyid de// sems can kun la bde 'dod pa// lan gcig thos pa tsam gyis kyang // de dag sa chen 'bras bur gnas// ring por ma thogs dga' 'gyu
49b8(rgyud): rtag tu rab bsgrims la// gtan du bde ba 'dod pa yis// yon tan rgya mtsho ldan pa'i gzungs// mnyan par bya zhing bcang bar bya// gang zhi
50b1(rgyud): / nad med pa dang dbang phyug dang / yid la bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i sngags kyi gzhi dag sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir bshad par bya ste/ de shin du legs pa' nyon la yid la zung shig dang / ngas bshad
50b2(rgyud): par bya'o// de nal gnas gtsang ba'i ris kyi lha'i bu de dag gis la mo sbyar ba tud nas/  ldan 'das la legs so zhes gsol te byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa ting nge 'dzin gyi kyang par dang / sa chen po
50b3(rgyud): thob par bya ba dang / rdo rje'i gdan gnon pa dang / bdud gdul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi nges par 'byung ba dang / lha rnams dang mi rnams paskye bar bya bad
50b4(rgyud): sdug bsngal dang / dbul pa dang / dad thams cad zhi bar byed pa/ longs spyod kyis phyug pa 'dren par byed pa/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags kyi spyod pas phong bar mi byed pa/ reb thams cad yongs su rdzogs
50b5(rgyud): rire byed pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung 'bras bu med par byed pa ma yin pa/ bcom ldan 'das kyis byabs pa'i thugs dang / phan pa'i thugs dang bdag dang sems can thams cad la thus pang rtse ba nye bar bkra
50b6(rgyud): dpa gdadugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das shA kya grub pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i na song nams dang gnas gtsang ma'i gnas lasangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis gzigs nas/ dag pa'i yul la 'do rnam par sproste/ 
50b7(rgyud): ra' gas pa zhes bya la/  nge 'dzin la snyoms par bzhugs so// bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs mthag tu mdzod sunas motog kun tu skyes pa zhes bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa bcu
50b8(rgyud): zhes bya ra 'od byung ste/ 'ad bye thag sreg phrag sa rgya snang du legs kyis bcom ldan 'das pas na gsum bsngor ba gyis na/ snying gdum gyi stong chen po la 'i/ ton gyi ga/ dmas su songonapa/ bya shang gyi phyogs su
51a1(rgyud): sto shig d+hA'i klung gi 'dri rkyen gyi khams 'das nas/ me tog dang ldan pa zhes pa pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rjes su zhugs te/ gang na me tog kun tu skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po gas
51a2(rgyud): ba'adi bzhin gshegs pa 'thugs par ro// / de yang 'ang mad dpal gzhon nur gyur pa sngon kyi smon lam gyi nga gis/ byang chub semamad pa'i sems dpa' chen pa'i spyod pa dang ldan pa rnams da
51a3(rgyud): lhan cig gnas par gyur to// 'ang sa dpal gzhon dur gyur pas 'od zer gyi snang 'di mthong nas/ bzhin cung zad 'dzum pa dang ldan par gyur na sa byang chub sems dpa'i chags de dag la smras pa/ rgyal
51a4(rgyud): dag 'od 'di ni ngal yang dag par bskul ba'i pir 'ongs pa yin gyis/ khyed cag gi phreng ba med par nyi shig ces smras so// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems da 'a chen po 'ang ma dpal gnon nu gyur bamig rje
51a5(rgyud): rgyas shes 'byeb / 'do ga ngan bde logs su mngon dubulas nas 'dug go// de nas bskal ba'i 'ad des me tig dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i 'ji rten sde rnams snang ba chen pos snang bar byas te/ me tog kun tu
51a6(rgyud): mib dbang 'de bzhin gshegs pa lan gsum ba skor ba bya / chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sa dpa la gzhon nur byung ba'i sde bo nuba'ar bur to// de nas yang sa pal gshid nu
51a7(rgyud): rabastan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu yang dag par shes pa rgyal po'i dbang pod bzhin gshegs pa la lan gsum bskor 'byas te/ si bros phyag 'tshal nas pus mog pas pa'
51a8(rgyud): bzhugs te/ bcom ldan 'das mnyi/  su tu rgyas pa rgyam pa pa man nad ce // bcom ldan 'das ga shes kya na ga shegs pa da com pa pa dag par rdzogs pa
51b1(rgyud): sangs rgyas kyi bdag la dgengs te/ bcom ldan 'das bdag ni bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la blta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bya ba dang / sngags thams cad kyi spyod pa dang / srab thabs dang / 
51b2(rgyud): 'khor dang chog dang / gsang ba dang / cho ga si ba mo dang / cho ga 'do ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs dang / gsang ba dang / phyog rgya dang / dbang bsrung ba bstan pa dang / sem sa can thams cad kyis
51b3(rgyud): che bar 'tshal lo// de skad ces bcom ldan 'das me tog kun tu skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang pod bzhin gshegs pa la gso
51b4(rgyud): dang / 'jam dpal gnyen nur gyur pa ting nge 'ang na gang la snyoms par zhugs nas/ phyogs bzhi mdzar yas mu med pa steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad dang ldan pa'i phyogs sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis
51b5(rgyud): par dang bar gyur to// 'dzag rten gyi khams de dang bcom ldan 'das dang bcas pas/ rgyal ba'i sras legs so lags so// 'di lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par la snyom thar zhugs pa ni/ nyan thos dang rang sa
51b6(rgyud): sathams cad kyis nus/ byang chub sems dpa'i sad pa la zhugs pa dang / sa bcu la gnas pa dag gis kyang sdom par zhugs par mi nus so// de nas bcom ldan 'das pa to// kun tu yang dag par rgyas
51b7(rgyud): ya ga sas sa ldan sa nas sa pa na cig tul dka' gas te/ 'ang su palag gyu pa 'i ste pa'i tshig tugs dag don mas
51b8(rgyud): pa'i snang pan le ge gcig pa zhes bya ba'i mchog tu gsang ba/ mas can thams cad dkyilas rnams cad byed pa sngags kyi spyod pa khyad par 'bang po yang sgrib par byed pa'o// de nas
52a1(rgyud): ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa yud mang sheg cang mi gsung bar gyur te/ thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig tan thams cad la sangs rgyas
52a2(rgyud): na gyis gzigs te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la yang yang dag par dgongs nas/ byams pa'i thugs kyis sngags gsungs so// na maHsa rbabud d+hA nA ma mo/ 'di ni 'jam dpal kyi
52a3(rgyud): bi mchog yin tre las thams cad byed pa'o// de nas 'ang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa ting nge 'dzin da las langs nas/ dper na skyes bu stobs dang ldan pa laga' bskum las btud pa'am/ rgyang bya las
52a4(rgyud): bkus pa'am sel grol gtogs pa tsam 'am/ mig byed 'dum can mardzu 'phrul gyi skabs kyi thugs ni de 'dzin ces bya ni ting nge 'dzin ni nub rnam par 'phrul ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par
52a5(rgyud): zhugs te/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khyams pas kyi sla la nas/ steng phrin mam maudakyil nano 'dzin po tshorab tu gnas pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha rnams gnas su 'dug ste/ gnas sa
52a6(rgyud): nas de thams cad nod man po'i snang bsags lab byasate/ maud kyi rin po ches rab tu brgyan ci gsal banas ma ting nge dzin pa sgoms par bzhugs so// nga med la gzhan
52a7(rgyud): snyoms pa bzugs mtha/ na po chernam mi tha da 'dum ni bang po btsugs pa dang / rin po che'i gdugs dngada'ag tshad brgya stong phrag du ma rgya che ba'i lha'i gos dang / dar mang po'i tshogs kyis nye bar mings
52a8(rgyud): byas pa'i 'ang sa dpal gzhon nur gyur pa 'di ska ces brga' stsam to// 'das dpa la gzhon nur phyir pa de'i dus la bab par shes nas shog/ 'on kyang pa'i bags bcom ldan 'das shA kya thub pa la gnod pa
52b1(rgyud): rung ngam/ nyam nga 'chung ngam/ spyod pa yang ngam/ bde ba la dag par gnasas ma zhes zhu bar bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes brgyal po'i dbang pod bzhinA gshegs pas 'jam dpal gzhon nu
52b2(rgyud): la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// gzhan yang gzhon nu gang gA'i klung brgya stong gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis khyed kyi sngags kyi spyod pa dang / dkyil 'khoradang
52b3(rgyud): gzhib mo dang gsang ba dang / dbang bskur ba dang phyag rgya'i tshogs dang cho ga dang sbyin sreg dang / bzlas pa dang brtul zhugs bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed sems can thams cad dga' bang byed/ 
52b4(rgyud): rin po che'i tshogs kyi rab 'byam 'das pa dang da ltar byung ba dang pa'adas pa'i shes pa/ rgyal po dbang phyug lung ston par byen pa/ sngags bsngal yul gyi mthar 'gro bar byed pa mi snang bar byed pa dang / dus dang dmatshi ga rab
52b5(rgyud): ma gyi chog semams cad dang / 'jig rten bra ma lus pa dang / la ten las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas dang / byad chu ba sems dpa' da gags pargyan thos dang ngasangs rgyas kyi sa par na gyu ba'i spyod pa mapar thug pagal
52b6(rgyud): pa dang / gsung ba dang / gsung bar 'gyur ba yin te/ de ltar rjes su yi rang ba nyid de/ 'ja ma dpal ga don nur gyur ba de'i dus la bab par shes na song shig/ shAkya thub pa'i sman sngar mngon sum du mas kyi rnam sangs 'di
52b7(rgyud): na dur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sring pos/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs la/ gsungs nang gsung bar 'gyur la/ khyod kyang mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
53a1(rgyud): sang nas/ dbye ba dang rnam par dbyeb kyi che rtson par 'gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa shA thub pa zhes byabs kya las thams cad byed pa 'dangs su gan bar 'gyur ro/ 
53a2(rgyud): snying po mchog tu 'gyur ba ni/ oM bA ts+tshe na maH'dir nye ba'i snying bo na bAT+Ta hU~M/ de nas lang ma dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin ga
53a3(rgyud): pas gnang nas/ bkod pa thams cad kyis brgyan byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang rgyu 'thun pa/ byang chub kyi snying po thob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// bcom ldan 'das
53a4(rgyud): ba pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog rnam par bkod pa dang / rgyal ma can dang bdan dang byed ba'i tshogs dang / rin po che'i dril bu'i dra bas 'brel bsnyen pa'i sgra sgrog pa/ phyir mi ldog pa'i
53a5(rgyud): ra to// de nas gnas gtsang pa'i ris kyi lha'i bu rnams kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ngo tshar da du byung ba'i

53a8(rgyud): lol/ sum / grogs pa dag pa 'jigs shig ma 'jigs shig
53b1(rgyud): gshegs pa de'i spyan snga nas ngal lta ba dang / phyag bya ba dang bsnyed bkur bya ba dang / don chen po'i spyod pa dang sngags kyi tshig dang / rgya re gang mad du byung ba'i chos kyi chag ston pa'i bar 'angs pa yin no// 
53b2(rgyud): 'ang ba dpal gzhon dur gyur pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa pa lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ mig mi 'dzum par bcom ldan 'das la lta na zhabs gnyis la ba de/ tshig 'bru 'di dag gis bcom ldan
53b3(rgyud): skyes bu bskyed pa khyod phyag 'tshal// skyes ma chog khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// skye'u ka tse ba khyod phyag 'tshal// spyod pa thams cad don sgrub pa// skyes bu se de khyod phyag 'amal/ 
53b4(rgyud): dpang tshechen po khyod byaga'atshal// ngan 'grothams cad 'deg byed pa// skyes bu da kun myed byug 'tshal// kun nas pasod nams de ldan pa/ skyes bu pa khyod bya// srid gsum/ 
53b5(rgyud): das ni de me dag 'ad// rnam thas byod la galatshal lo// sngag bsnga la lus nam tshul byed// ni ku khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// thams cad ldan pa megs
53b6(rgyud): dad pa din srub byed// bkra shis kyo ma jugs la'o// ga shes kun gyi 'akra shes pa// sangs rgyas kun la khyod byug 'tshal// ches kun rnam par tod mang dag/ chos thams cad kyi bzhin nyi rje
53b7(rgyud): ma dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i pham la ngo par byed pa dang / gnas par byed pa thams cad kyi pa khyod la phyag 'tshal mazhes chog 'bru 'di dag 'arjod pa bston

54b1(rgyud): 'i mdang gtan du grub pa dang bde ba dang / 'thun pa'i mya ngan 'das pa la sems can rnams dgo na pa'i bcom ldan 'das shAH thub par bachen pa grus ni ngo mtshar to// bcom ldan 'das pa mgyis khyab pa/ 
54b2(rgyud): sa bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen par 'gyur gyi/ bdag gis ci zhig 'tshal ba rdo thog/ dbang phyug gis rnam par 'phrul pa 'asam gyi mi lab pa/ rmad du byung ba'i sangs rgya

54b4(rgyud): pa mi nus so// gang yang de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa bsdus pa'am/ tha dad pa ma lus pa'ang ba 'do na chos 'das ma byas su blta bar bya ste/ mthong bas spang bar bya ba
54b5(rgyud): na pa'am/ yon tan ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa kho nas mkhyen pa yin gyi bdag gis ni ma lags so// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi rdzu 'phrul gyi rnam par phrul pas rin po che'i
54b6(rgyud): lapa la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta zhing 'dug go/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thu 'apas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang mi dpal gzhon nur byung ba de'izhin gshegs pa dang rjes su zhun pa

54b8(rgyud): kyis 'angs pa lags na bya la ngag sa'ad mad dpa la ga do gyur pa na legs par 'osas pa/ sems dpa chen pa'i spyod pa sangs rgya mams can kyis byin
55a1(rgyud): kyis brlabs pa bsrub pas byang chub sems da thams cad don thob par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi tshi ga dang gas 'a dang bcas pa dang / dbang bdur ba dang phyag bya dang /  da

55a3(rgyud): po'o// ngadu gyur pa 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da lta shung ba shes par byed pa mdor/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ ra shi yon tan dang 'thun pa'i sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su du

55a6(rgyud): ba 'das sa su shi sangs mas rnams cad kyis kyang gsu s+ya te/ sems can dag pa'i shi zug kyi mdzod/ skye'o la ldan pa dang / skye 'o bong pos den dang / 
55b1(rgyud): chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par thugs mthag tu dag pa'i sems can gyi kyi snang bsag ge bya ma slad du sa'i mang garten no khams kyisangs rgyas kyinang/ 'og min gyi gnas kyi radab
55b2(rgyud): pa'i myal bachen po'i bar du khyab par byas te/ sems can gang sudag shin tu sdug bsngal ba de dag mas da kyi sdug bsngal ru tu zhi bar gyur to// nyan pos dang rangs nga' rgyas thams cad dang byang chub sems dpal/ 
55b3(rgyud): dang sa sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams yang dag par bsngal dag/ 'ad pa 'ang ba de pal gzhon nur gyur pa'i lce 'on nus tu stsa par gyur to// 'dang shang dag shar phyogs na rnam par gnam pa'i sangs
55b4(rgyud): der 'od zer rlung gid kyis khyo kyi na pa'i byabasas sa rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lang dag par sku'o to/ de bzhin go shegs pa da bor gyi zla ba dri snang ba'i dpal zhes bya bo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa sman ci sna
55b5(rgyud): 'od dang / de'i shin gshegs pa dpa la kun tu snang bzhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs brgyam po pong dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pas pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes 'ab dang / 
55b6(rgyud): gshegs pa dbu ma tsam pa yang dag par rdzogs sa rgyas sum ldan 'das 'dus padags ma mad kyi 'dzig rten gyi khams kyi gnas gtsang ba'i 'ang ba zangasan
56a1(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa lhan cig tu byang chub med
56a2(rgyud): dpa'i spyod pa ston pa dang / sngags kyi tshig gi don gyi le'u rab 'byam ston te/ de bzhin du lho dang / nub dang byang gi phyogs dang phyogs 'tshams dang steng dang 'og dang zad ka thams cad

58a8(rgyud): rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i rigs kyi rjes su zhugs pad mtshigasas ma 'dal ning tshig gis la mal 'jig par byed pa/ dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung rgyun mi gcod par
58b1(rgyud): byed pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ gtsug tor dang / mngon par 'phags pa dang / mngon par mtho ba dang / gdugs dkar po dang / 'dab ma mthar yas dang / 'dab ma brgya ba dang / rgyal ba'i gtsun

58b4(rgyud): po dang / 'byung ba'i phung po dang / bden pa'i phung po dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo'i phung po dang / de kho na nyid kyi phung po dang / de dag dang gzhan yang gtsug tor
58b5(rgyud): las pal rab tu zhugs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa rab tu rdzogs par byed pa rgyal ba thams cad kyi snying po dang ldan pa gtsug to kyi rgyal mo bskal pa bye ba khri phrag brgya skyong gi bar du
58b6(rgyud): grangs zhing yang TIg pa mnusas// stobs dang rnam pan pabs sa ma khyab pa'i 'dug nyid kyang bsnyen par mi nus sa// mdo bstan par bya steg dinan cig 'i rgyal mo'i
58b7(rgyud): 'di sa ste mdzod pa dang srin pa dang spyan dang rje ma dang rna ba dang mgrin pa dang // mi 'jig pa dang snying rje dang byabs pa dang / brtse ba dang gas rab dang 'od zer dang pa dang / 
58b8(rgyud): mamed pa dang sgrib pa dang / mchog sbyin thams cad dang de dag dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal mo mtha' yas mu med padang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i su las smos pa dag ni 'de lta ste/ 
59a1(rgyud): gshegs pa'i snod dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzims mal dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i snang ba dang / de bzhin gshe

59a3(rgyud): gshegs pa'i phyag mtshan dang de dag dang gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngags brjod pa rig pa'i rgyal po dang / rgyal mo dang mngag gzhugs pa dang / bran po dang bran mo dang phon
59a4(rgyud): nga pho nya mo dang / gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin ma dang sems can dang / sems can ma yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi khyad par rgyu 'thun pa las byung ba'i/ rgyan gyi tshogs kyi khyad par dang / 
59a5(rgyud): khor brgya stong bye ba khrag khrig dpag tu med pa dang / rig pa'i rgyal po rigs pa'i tshogs thams cad kyi gong nas gong du yongs su gnas pa de dag kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzham
