59a7(rgyud): yod zhag pa dang rta mgrin dkar po dang mgrin pa mtha' yas dang mgrin sngon dang mgrin bzang dang / mgul bzang dang mgul dkar dang / mgul sngon dang 'jig rten mgul pa dang / nAm
59a8(rgyud): par lta ba dang lta ba dang kun du lta ba dang / dbang phyug dang 'od zer stong ldan dang yid dang / yid las byung ba dang / rnam par grags pa'i yi de dang pa
59b1(rgyud): la bsam pa dang dbug 'byin dang rab tu rgod pa dang / skra bzang dang skra bzang mthar byed dang / rgyu skar dang rgya skar gyi rgyal po dang zhi ba dang bskal pa bzang po dang 'dul byed mchog ste/ ded
59b2(rgyud): dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyam po pad ma'i gtsug kyiral sogs pa dang / bsgrub pa mtha' las pa'i chos rje chags kyi mya mthun pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ rig pa'i 'khor bye bstong zlag
59b3(rgyud): dag pa'i rgyal mo du ma dag dang 'jog rten dbang phyug gi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin las byung ba/ 'di sa ste/ sgrom ma dang sgrom ma bzang po dang gang ma 'an ma dang khro mnyer ma dang 'gro ba
59b4(rgyud): las dang 'jig rten 'gro ma dang samam par 'gro ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang dkar ma dang dkar mos dang dkar mo chen mo dang gos dkar po dang / 'jig rten gnas pa dang drim med pa'i
59b5(rgyud): gnas pa dang byang chub kyi yan lag gi gnas pa dang pad mas gnas pa dang / stobs bcul gnas ma dang grags ldan ma dang longs spyod ldan ma dang / yong sa stod cha ldan ma dang lug pa ma dang lun
59b6(rgyud): ma yin pa dang dri med patha sasug dang nanas payang byed pa dang rdzaka rdzun byed ma dang 'byung ba zer byed pa dang / da pa'i kyi ma dang da sa khyod cini ma dang mchod pa
59b7(rgyud): mtha' yas dpal dang / 'jig rten dpal dang rnam par grags pa'i dpal dang 'jig rten pa dang kun tu ma dang / sa sa rgyas yum dang chu bo ma dang shing rta bzang po dang shing rta ldan ma dang kla
59b8(rgyud): 'dul byed pa dang 'dul byed ma dang 'byung ba ldan ma dang / dpal byed ma dang phreng bam dang longs spyod phreng ba ma dang 'akug byed ma dang / rmad byung ma dang 'od ma
60a1(rgyud): ldan ma dang dga' ldan ma dang 'od ldan ma dang dpa' mo dang kun 'gro ma dang zla 'od ma dang zla ba ma dang zla sran ma dang ma bya ba dang / ma bya chen mo dang nor ldan ma dang nor skyen
60a2(rgyud): dang lha ldan ma dang 'jig rten ldan ma dang me chen ma dang / chen mo nyid dang sgra mdzes ma dang dga' bzang ma dang nor sbyin ma dang dpal mo dang dpal ldan ma dang nad mthar byed ma dang nad thams cad
60a3(rgyud): par byed ma dang mnyam med ma dang lha mo dang / grags byed ma dang dbang du byed ma dang myur du byed ma dang bde sbyin ma dang bkra shis ma dang bkra shis byed ma dang / zla ba ma dang zla mdzes ma dang zla
60a4(rgyud): ldan pa dang de dag dang gzhan yang rig pa'i rgyal mo dag la ri khrod ma la mgyo na ma dang mya ngan las skyes ma dang / yid las skyes ma la sogs pa bsgrub pa mtha' yas pas ches kyi dbyings nam

60a7(rgyud): sems can dag pa gang na 'dug pa der phyin par gyur to// phyin nas kyang bcom ldan 'das shAkya klub pa la sa tshad pa'i la lam brtson pa yid kyis gnas par gyur to// de kunas pa na

60b1(rgyud): bo dang rgyal man ba'i rgyal po dang / pho nya chen mo dang bcas pa khyed bdag 'dir 'dus par gyis shig/ dran pa tsas nyid kyi rig pa'i tshogs thams cad 'dus par gyur pa ni 'di lta ste/ rig pa nachog
60b2(rgyud): rig pa bzang po dang grub pa bzang po dang dpung bzang dang / sde bzang dang lha mthar byed dang so bzang dang gang pa bzang po dang rdo rje sde dang / rdo rje mthar byed dang rdo rje byed pa dang rdo rje dpung pa dang rdo rje lag
60b3(rgyud): rtse mo dang rdo rje mche ba dang / dag pa'i rdo rje dang rdo rje baspu dang rdo rje 'khregs pa dang de rjenal dang / rdo rjeg cha dang rdo rje ma grin pa dang rdo rje mtshon ke dang
60b4(rgyud): ba dang / rdo rje rtse mo dang rdo dre ba dang rdo rje rab dang rdo rje mtshon cha dang / rje gcu dang rdo rje meda' dang / de rje lcags mda' da rdo rje mchen pa dang rdo rje lugs sgrog dang / rdo rjes 'og deng dorje 'jig
60b5(rgyud): da spyan dang rdo rje khro mo dang rgyan spyod dang 'byung ba'i nang srod dang / 'ching ba'i nang spyod dang khro bo chen po'i nad spyod dang dbang phyug chen po'i nad spyod dang / lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i nad skye de dang /

60b7(rgyud): ba'i 'phen pa dang / tshal po'i 'phen pa dang stabs dang stobs po che dang ne co dang bung ba dang / b+h+ring ge ri ti dang / khro bo dang khro bo chen po khro ba thams cad dang rga ba med pa dang klu chen po dang
60b8(rgyud): rims dang skem byed dang klum la byed dang dbyug pa dang dbyug sngon dang / dpung rgyan dang lus dmang dang de rjeng byug pa spen dang / sprin chen po dang dus dang dug dang sha ba gu dang nad dang
61a1(rgyud): 'byung po thams cad yang dag par 'khrug par byed pa dang / gzer nad dang gzer nad chen po nyam thag pa dang nyam thag pa chen po dang gshin rje dang / nyi ma'i bu dang rnga

61a3(rgyud): srog 'phrog byed dang srog 'joms byed dang / zhe sdang dang phrag dog dang thabs skor can dang thabs sbyor bzang po can dang / bdud rtsi thabs sbyor can dang mtha' yas thabs sgo
61a4(rgyud): dang thabs s+ho dmar po can dang / lag pa dang lag pa chen po dang khro bo chen po dang ma rungs pa dang sbrul dong 'gro ba'i nad dang mdze dang / rgyal byed shing rta dang 'jigs byed shing rta dang / rnam

61b1(rgyud): 'das phyag na rdo rje gang yang phanya mo rag pa'i rgyal mod dag kyang 'khor ba tu stong du mas 'gror pa yang bang gi chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i rang bzhin sos pa med pa la dmigs nas gnas da
61b2(rgyud): 'dul pa la 'di lnga ste/ thog pag ma dang 'og ga pazang me dang srang chad ma dang rdo rje med bya dang / drod kyem dang dz+hide'i sbyin ma dang du/ rgan ma dang rdo rje'i thal gong pa dang ngo// khrog ter ma dang do na/ 
61b3(rgyud): bam dang / rdo rje yige ma dang rdo rje 'bam dang rdo rje khu tshur ma dang / lcags ma dang / rdo rje ral gri ma dang rdo rje nazhi'i thobam dang ngo

62a2(rgyud): dasags 'byin ldan ma dang gtum ma dang 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa dang / de dag dang gzhan yang pho nya chen po dag dod mo'i tshigs du mas yongs su bskor ba dang 'khor gyi dkyil

62b1(rgyud): saldan ma dang / skra snya ma dang dri bral bzang mo dang gdong drug ma dang dri bral ma dang / 'jig rten grags pa ma dang de dag dang gzhan yang gzungs kyi lha mo brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba dang
62b2(rgyud): dkyil 'khar dar 'dus par gyur to// sangs rgyas mtha' yas byin gyis brlabs pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin gyis brlabs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
62b3(rgyud): kyi sangs rgyas yongs su spangs pa'i rang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bse ru lta bu dang / tshogs na spyod pa rnams sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa ni cang mi gsung ba goms pas chos
62b4(rgyud): yang dag par ston pa yin te/ 'khor ba'i rjes su 'khar bas rtag tu yid stsol/ rgud la snying rje chen po spangs shing sems la bag chags bsgom pa kho na sngon byang chub tu sems skyed pa nyid

63a1(rgyud): dug mdzes dang / dbyangs mdzes dang du mdzes dang mtha' yas mtha' dang / gru mtha' dang tog dkar po dang tog gi phyag mtshan dang tog dang nye ba'i tog dang / rgyal dang 'a
63a2(rgyud): pad ma 'byung ba dang rang 'byung dang / skyes pa dang yid du 'ong ba dang yid las byung dang / dbang chen dang brtsegs pa'i mtshan dang ru rta dang / ma lus spyan dang bde byed dang

63a5(rgyud): khyab pa ga' la du med pa/ smon pa med pa'i chos kyi dbyings nas nam mkha'i ngo bo spros pa med cing / 'dus ma byas pa theg pa 'bring la rab tu zhugs shing lung bstan te rab tu gnas pa/

63a7(rgyud): dang lhan cig pa la 'di lta ste/ 'od srung chen po'i bu dang chu klung 'od srung gi bu dang / skyeng rgyas 'od srung gi bu dang bar dwa dza'i bu dang bar dA / bsod snyoms len dang / mau dgas kyi zung
63a8(rgyud): dgal kyi bu chen po dang / shA ri'i bu dang shA re re'u chen po dang / rab 'byor dang rab 'byor chen po dang / 'alang bdag dang ka dA yAn dang ki dA yan chen po dang / nye bar 'khor bzang po dang
63b1(rgyud): na dang / dga' bo dang kun dka' bo dang / mdzes dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang 'jig rten gyur pa dang batha' las 'jig rten gyur pa dang / snyan pa dang nye ba'i snyan pa dang dka' ldan dang nye ba'i dka' ldan
63b2(rgyud): ma 'gag pa dang gang ba dang yongs su gang ba dang nye ba'i gang ba dang / rgyal dang nam so dang ru ru dang / drag po'i bu dang ru ru'i bu dang bu ru dang lnga chen dang nye ba'i rdza rkyen dang / dus dang dus bzang dang wa 'dzin dang / 
63b3(rgyud): can 'dzin dang ldang sngon dang / nye ba'i ldang sngon dang bsam bya dga' dang / bsam byed dang 'char ba dang nye ba'i 'char ba dang / dpal ldan dang rdzas dang gyad kyi thu dang / nye rdzas dang dus bu ldan dang rgyal
63b4(rgyud): rkyal dang rgyal chen po dang / kun nas rgyal dang 'bod byed dang grags sbyin dang brags lngar dang / nor can dang nye ba'i nor can dang po min nga la 'dun pa dang / pib pal dang kib bal dang nye ba'i 'bras
63b5(rgyud): mthara' yas 'bras bu dang 'bras bu dang bcas pa dang gzhin du dang gzhan nu 'od srung ke'u dang / sa sbyin dang bcu drug pa'i dga' byed dang / nye dka' dang chen po dang lce war dang / 
63b6(rgyud): klas pa dang dbugs 'byin chen pa dang be'u'i za dang / ku ru kul dang nye 'a 'i ku ra kul dang / gro bzhon skyes rna ba bye ba'i ri dang / rgyun gyi pha rol mthar byed dang gang klu'i bu dang de'i rna pa dang
63b7(rgyud): reze ba dang dbyar can dang gzi brjid dang gzi brjid bzang po dang / dpal sras dang 'jig rten sras dang / bla ma sbas drang lhur byed dang skar mal dga' ba dang / zhi byed dang byi ba dang nyeng
63b8(rgyud): bye ba dang se gol nyi shu pa dang / mgon med sbyin dang nye bar gnas dang ldog par gnas dang / sgo byed dang 'ad ldan dang kun du yod dang me to// kad la li dang / legs par rab sad dang nye sar
64a1(rgyud): dang / 'jig rten 'ongs dang sdug bsngal mthar byed dang / skal bzang yod dang skal bzang yod chen po dang don spyod dang / mes po dang 'gro yodo dang rgyal spyod dang / rgyal
64a2(rgyud): dang lul ka shi can dang nye ba'i ka shi can dang / sman chen po can dang gzi brjid chen po can dang / gzi 'arjid chen po dang lha mtshams dang / sgrub byed dang tshogs can dang tshangs pa
64a3(rgyud): bzang po dang / mnyam pa dang mnyam bcas dang de dag dang gzhan yang chos kyi dbyings mtha' yas pa/ rnam par grol ba'i ro'i ro myong ba/ theg pa gsum
64a4(rgyud): las nges par 'byung ba las theg pa chu ngu'i lam thob pa/ 'khor ba las 'jig pa dag dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gyi bsam gtan la brasam gtan pa dang spyod lam bzhir tsha
64a5(rgyud): papa'i gnas bzhi la gnas pa dang ldan zhing legs par mnyam par bzhag pa/ legs par bsnyen pa rdzogs pa theg pa chu ngu'i mya ngang las 'das pa'i dbyings la zhugs shing nges par 'byung ba/ 
64a6(rgyud): mnyam pa nyid spros pa med pa de dag dang yang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcom ldan 'das shAHthub ga/ dkon mchog gsums bcul gnas pa dag dang thathag cig tu bzhugs so// 
64a7(rgyud): chen po nges par 'byung ba'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings la yang dag par rjes su zhugs pa du ma dag 'dus ma byas kyi lam gyi theg pa la dmigs pa dang / dag cing 'dod chags dang bral
64a8(rgyud): ba dang / kun nas snang 'a kun tu thob pa dang / sbyin gnas su byung ba yon tan gyi zhing yon tan skyed par byed cing yongs su sbyong ba dag dang /

70a8(rgyud): 'jigs byad sa dang / mi 'jigs sbyin ma dang rgyal ma dang rnam par rgyal ma dang / nam klu ma dang sgra can ma dang / sgra mthar byed ma dang rlung ma dang yid 'phrog ma dang / yid ldan ma dang me to
70b1(rgyud): ldan ma dang / me tog gi grong khyer la gnas ma dang / sa skya ba dang 'phrogs dang dpal ldan ma dang dpa' mo dang / dpa' bzang mo dang shin du mi bzang ma dang / mi bzang ldan ma dang wa mdzes ma dang ro bzang ma
70b2(rgyud): dang gsang 'drar ba ma dang shing la mu la gnas ma dang / mya ngan med ma dang mun par mdzes ma dang sdang bar mdzes ma dang 'od ldan ma dang ldag par ldan ma dang / gzugs mdzes ma dang dkar med ma dang
70b3(rgyud): ni'am dang phyogs 'tshams ma dang sdug ma dang dga' byed ma dang nye ba'i dka' byed ma dang / 'jig rten las 'das ma ste/ gnod sbyin mo chen mo 'di dag gnod sbyin mo brgya stong phrag du ma'i 'khor dang
70b4(rgyud): zin pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to// gang yang sha za mo dgaka sha zo mo 'am spyong brag du ma'i 'khor dang
70b5(rgyud): pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen 'od rgyang ring po nyid nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/ sdud ma dang phyag dar khrod kyi sha za mo dang / sha za mo grag ce
70b6(rgyud): dang sha za mo dkar mda' dang sha za mo 'bar ma dang thal ba zam dang sha za ma dang / dug ma dang bung bam dang rmongs byed ma dang bsdig mdzub ma dang / dmar ldan ma dang glang dmar ma dang 'jig rten teg na
70b7(rgyud): ma dang thal bar nye gnas dang shing ngi lu dang ldan ma dang / mdo ldan ma dang mang ma dang gdul dka' ma dang / el ma dang mtshon byed ma dang du ba la gnas ma dang du ba ma ste/ 
70b8(rgyud): sha za mo'i 'khod bye ba brgya stong phrag dum dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor byed kyil 'khor chen po der 'dus shing rag tu zhugs par gyur to// gang yang ma mo dang ma mi chen po// 'jig rten gyi
71a1(rgyud): rnam par spyod cing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing / gtor ma dang me tog sman ma la spyod par byed pa dag la 'di lta ste/ tshangs pa ma dang dbang phyug chen ro ma dang
71a2(rgyud): 'jug ma dang kAzhon nus dang rgan byad ma dang / phag mo dang dbang po dang ga shin rngo mo dang me phyogs ma dang nye nga'i bri ma dang 'jig rten mthar byed ma dang chu l+h+wam dang da'ang ldan ma dang / rlung phyogs
71a3(rgyud): ma dang gzhan gyi srog phrog pa dang migo bregs pa dang bya ba dang bya ma chen mo dang / srul mo dang lus srul mo dang skem byed ma ste/ ma mo chen mo de dag kyang mtho'i 'khor bye ba khri phrag
71a4(rgyud): du ma dang bcas pa de dag kyang 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po der sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i tshig 'don cing 'khod par gyur to// de bzhin du mi dang mi ma yin pa bye ba khyi phrag
71a5(rgyud): brgya stong du ma dang / sems can dang sems can ma yin pa nas dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du thams cad kyang skabs 'dir nam mkha'i dkyil du snang bar gyur to// se
71a6(rgyud): dmyi ris ni srog chags su la yang 'an tshur mi mthun pa med par gyur to// yangs kyis kyi byin gyis brlab dang byang chub sems dpa'i tshe 'phrul gyi rgyan gyis sangs kyis bcom ldan 'das dang
71a7(rgyud): dab dang na su gyur pa sems can 'ams kyid kyi skye na ga bzugs paras pa 'gyur to// denas bcob ldan 'das shAH shrI'i pas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten
71a8(rgyud): khams su sangs rgyas kyi spyan rjen ma par gzigs nas 'dzam dpal gzhon nur gyur ba la bka' stsal pa/ dag pa'i sems dpa' sngags kyi spyod pa'i don rnam par gtan la dpa' ba dang ting
71b1(rgyud): 'dzin gyi'i ru rab 'dum byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod gang 'di bshad pa'i dus la ba' par sems na thod cig// de nas 'ang sa dpal gzhon nur gyur pa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas rjes sugs
71b2(rgyud): ba dad pa na/ nam mApa'i ngo bo dang 'dra'i rdo rje thug cing sra ba'i rgyud bkod pa'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa de snyoms par zhugs
71b3(rgyud): gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang de dpag tshad brgya stong du mtsho che ba'i rdo rje'i rang bzhin du lhag par gnas par gyur te/ gang du gnod sbyin dang srin po dang dri za dang rlung lha dang sha ra de dkar
71b4(rgyud): dan sems can gyi khams thams cad byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis gzhal med 'ang de dag rdo rje'i nor bu rin po che lta bur sbyor te/ der rab tu zhugs nas pa dpar gyur kyang
71b5(rgyud): 'chi bar byed pa med do// de nas 'ang thodapal gzhon du gyur pas po 'o kyil la khyor rten po der 'dus par gyur bar shes na sa dra ba'i rgyal po ga shin rdeg sred la smras pa
71b6(rgyud): posangs rgyaso dang byang chums dpa' thams cad ci 'i sa par 'byung bar byed pa/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dus pa'i de'i sems can thams cad bsrung shig bsrung shig/ 
71b7(rgyud): rungs pa gdus par gyis shig sems can na bdag sad par gyis shig// sems can thams cad dad par gyis shog/ ci srid du nga'i rang gi sngags kyi spyod pa rjes su bsgrub pa/ bya
71b8(rgyud): sod rgya che ba dag las sngags sod paro dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga 'chad par byed pa de srid kyi bar du 'di dag gi phyi rol du song la bsrung ba kyis shig/ de skad ces smras pa dang
72a1(rgyud): rgyal po chen pos bka' mnyan nas// zla ba chen po'i gzugs kyis sems can thams cad rjes su bsrung ba dang rjes su bstan pa'i phyir/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
72a2(rgyud): khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed khro bo'i 'khor brgya stong phrag du ma phyogs pani kun dang skyed dang 'og dang d+ha kudag tu shin du mi bzad pa'i sgra rab du 'don cang gnas par gyur to// de nas sems can
72a3(rgyud): dag zhi ba dang yid dang sems bzang po dang ldan par gyur te bka' las mi 'da' bar byed par gyur to// 'du lta bu'i sgra yang thos par gyur te/ gang dam tshig 'di las 'da' bar byed pa de dag
72a4(rgyud): dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal ba brgyar 'gas par 'gyur te/ de ni byang chub sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs kyang de yin no// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas rang gi snga
72a5(rgyud): kyi skying ba'i don du chos kyi tshig smras pa/ chos gcig la yang dag par bsam pa na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gcig blo gang zhen 'di/ 
72a6(rgyud): chos thams cad spros pa med pa'i rnam par rjes su mthong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gnyis pa rab tu gnas ni sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ gnyis tho ga
72a7(rgyud): chub kyi sems mi gtong ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad la sems mnyam pa'o// chos gsupa dang ldan na sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te// gsum po gang zhen
72a8(rgyud): sems can thams cad yongs su ma gtong ba nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims kyi sdom pa bsrung ba dang / rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid do// chos bzhi dang yang
72b1(rgyud): bar ldan na dang po sems skyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur te/ ban po gang zhe na/ rang gi sngags yongs su mi gtong ba nyid dang / gzhan gyi sngags rjes du srid pa med pa
72b2(rgyud): sems can thams cad la byams pas gnas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen pos yongs su bsgos pa'i sems dang nyid do// chos yin po 'di dgu ldan skyed pa byang chub sa
72b3(rgyud): dpa'i sngags 'grub par 'gyur ro// chos lnga dang ldan na byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod la 'jug cing sngags kyi spyod pa bsgrub pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur te/ lnga po gang zhe na/ rnam par dben
72b4(rgyud): phyogs yang dag par bsten pa nyid dang bas mtha' dgon pa bsten par byed pa nyid dang / sems can gzhan la ne sdang med pa nyid dang / 'jig rten pa'i sngags la mi lta ba nyid dang / tshul khrims
72b5(rgyud): pa dang spyod pa la gnas par byed pa nyid de chos lnga po 'di dag na ldan na sngags spyod pa'i don 'grub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos drug dang ldan na ljags kyi spyod pa 'grub cing
72b6(rgyud): rdzogs por 'gyur te/ drug pa gang zhe na/ dkon mchog gsum la du brjes su mi gcod pa nyid dang byang chub sems dpa' la dad pa rjes su mi ga nad pa nyid dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig te
72b7(rgyud): las 'das pa'i sngags la kun du dga' ba nyid dang / chos kyi dbyings zlos pa med pa la ldab nyid dang / theg pa chen po'i mdo sde zab pa'i tshig gi don mi spong zhing skyo ba med pa'i sems nyid dang
72b8(rgyud): sngags kyi spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang / dge ba'i phyogs yongs su mi gtong ba nyid de/ chos drug po 'di dag dang ldan ni rig pa'i spyod pa dang sngags 'grub cing yang dag par sgrub
73a1(rgyud): du 'gyur ro// chos bdun dang ldan na ga bsgrub pa'i dus kyi thabs thob par 'gyur zhing / sngags kyi spyod pa la rjes su spyod pa nyid du 'gyur te/ bdun po gang zhe na theg pa
73a2(rgyud): zab po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid bsgom pa dang klog pa dang ston pa dang 'don du 'jug pa dang 'dra ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa lams pa nyid dang / dus dang phyogs dang nges
73a3(rgyud): par sdom pa dang bzlas pa dang sbyin bsreg dang / mi slu ba dang dka' thub la gzhol ba nyid dang rtogs pa dang / blo dang dran pa dang shes rab dang brtan pa la bsnyen
73a4(rgyud): dang / theg pa chen po dang zab mo'i chos kyi tshul la yang dag par rab tu zhugs pa nyid dang rang dga'i sngags dkrug pa'i bya ba la mkhas pa nyid dang / snying rje chen po dang byabs pa chen po dang bta
73a5(rgyud): mas chen po dang / dga' ba chen po nyid yongs su bsgom pa nyid dang sres pa med pa'i sems can gyi 'angs kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa gnyis su med pa'i ngo bo'i thams cad// 
73a6(rgyud): mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba nyid dang / sems can thams cad yongs su me gtong ba dang theg pa dben pa la dga' ba med pa nyid de/ chos bdun po de dag gis de rig pa dang sngags
73a7(rgyud): / bgrub cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro// chos btad dang ldanan reg pa dang sngags kyi yod pa'i don 'grub cing lam du 'gro bar 'gyur te/ brgyad gang zhen 'anong ba dngas mni
73a8(rgyud): 'bras bu dag pa la lta ba dang sems par 'dod pa nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'bras bu dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa nyid la the tshom med cing dad pa nyid dang / phyin/ 
73b1(rgyud): cim lag pa'i sngags gzung ba dang bla ma la gus pa nyid dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyi sngags dang / rgyud dang spyod pa bstan pa mi srub bzung zhing bdog pa thams cad yongs su
73b2(rgyud): tong ba nyid dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rmi lam nas mthong ba rab tu ston pa la mkhas pa nyid dang / ser sde dang gnyid dang rmugs pa mtha' dag dang bral bar byed cing
73b3(rgyud): rtson 'grus rtsom la/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid 'bul bar byed pa nyid dang / mdor sngun dge ba'i rtsa bas chog mi shes shing go cha chen po bgos pa dang / bgegs
73b4(rgyud): darab tu sel bar 'dod pa nyid de/ byang chub kyi snying po gnon pa dang longs spyod chen po dang / dbang che bar grags par bdag nyid 'dod pa nyid dang / dbang che bar grags pa'i gang zag la bskye
73b5(rgyud): dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang mi 'bral bar bya ba dang / byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la nye bar gnas pa nyid de/ chos dpo 'di dag dang ldan na sngags spyod
73b6(rgyud): na 'grub pa'i yang dag pa'i lam du 'gyur ro// grog po dag mdor na byang chub kyi sems dang mi 'bral pa dang / dkon mchog gsum la da pa dang mchog tu sdug bsngal zhing tshul khrims nyams pa
73b7(rgyud): yang mi skyo ba'i yid kyis rtag tu mngon par brtson pa la/ nga'i sngags kyi le'u rab 'byam mtha' yas shing mang du byung ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyu 'dzin par yid las byung ba 'grub
73b8(rgyud): ra'agyur te de las gzhan du shes par byang ba yin no// rnam par rtog pa med pa'i yid du byas ngas nyams dpa'i phyir yang bsgrub par bya ba yin no// de nas thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'a

75a2(rgyud): gshegs su gsol ba dang / na ba dang rgyas pa dang / mngon sung dang mi sdang ba dang / nams mkha' la 'gro ba dang / sa 'o tu 'jug pa dang / tshul me rub par 'gro ba dang dkrug pa dang / nub par dbya ba da
75a3(rgyud): dbang du byed pa dang / dri thams cad dang 'phreng ba dang / mar me dag kyang rang gi rgyud kyi sngags kyis sbyin par byed de/ mdon du ce lta ci ltar skur ba de b+hA da ltar sgrub par byed pa ni yi ge ga

75a6(rgyud): lag pa g.yas pa bteg ste/ khro bo'i spyi bor bzhag pa byas so// 'di skad du yang smras te/ sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dgongs sug
75a7(rgyud): gang su dag phyogs kra'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rnam par gnas shing mtha' yas mi med pa'i rnga 'phrul dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang tsigs lhag par gnas par gyis
75a8(rgyud): daskad ces sbas nas/ khro bo'i rgyal pa la lag pa bsar nas btang bar gyur to// khraba'i rgyal po chen po btang ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dag tu song nas/ skad
75b1(rgyud): tsam gyis gang dag sdang ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa'i sems can rdzu 'phrul cha ba dag tshar bcad cing der bkug par gyur nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor chen po gnas gtsang pa'i gzhal med khang der
75b2(rgyud): dag par 'azug ste/ gnas de lta ba bzhin du gnas par byas nas sems can ma rungs pa dgal yang kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i rdzogs su byas shing / skye ba la yang dag par gnas par byas so// des

75b7(rgyud): de ni las thams cad byed cing shes pa yin te/ oM ba rgya na dmaH'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug pad gsam zhes bya ba yin te/ longs spyod thams cad mngon par 'phel bar byed pa'o// 'di
75b8(rgyud): par 'gyur ba ni/ thAHhUM/ 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni gtsug phud gsum pa zhes grags pa yin te/ sems can thams cad 'jug par byed pa yin no// 'der skyeng po ma chog tu 'gyur ba rna
76a1(rgyud): phyag car 'gyur ba ni ma bya'i gdan zhes bya bar bstan pa yin te/ sems can thams cad dbang du byed pa'o// gzhan yang phyag tha thams cad kyi steng ba dpa' tha chen po nas bya
76a2(rgyud): tshige brgyad yod / dpal mchog du byed gdag byed na ba srid pa gsum kyi ma mnye bar gcod par byed pa/ ngan 'gro thams cad zlog par byed ga zhi ba thams cad byed ga las thams cad
76a3(rgyud): dadalas 'das pa'i bdas thob par byed pa/ sa kyis mngon sum du mang ba bzhin dun par gnas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpas gzhon dang srung pa nyid bzhin du
76a4(rgyud): mas can thams cad kyi don gyi phyir/ mchog tu gsang ba'i ngo bos nye bar gnas pa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ gang du dran pa tsam gyis mtshams med pa lnga la yongs su spyod
76a5(rgyud): dad bzlas pal/ spos kyang ci dgos// dayang gang zhen/ oM a bI hUM/ 68/ grogs po dag 'din ma ni brgyad pa dpa' bo chen po zhes bya ba/ gsang ba'i snying po'i bdag nyid
76a6(rgyud): sangs rgyas nyid bzhin du rab tu nye bar gnas pa yin no// mdor na bye ba sems cad la yon tan gyi mtha' rgya chen po brjod par ni bskal pa bye gaN+DI phrag brgya stong du mar yang mi nus
76a7(rgyud): yang skabs patsarnas par rnam grags pa ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'o// sman drang ba'i sngags ni/ oM hi haM kum+ba ra bi shA rA byai T+Te/ sas thal d+hi/  ta pra bo d+hA naH
76a8(rgyud): na iH te bu ma gyi ru rnas d+ha ma a d+h+ya tiHtiSh+Tha sa ma las du s+phar a rba ta ta ta thA mon da ng+ge/ mthil pa ku rba swa / 'di 'i bcom ldan 'das 'dzes dpal kyi spyan drang
76b1(rgyud): sngags so// sangs rgyas thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'alags pa nyan thos dang / lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang dri za dang lha ma yin dang / 
76b2(rgyud): dam mkha' ldeng dang mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang sha za dang / srin po dang 'byung po thams cad kyi 'ang yin no// tsan dan gyi chur byas te/ lan bdun sngags nas/ phyags bzhi dang sbrang dang
76b3(rgyud): gyur pa rang nyid 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad dang / 
76b4(rgyud): sngags dang de sanan du 'byung po'i tshogs dang sems can thams cad 'gugs par 'gyur ro// na sa la bran nAM/ a r+tha te ha hA bA sa nA nA~M/ oMng+ga d+ha d+hu drus na n-i/ da mar ci ni hrI teSh+Thas
76b5(rgyud): smar swA hA/ bdug pa'i sngags so// tsan dan dang ga bur dang gur gum gcig tu byas te/ bdug pas bdugs na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / lems
76b6(rgyud): na thams cad bdug pas tsham zhing dgyes nas bzhugs par 'gyur ro// 'dir phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni pad ma'i phreng ba zhes grags pa// thams cad bkug byed zhi ba yen// spyan drang nga la sngags
76b7(rgyud): yang // pad ma'i phreng ba bzang po zhes// bya ba'i phyag rgya 'di nyid do// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / sems can thams cad byon pa la mchod yon dbul ba
76b8(rgyud): steka 'ur dang tsan dan dang kur gum ku dang sbar nas/ me tog ku pu dang na'i ka dang / dbyar gyi me tog dang ma tog pun naka dang me tog pa kul dang / ma tog pin Te ta ga ru 'ad dag gang
77a1(rgyud): yang rung ba'i mata/ sh+tsa sa ma matag dro'im po badz+ra/ ste/ sngags 'dis mchod pon bul bar bya'o// na kA zlan nA~M/ u prat+tiHtita ta nA sad+ha/ ta
77a2(rgyud): ba zhes bya bar grags pa sems can thams cad dang rjes su 'thun zhing brten po'o// ba dir yang dri'i sngags su 'gyur ba ni/ na maHsa bdu bad+yA nA~M/ na maHsa ma hA gan+d+ha a ba b+hA sa shrI yA ya/ ta thA ga tA / 
77a3(rgyud): thA gar+b+ha ga n+te gan+d+ha de/ gan man k+She paN+Di ts+tsha dz+ra d+hir+ya gi gan+d+he na tAnA tsA Ni swAhA/ 'di phyag rgyar 'gyur ban mo mnas bya bar reb thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byesas// 'di bas ta/ 9
77a4(rgyud): 'di nyid dang gong du bstan pa'i bdug pas bdug par bya'o// sa ni mad 'byung bas sa la khyab// sangs rgyas thams cad phyag 'tshal te// rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa yi// gtar ma'i sngags 'di bshad
77a5(rgyud): bar bya// na maHsarba bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra te ha ta shA sanA nAM/ tad+ya thA ha ha b+ha ga bAn ma hA satwa sanA lo ki te i maM ba liM gr-ih+NA pa la krih+NA pa ya hUM hUM/ sarba bi shwa ra ra Ta Ta swA hA/ 'dis pashes dbul bar bya ste/ 
77a6(rgyud): 'byung ba thams cad kyi gtor ma yang bya'o// 'dar yang byen byar 'gyur ba ni// mdung zhes bya ba ma rungs pa// thams cad bzlog par byed pa'o// namams larba prad+d+hA nA~M/ a pra he ha ta thA sa nan/ 
77b1(rgyud): sa twa man d+ha k+Sha ga d+hasan+da/ na arba n+ya tinan tanathus d+hA nA la/ ta thAn thA ga/ tad+yan teH thA ga wAn/ d+ha ti TI gtam ta mra pa tinan+ta ta na nI ra bi kuR+sha bi kud+ha ma hA ba d+he satrA sa man+ta dz+nyAH
77b2(rgyud): sur te zad kri rje ma pa~M l-i ki sa a ba la ga so mAn mos kyis dz+nyAn \u0f7f swAH/ ser mo'i sogs kyi 'dis meng med la bar bya'o// bye ba zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya ni/ sems can gan gyis mthong ba'o// 
77b3(rgyud): namaHsa san+ta bud+d+hA na/ a pra tI ha ta thA sanA nAM/ tad+yathA dz+wal dril dz+wa lI la drA mA ma tsA bi b+ho ka ta ky-i bi gas swA hA/ ma'i bya ba byed pa'i sngags so// 'di yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni// sems can ku
77b4(rgyud): la 'od gsal byed// kha sbyar zhes byar 'jig rten grags// byang chub sems dpa' blo ldan gyis// thub pa mchog gi sngan bshad pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas byang chub sems dpa' phyags
77b5(rgyud): rdo rje la smras pa gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi tshig 'di ni gsang ba dang bcas shing mchog tu gsang par bya ba yin te/ khyed bu 'jig rten rnams grags pa'i// me bzad pa ni gang yin pa// sngags rnams da
77b6(rgyud): thams cad kyis// mkhas pa rnams kyis bsgrubs paste// spyi bo'i gdu bu zhes grags pa// rdo rje bdama'i rigs kyang yin// da ni dam par gzhig bya phyir// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// na mams ma
77b7(rgyud): bud+ha nA~M/ ga pra te ha ta thA sa nA naM/ oM ka kara~M/ ga kA rums kAts+tsha trA~MSh+Thab+h+yany+dzasarba bi g+h+nAn had tA san badz+ra bi m+b+ha la kas/ rbar d+haka Ta dzAM bi t+t+ra dA kar mo tA bi kr-i ta ra pra d+hA na ri Ni/ rba pa ces mdu 'a rnam hA/ 
77b8(rgyud): gne pa ti dwe bi dAn ta kar ban+d+ha ban tu sa ba \u0f89\u0fa4 tA na// nga ru mu ga/ Ta b+hu dza//  rba tse gaN ru dri mA na pa khiny+tsa mA na la prad+yA d+ya ba nA na pa/ sgrub la ba la tshul bu baN+Da la ma d+hi pra ba sha ya sa ma pa ma ru slar
78a1(rgyud): d+hU hUM swa Ta swaTarba swA hA/ gsang ba'i bdag po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon dur gyur pa'i mchog tu gsang ba'i sngags chen po gdong drug pa zhes bya ba yin/ khro ba'i rgyal po bgags thams
78a2(rgyud): cad 'jigs par byed pa sa/ 'di 'arjod pa tsam gyis sa bcu'i dbang la gnas pa'i byang rgya bamams dpa' yang 'dreg par byed pa yin na/ 'dreg sa ma rungs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos// 'dri brjod pa tsam
78a3(rgyud): dkyis bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// 'dir yang phyag rgyar 'gyur ba ni/ nag po chen po zhes bya ba'i// bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig byed pa'o// 'di nyid kyi khro bo'i rgyal po'i snying pa ni/ oM hrI
78a4(rgyud): \u0f7fbi kri hA na na hUM sarba sha druM nA sha ya ste b+hal la Ta dz+ra swA hA/ sngags bde brjod pas dgra thams cad zug gzong chen po dang / nad chen po dang nyin bzhi pa'i rims kyis thebs par 'gyur ro// rtag tu dga' ba
78a5(rgyud): pi dang // byabs pa med pa'am/ snying rje'i sems thob par mi 'gyur te/ bzlas pa zin gyi bar du grol par mi 'thur zhing 'chi bar 'gyur ro// dkon mchog gsung la gnod pa byed pa dag la bya yi// ni ba'i
78a6(rgyud): bya bar byam/  de byed par 'gyu /  tshan langs rgyas tham sa kyi 'i ba po/ 
78a7(rgyud): thams cad byed pa'o// phyag rgya yang ci gsum chen po zhes phye bar sbyar bar bya'o// phung khros thams cad klog par byed pa/ 'byung po thams cad dbang du byed pa/ mdo madri ba'i rgyal po 'di ni
78b1(rgyud): pas thams cad la sbyar babyo'o// dkyi 'khod kyi dbus su 'azlab pa byas nakar pa'i rub kya dbang gu'aphags par 'gyur ro// 'di ran shegs su gsor ba'i sngags 'gyur ba ni/ namaHsa rbabu
78b2(rgyud): t+naSh+Tar+b+banA~M/ 6 sa dzas sad+hAH/ 'i dpas pa ma / sa ma la sas pa ldan+ta pa me med ta nam
78b3(rgyud): hUM/ 'di ni gshegs su gsol ba sngags te/ las thams cad la sbyar bang bya'o// phyag rgya de bzang po'i gdan zhes bya ba yin te/ 'dis gdan la yed sbyar bar bya'o// 
78b4(rgyud): klas pa bdun byas te gshegs su gsol lo// 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang sngags dang sngags grub pa dag dang / ram chig dang / bzlas pa dang / dus dang nges par sdom
78b5(rgyud): dag la yang sbyar bar bya'o/ de dasa'ang sa dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gnas gtsang pa'i gzhal med khang la yang bltas te/ 'jar byed kyil 'khor chen po dang / rang gi reg pa tshogs kyi sngags kyi re'u rab 'byam smras so/

78b8(rgyud): las la sbyang bar bya'o// na macas san+ta pra d+d+he d+hi/ arba tita tan d+hI na/ mni/  ga da dam tshan zhes bya ste/ sa mams cad byed cing dge ba'o// phyag rgya mazang po'i gdan nis bya ba dang ldan pa/ 
79a1(rgyud): gnod sbyin mo nges par dgug par bya'o// na maH'am d+ha bud+d+hA nAM/ a tsin tung pU ta rA pI NAM/ oM tI sh+tsi swA hA/ phyag rgya mdung ni bsdam pa yis// mkha' 'gro ma rnams 'joms par
79a2(rgyud): sangs rgyas dag ni thams cad kyis// thams cad gzugs can rab bsngags pa// rig pa zad can zhes bya ba// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa yin// na maHsa man+ta dud+d+hA nAM/ a pra ti haH
79a3(rgyud): d+hI/ tad+ya thA/ oM ba ra de swA hA/ phyag rgya gtsug phud gsum nyid ni// dpal sbyin byed pas sbyar bar bya// gzugs ma 'chang ba lta mo ni// rgyur du longs spyod sgrub byed pa'o// na maHsa man+ta badz+ra rA/ 
79a4(rgyud): na tud b+hU ta ru b+hi NAM/ a b+hu ru mA hA/ phyag rgya mdung rtsi yang dag sbyar// rims nad thams cad nam 'jig yin// na maHsa man+ta prad+d+hA nAM/ a tsin tud b+hU ti rU pI NAM/ e tA re swA hA/ rag
79a5(rgyud): na zhes byab// las rnams kun la rab tu sngags// phyag rgya mdu dang ldan pa yis// bgegs ni 'joms par byed pa yin// na maHsa man+ta bAd+ha naM/ a tsan tud shrat+ta d+hA nI / tad+ya thA ci
79a6(rgyud): swAH/ rig pa snang ldan zhes bya ba// 'jig rten thams cad dbang du byed// bde ba thams cad sbyin byed pa// gdong gi phyag rgya sbyar bar bya// na maHsa shan bud+d+hA nAM/ oM tsin ta dra Sh+TA ta
79a7(rgyud): / oM be n+de bai n+de ni nywa be bi bArA rI NI ka hwAkaha A be+e shA de thA sa la ma nu slar du ru hrIhrI/ reg pa chen po stobs tshan 'di/ 'a ga tan 'dres pas bsten pa ste/ 
79a8(rgyud): byas na// sems can thams cad 'ba'i sa shing dgi// 'byung ba bu la mchog sbyin gag khams cad kyimani yang dag bslags// na bcas ya d+hA rmA/ atsane tad Sh+ya rAd+ha nA~M/ oM gr-i ha shrI ba TasnaH
79b1(rgyud): bya gad kye phyag rgya shes// nab dgod las ni tham ya byed// dkar mtshan po zhes bya ba// rbad blang bsas med gzugs can te// 'jig rten rnams kyi zhal lnga dbyed// skyes pa bud med dbang du
79b2(rgyud): tad+ya thA/ i khai Shi ri khi ri b+ha gu risaHsha truM sta~M b+ha ya dzam b+ha ba yo ha ya ba shA mA na ya swA hA/ rig pa 'din reg chen po// rnal 'byor pa shes rab tu bstan/ 
79b3(rgyud): rgya gdong gsum sbyor byas na// me rungs sems can 'dul bar byed// na maHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nA~M/ a pra ti ha ta shA b+hi ti pra tsa ri NAM/ tad+ya thA oM shrIHrig pa 'di ni dpal chen mo// 'jig rten mgon gyis bstan
79b4(rgyud): phyag rgya la sbyar sgor byas na// rgyal sred chen po sbyin byed pa'o// na maHsa man bud+d+hA ni/ senas twa b+hA la pra de mi nA~M/ oM a dza~M ta ku mA ra drA bI d+hI e he A ga nA ma pa kAR+Sha ku ru swA hA// rgyal byed ma ma rna
79b5(rgyud): gas pa// gzhon du bdud rnalas byung ba// rdzogs pa'i phyag rgya ldan pa yis// de tha rnams thams cad zlog par byed// nams man bred+ha nAM/ a tsin t+yed+ya thA ta rA b+hin+te/ tad+yanaM/ oM dza ye+e swA hA/ 
79b6(rgyud): hAhA/ sring mo bzhi zhes rnam grags pa// byang chub sems dpa' rjes 'gro ga// sa rnams thams cad kun 'gro ni de// kun la rjes su 'dzin byed dpa'// ring po gtum bu
79b7(rgyud): / 'di dang sen rjes su 'brang // bu 'i 'azhon pa la zhan nas// sa mtshol de gnas pa yin// wanar phye rgya 'a dzes pa gyis// bsag pa thams cad yangs rdzogs byed// rnamams sa thad+hA rI/ 
79b8(rgyud): d+ya bu mA ma sumar keDa the na/ shan yul 'dres tA r+ra dzA ta/ ma mu rAsan// N+Di ta ny+dza/ rtswa gar b+ha gan d+ha ru le ban zi ga/ las thA he ge sbyin gyi neH/ 
80a1(rgyud): mam la sa rba swar thA ma d+ham thAm la rnam pa/ A r+thalA drA mA bi ma bas rbany+dzaR+sha Nam bu ra badz+ra/ dz+nyArba rU pa d+hA ri NAM/ tiH tiSh+ThaSh+kaMs maprad+hA nA d+han taswAH/ slob pa byang chub sebs
80a2(rgyud): de/ 'jab pa'i dbyangs kyis bshad pa na// sa rnams ma lus rnam drug tu// kun nas yongs su rab tu g.yos// sems can kun gyi den phyir dwe// ma rungasasems can nag pa'i phyir// mi bzad dab
80a3(rgyud): zugs su// gdul ba'i don du 'dir ston te// skems byed dang ni mig dmar gyi// phyugab mtshan gyis ni mtshon pa ste// snying rjes thugs ni brlan pa yis// 'jam pa'i dag gis gsungs pa yin/ 
80a4(rgyud): mas dpa'i nang na bdag nyid che// byis pa rnams la phan byed gang // sems can spyod phyir brtson pa ni// 'gro ba kun la rnam par spyod// phyag rgya mdung dang ldan pa yis// bdag nyid chen po
80a5(rgyud): ngan ni// tshangs pa sogs pa'ang 'gugs byed na// mi rnams la ni smos ci dgos// gzhan nu' sems su mtha' dag ni// bsdus nas yongs su bshad par bya// smin drug bu dang 'jam dang
80a6(rgyud): kyis// sngags su 'di ni yang dag bstan// sems can rjes su gzungs pa'i byer// byang chub sems dpa' 'ang ston to// leg gsu sa zhes bya'i snying po ni// 'del sngags su brjod pa yiH//

80a8(rgyud): na byed do// na ma badz+nyAn/ ma d+hi tatam+ba rna na/ 'di ci// de nan phyag rgya mdu ldadapag// byung bathams chod 'azugs kyi/ 
80b1(rgyud): gza' dang mchor bcas// phyag rgya kun gyis phyag rgyal// bkod na 'bras bur bcas par 'gyur// 'byung po rnams ni dngas byed cing // ma rungs 'jug pa zlog par byed// 'jam dpal gnos
80b2(rgyud): rur gyur pa 'di'i gdong drug gi bu zhes bya ba'i 'jam dpal gnon nur rjes su 'brang ba ste// las thams cad byed pa'i ste/ bzlas pa tsam kho nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// 'byung ba
80b3(rgyud): thams cad dang ngas par byed pa dang / skrag par byed pa dang / 'gug par byed pa dang / dbang du byed pa dang skem par byed pa dang / 'jigs par byed pa dang rig pa 'dzin pa ji ltar 'dod pa de thams cad
80b4(rgyud): 'bar byed pa'o// na miHsa sar+b+ba prad+d+hA nA~M/ a mr-i ti ta ta shA sa nA na~M/ tad+ha rmA/ oM prah+ma brangam par tsas shAn ti gu du swA hA/ sngags 'di tshangs pa chen po ste byang chub sems dpas bshad pa yin
80b5(rgyud): so zhing kyar rab tu thob// skad cig nyid la bsil bar gyur// phyag rgyo ga tsug phud lnga sbyar na// myur du dge lags dza' bar 'gyur// 'don snod dag ni thams cad la// srid krung gi ni rig byed 'dod//

81a1(rgyud): / sa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/ a pra te ha ta shA sa nA nAM/ tad+ya thA/ yo ma hA ma te shwa ra thA hA dzI ba ta pri Sha b+hA pra yaM ba dza nA dza ru mu ku rba d+hA ri Ne/ pid ta b+hasma d+ha sa ri ta kAti hUM paT phaT bo d+hi satwa ar+d+ha

81a4(rgyud): bA kun bi d+hU thA kun bdam bi d+yA ta pak+Sha sa rba ba nA gan thA ga/ ga ga k+Sha hi k+Sha hi sa ma la ma nu sma ra dzA tiSh+Tha bo d+hi satra Adz+nyA ba ya ti swAhA/ sngags 'di'i mthun chen pa ste// nam mkha' rje nas nam pa
81a5(rgyud): gis// gdul dka' 'dul byed rnams kyi mchog/ gdengs ka can gyi dug rnams 'joms// phyag rgya che dang sbyar byas na// phung khrol shin du mi bzad 'joms// gnas dang 'gro ba'i dug dag ni
81a6(rgyud): so par byed la 'i tshim ma // khams can gdul ba'i 'dusas te/ nga lams dpa'i yang dag pa/ rnam ma lding gzugs sa la spyod// 'dab chags dbang ba 'di chen san/ 
81a7(rgyud): nam mkha' ldeng rgyud du// chog rgya cher bstan de dag/ sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir// thams cad nga yis bstan pa ste// byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha' lding // gdul ba'i don du 'di
81a8(rgyud): / das can donani gnas bya'i phyi/ 'das ga yul gyimi nam par bya// 'ong tan grags ni sred pa// tshig 'a ni brtan pa na// sems can gdus bye don du ni// de
81b1(rgyud): pa tu// gang gang de bani gshegs sngags dang // darnga ba dam rigs dan byung // pa'is cho gar 'a 'byab dang // mdodag kyang ni bstan pa yin// de ltar ma po mang pon// 'bad bapa byis par sna
81b2(rgyud): // de bzhin byis pa'i blo can la// sngags kyi tshul gyis ngayis 'ashad// sngon ni stobs bcu ldan pas bstan// da ni khri bstan pa yin// sngags rgyud don nam lus pa// 'od chen gzhon nus bstan pa 'i
81b3(rgyud): la ba mchog gis gang gsungs dang // stobs bcu ldan pa'i sras gsungs dang // rmad byung bsam mi khyab tshul gyis// 'jam dbyangs kyis gsungs de dag go// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas
81b4(rgyud): mas na ldan pa'i gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang dang / 'bar byed kyil mtho chen po la gzigs nas/ dam tshig thams cad yang dag par bskul ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la skams par
81b5(rgyud): zhugs pa// ge dang ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa na sems can mtha' dag gi smod pa sems la rab tu zhugs par gyur to// 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa snyoms par zhugs ma thag
81b6(rgyud): 'bas cad dang ldan pa'i gnas gtsa reg 'ang med 'ang nor bu rin po ches tshogs pa'i rgya dang / da pa'i dkyil 'khor du gyur te/ bsam gyis mi khyab cing rmang du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnas ba
81b7(rgyud): rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyid thos dang / byang steng sems dpa' skye pal zhugs pa dang / sa bcu'i dbang phyug la gda' bdag gis kyang / dkyil 'khor de bri ba'am bri
81b8(rgyud): 'i nus nas sa byar gyur ba'i sems can gyis lha gas kyar ci dgaso/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor bzang ba dgru'i pa'i gan ba ska' sa la gnas pa'angam dpal ga zhodod nu cu
82a1(rgyud): gzigs nas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos thams cad dang / byang chub sems dpa' sa bcu la rab tu
82a2(rgyud): ga/ rgyal tshab du dbang bskur ba thams cad dang / spyod pa la zhugs pa thams cad dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa thams cad 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i byin gyis brlabs
82a3(rgyud): sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyu 'thun pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyi khyang bar gyi thugs las byung ba'i dkyil la zhugs par bdag nyid kyis yang dag par
82a4(rgyud): shes par gyur to// sems can mo sa'i skye ba'i yid kyis kyang de dmigs par mo nus na bris pa 'am dring gzhug pasdu slob kyang ci dgos// de nas 'jas dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dkyil
82a5(rgyud): na po bzang po de la rab du zhugs pa'i sems can de dag la smras pa/ grogs po dag nyon cig 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis 'da' bar bya ba
82a6(rgyud): pa yin na/ sems can gzhan 'phags pa dang / 'phags pa ma yin pa rnams kyis lta smos kyang ci dgos// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas gsang ba'i bdag po phyagan du
82a7(rgyud): smras pa/ kye rgyal ba'i sras mi las 'das pa'i dkyil 'khor dam pa/ yid las byung ba ni bstan to// minanga' gyis dkyil 'khor bstan par bya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la
82a8(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das na yang / sems can rnams gang du yang dag par zhugs na/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro// de na pa gsang ba
82b1(rgyud): 'dag po na na rdo rjes 'jab dpal gnon nur gyur pa la smras pa/ rgyal ba'i sras gang de dus la ba' bar gel na gsungs zhig gsungs shig/ shAHseng ge mgon pa ni/ yongs su mya ngan 'das 'og
82b2(rgyud): sems can rnams kyi sangs rgyas nyid// sa steng khyod kyi dkyil 'khor byed// mthong ba tsab kyis 'jig rten na// sngags ni rab tu 'grub par 'gyur// mi 'chog nyams pa 'am// dam tshig bdag
82b3(rgyud): gyur pa// bdag nyid chen po tshangs pa yang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// sngags la dad pa med pas ni// 'bad pa du ma byas gyur kyang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur bas// ma ru
82b4(rgyud): tshig mi bstan to// dam tshig sbyor ba nyams par ni// rab 'byam brgya byin yin na yang // sngags rnams 'grub par mi 'gyur na// mi rnams smos kyang ci zhig dgos// dam tshig bstan bcos de nyid
82b5(rgyud): zhes// las kyi spyod bsgrub pa la// 'jig rten 'jig rten 'das pa pi// sngags rnams thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis dkyil 'khor ni// las kun byed la rab zhugs na// bskya
82b6(rgyud): ni gzhon ba na// lkugs rnams 'grub par 'gyur bya yis/ da nas gsang ba ba'i bdag pa yig na dang po sems dpa' chen po dang gsol ba btab pa/ kyisems can chen 'ams can gyi nga
82b7(rgyud): phyir mdor bsdus pa'i dkyil 'khor gsungs shig ces so// gsang ba ba'i bdag pos de skad ces smras pa dang / 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas sems can gyi don gyi phyir/ dkyil 'khor gyi chog
82b8(rgyud): sa pa/ re shig dang po che 'phrul gyis zla byed dam dbyed zla 'bring po 'am dpyid bla tha chungs ma klu'i yar nga'am/ nyin zhag dag ba dang gzar bzang po bltas te/ rgyu skar bzang po dang ldan pa la
83a1(rgyud): gdu sgru parab gzhan pa bya 'du rgyas panas b+h+ya// sa kya na pa gan pa 'gru/ dmas rgya
83a2(rgyud): rang nyid 'dug par bya'o// rgya mtsho chen por 'jug pa'i gnas sar/ rgya mtsho'i donas dang nye ba'i grong khyer chen por byang shang gyis phyogs su ha cang mi nye par dkyil 'khor gyi skyob dponas
83a3(rgyud): lo lo'i spyil bu byas pa la zhag bdun nam zla ba phyed kyi bar du cig pu rab tu gnas par bya ste/ gang gnas de dag tu yar gtsang ma'iris phyogs rdob med pa/ gyo mo dang thal ba dang sol ba dang / 
83a4(rgyud): ba dang dus baspangs pa shin du gtsang ba shin du yongs su sbyang ba'i sa phyogs su srog chags med pa'i tshul ba'i rnam lnga'am/ tsan dan dang ga pur dang / gur sum gyi chus bsres pa khro bo gshin
83a5(rgyud): bshed kyi sngags stong rtsa brgyad bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen po dang ldan pasas phyogs der phyogs bzhi dang sbyang dang / 'og dang thad ka dang phyogs 'tshams thams cad tu bsang / 
83a6(rgyud): gtor bya'o// de nas phyogs der kun nas thu bzhir khru bcu drug gam kru bcu gnyis sngam khru brgyad pa bya ste/ de la chen po ni zla bcwa drug pa'o// 'bring ni khru bcu gnyis pa'o// chung du ni klu brgya
83a7(rgyud): // dkyi 'khor 'di'i rnam pa gtsug// thams cad gzigs pas gsungs pa snyen// rgyal ba 'dod pas chen po ste// 'ang ni lings spyod la rim byed pa/ chung ngu'i dmatshig yang dag srung // 
83a8(rgyud): las rnams kun byed zhe ba yin// de dag las yid la gang 'dod pa'i dkyil 'khor bri ba ni de las phyogs der khru do tsam pa rlos la/ der de ba dang sol ba dang bal ba dang rus pa dang sbal sags// 
83b1(rgyud): ga ma ma skyon na na med 'ad par gyu na mngan pa dang rgya ba'i ja
83b2(rgyud): pochen pa'i ngogs bu bye ma'i phung ba chen po rnams 'bad pas/ shin du mo sor brtags te/ shin du gtsang ba dang srog chags med par bya ba la bri bar bya'o// pa phyogs de yang sros chags med pa'i tshul gyi
83b3(rgyud): gyis gang du srog chags med pa'i sa des dgang bar bya'o// bgad nas kyang legs par brdungs te mun nas mnyam por byas pa dkyil 'khor rnam
83b4(rgyud): gsum gang 'dod pa bya'o// seng ldeng gi phur ba bzhi 'a khro bo'i rgyal po'i sngags lan bdun bzla ni phyogs pa ni gdab bo// tshon sna lnga'i skud pa'i zhwa mo'i snying po lan bdun bzlas pa byas te/ 
83b5(rgyud): 'khor phyogs bzhi kun nas bskor bar bya'o// de bzhin du dbus kyi gnas su nang du yang zur bzhir bya'o// dbus na gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis rang gi rig pa rtsa ba'i sngags so
83b6(rgyud): bar bya'o// gtsug phud rtsa'i phyag rgya tshon po bcings nas rtsa ba'i sngags kyis grags pa dang / bdag nyid 'thung bar byas pa/ sngags blo bzhin du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol du byung ste/ dekyilal
83b7(rgyud): las su bskor ba byas nas kha shur phyog su bltas te/ ku sha'i stan la 'dug par bya'o// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yid la byas te/ dkyi ra 'khor de'i gru ba ni kun du zhugs 'an
83b8(rgyud): ngadagral bar bya'o// de nyid kyi phyi ro la du yang bar rnams nag gcig gnas tha batshul ning dbyung bar bya'o// des dbyer 'gyor kyi slob dpon gyi'i sngon du bya ba rnams bya sa name rang 'i rgyu kyi
84a1(rgyud): mazlas pa dang / sems can gyi don gyi thabs kyi phyir theg pa chen po la mos pa dang / zhwag cig phyung ba byas pa dang rdzogs pa'ang po dang ldan pa dang / bstan bcos sna tshogs las thong bas// 
84a2(rgyud): tshon sna lnga'i phye ma zhib mo shin du gsal zhing legs par smad par byas la/ yi ge drug pa'i snying po mngon par bzlas pa'i phye ma dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su gzhag par bya'o// phyi rol du yang rgyal mtshan
84a3(rgyud): dang 'den bsgreng ba dang rta babs bzhis brgyan pa chu shing 'bras bu'i tshogs kyis g.yur za ba dang rnga co che dang rnga brdung ba dang dung gi sgra dang dga' ba dang / bkra gas pa'i sgra grogs pa dag bya'o// 
84a4(rgyud): zhi nas chos ldan pa dag bshad par bya'o// phyogs bzhir theg pa chen po'i mdo/ 
84a5(rgyud): 'phags pazla ba'i sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin nub phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa sdong pos brgyan 'byung phyogs su bklag par bya'o// 'phags pa gaper 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shang phyogs su
84a6(rgyud): /  sa na na 'i nga 'i phyir 'phral pa bya'o//  la na da
84a7(rgyud): dang gung bu pa dang / bsres pa'i me tog dri zhim po dkar pol rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas te/ dkyil 'khor de thams cad du tshil bar dgrab par lta'o// mngon pang bkrum pa byas nas phyi rol du byung ste/ 
84a8(rgyud): dag bdun phyes bar du 'dod pa'i khams bzhen pa'i ba com 'ad gnyis pam gsus byang chub tu pas byed pa zhes myang nye bar sbyin pa ladag 'drug ste/ rtsa ba'i drags kyis gtsug
84b1(rgyud): bcing ba byas la/ de nas gser dang dngul dang zangs dang rin po chernam pa sna tshogs las tshon snga lnga shin du mdzes pa yid du 'ong ba'i phye ma zhib mo rab tu blangs te longs spyod chen po dang ldan pa dang chos dang
84b2(rgyud): ldan pa'i rgyal po dag 'drir gzhug pa byas na/ dkyil 'khor mthong ba tsam gyis nges par byang chub 'thob pa yin na/ sngags bsgrub par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/ shAkya'i skyes mchog 'das gyur da
84b3(rgyud): sman bya// 'jam dbyangs 'od chen ldan pa yis// skye bo phongs par gzigs nas ni// nyung zhing mdor bsdus/ 
84b4(rgyud): dkyil 'khor ni// mdor bsdus nas ni bstan pa yin// 'bras sA lu dang thug po che'i phye ma shin du zhib pa'i tshen snga lnga bzang po// dkar ba dang ser ba dang dmar ba dang nag pa dang ljang sru dag gis ba
84b5(rgyud): spang ba zhag pa'i tshon gyi phyim slob dpon rang gis blangs nas/ gtsug phud gA'i phyag rgya chen po bcings ste rtse ba'i sngags kyi bzlas pa byas ngas bye sa de la phyag rgya ba cing ngo // sgrib pa'i grogs
84b6(rgyud): cho ga mchog gis slob dpon gyis dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol shar lho 'tshams kyi phyogs su cho ga mthong ba'i las kyisathab khang bya ste/ rgyar gra dol zabs su khru gang ba kun nas 'khor bar bad
84b7(rgyud): pa'i theng 'drag phyi rol yang ba pa'i ze ba 'dra ba zhing du la ga' yam shing gis ma sar bar b+ha/ shing zil ba'i pham shing ma nogang rten pa la no dang skang rtse dang / mA la btags la rtsa ba'i sngags
84b8(rgyud): khu drug pa'am snying pos khu tshur kyi phyag rgya bcings te me lha spyan drang bar bya'o// spyad drangs nas sngar snyan pa nyid kyi rtsa ba'i ljags pa ge gcig pa'i snying pos phyir yang brgya
85a1(rgyud): / bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis cod pan dang 'chog chas byas nas bdag nyid dang ri mo mkhan pang rtse gcig par byas nas sbyin bsreg byed du gzhug go// de nas dkyil
85a2(rgyud): 'khod gyi blo 'dapon sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams yid la byas te/ sngar bstan pa'i bdug pas bdags nas tham mo ster te byang chub ma sa dpa' thams cad la rab tu btud na// 
85a3(rgyud): 'ang ba dpal gzhon nur gyur lal yang byag byas te/ chen gyi byem blang san pa sku'i glegs kyis bcad pa la/ ma mkhan gyis yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// chog 'di dag gis dang pas
85a4(rgyud): sa bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa nyid dam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ seng ge re khre la bzhugs pa gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na chos ston cing bzhug
85a5(rgyud): kyil 'khor kyi slob dpon rimi 'bri ba na 'di skab pa'i grogs mchog gis slong dpon bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis 'byung ba thams cad pa'i gtor ma btang bar byas/ 
85a6(rgyud): rab kyi phyogs pani dang sbeng dang 'ogad tu gtong bar bya'o// de na ba zhus byas te thag nga du nye bar mngo sa na sa gtsang ba begos te/ gtsang ga dang bgrang ba'i chog byas nus bung kus
85a7(rgyud): bsres pa'i mar gyi sbyin bsreg stong rtsib rgyad bya'o// de rnaMs ku ga'i bra la'i'adug nas bzlas pa bya ste/ de nyid du gnas par bya'o// khungs kAng la khro 'ire rgyal po gshin je gshid kyi
85a8(rgyud): bcu rtsa brgyad kyis mngon par sngags la 'pho par 'gyur gyi nang du bdage bar bya'o// bgegs kyi rim pa 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs can mi bzad pa'i sman pab du ba rlung dang char dang
85b1(rgyud): bram ngan gzhan dang gzhan gang gi yang ru pa mthong na// khrob pas grangs gang kham por na 'byung mchang bar bcangs te lan bdun sbyin bsreg byas pa des ni bshegs rab tu 'joms par 'gyur ro// 
85b2(rgyud): bgegs pa ni lan lnga chung pa nas sbyin bsreg byas na skyes bu de rengs par 'gyur ba'am/ nus pa med par 'gyur ba'am/ 'am por 'gyur pa'am/ skad cig de nyid la mi ma yin pas zin par 'gyur
85b3(rgyud): dpas kyang the tshom med de/ brgya byin yang 'chi bar byed na ma rungs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i mi 'am/ bshegs ma par rab lta smos kyang ni dgos/ khro bo gshin rje gshed kyi 'jigs pa'i 'gegs rnams par
85b4(rgyud): du 'bros shing mi snang bar 'gyur ro// de nas spru ba'i grogs mchog gis de nyid du ku da'i khral la gnas nas gro 'o'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed kyi bzlas pa byed cing gnas par bya'o// de nas dkyil 'khor bye sgo
85b5(rgyud): dpon gyis bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku gzugs kyi gangasangs su/ rang sangs rgyas nyid pad ma'i gdanal bzhugs par bya'o// de gnyis kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po gnyis chos nyan par bya'o// 
85b6(rgyud): deyang gangs su bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzig pa dbang kyud rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan bskyon ka'i 'dab bu'i mdog ltar dkar ba/ pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ phyag g.yon pan
85b7(rgyud): ba bsnams pa/ phyag g.yas pa na mchog sbyin po/ de'i yang ga bas na bcom ldan 'das ma yul gos dkar mo phyag g.yon pa na pad ma snams pa/ phyag g.yas pas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la
85b8(rgyud): 'tshal ba pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa gser kyi con pan 'chang ba dang ba dkar pa'i na bza' mnangs pa/ thal ba nag pos thig le gsum byas pa de bzhin du sgrol ma dang / khro gnyer
86a1(rgyud): yang dang rang gi gnas su spyod lam dag gis gnas par bya'o// de dag gi steng du ni bcom ldan 'das yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
86a2(rgyud): dang gtsug tor gyi rgyal mo rnams bya'o// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' bcu drug bya ba la 'di lta ste/ kun du bzang po dang sa'i snying po dang nam mkha' mdzod dang / sgrib pa thams
86a3(rgyud): rnam par sel ba dang ngan song rnam par sbyong ba dang byams pa rda yab lagan thogs shing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la blta ba dang / dri ma med par 'gro ba dang dra
86a4(rgyud): zung dang / bla ba'i 'od dang dri ma med par grags pa dang / nad thams cad gso bar byed pa dang / chos thams cad kyi dbang phyug gi rgyal po dang 'jig rten 'gro ba dang blo chen po dang / blol
86a5(rgyud): ste/ sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni lus shin du zhi ba dang rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan 'bri bar bya'o// rig pa'i rgyal po'i gtso bo dang / rig pa'i rgyal mo dang pad ma'i rigs gzugs dang / 
86a6(rgyud): phyag rgya lung ci lta ba bzhin du gnas ci lta ba ma lus pa dag tu bri bar bya'o// mtha'i gru ba ni'i gnas dag tu mi gnas rnams bzhag par bya'o// pad ma'i me tog legs par byas pa dang rig pa'i
86a7(rgyud): nga dran pa yang de dag tu bzhag par bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang rang sangs rgyas gnyis ni/ ri spyos kyi ngang ldang ba la bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du
86a8(rgyud): gang du bdag nyid blta ba dang / thams cad la yang 'jug pa'i sgo rnams bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon gyi phyogs su rang sangs rgyas gzhan gnyis te/ tsan dan dang grub pa
86b1(rgyud): byab gnyis breb byug/ dganyis kyi'og tu nyan thos gnyis na mad krung chen po dang / napan chen pa za bar bya'o// de dag gi 'angag pon durabasha' babyug dong btug nga mngan du dang
86b2(rgyud): ga sa shin du brgyan pas cad kyis brgyan pa/ man pa na papa 'i dzig pag/ klu rnapa pa'i sa kyis gnas 'do ga car pad TI 'phrul pa chung da
86b3(rgyud): sdemacha byed ci lte ba bzhin du bshegs kyi gdan la gnas pa/ rig pa'i rgyal po thams cad dang rig pa'i rgyal mo 'khor dang bcas pa bzlas pa dang / phyag rgya dang ldan pa ci ster shes pa bzhin
86b4(rgyud): bya'o// de dag gi yang gapon du rung bzhir sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bri ba bya ste/ bris nas kyang gnas gang du rag pa'i tshogs sa dran pa'i gnas de dag kyang 'dir bzhugs shig ces brjod par bya'o// 
86b5(rgyud): steng du pha rol du phyin pa drug dang / bcom ldan 'das su ba m+b+ha ma kI kr-i bar bya ste rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs shin du mdzes par bya'o// de dag gi steng du gtsug tor gyi rgyal po rgya
86b6(rgyud): pa'abar ba'i phreng ba'i phyag rgya bcings nas rang rang dag gi 'khor los sgyur nga'i rgyal po chen po'i gzugs su bri bar bya ste/ gser gyi mdog can dbang po shin du dul brgyan thams cad kyis brgya
86b7(rgyud): shin gshegs pa la zud kyis blta ba dag la 'di lta ste/ gtsug tror 'khor las sbyar ba dang gtsug tor mngon par 'phags pa dang ga tsug tor gdugs dkar po dang / rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang
86b8(rgyud): ga tor dang / rnam par rgyal ba'i gtsug tor dang / gzi brjid phung 'o'i gtsug tor dang / gtsug tor mthon po ste/ brgyad po 'di dag ni gtsug tor kyi rgyal po rnams so// g.yon du gi
87a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas rnams so// 'jug pa'i phyogs kyi gror ni byang chub ses sa dpa' gnyis bya ste/ gas 'phyogs su ni 'jig rten las 'das par 'gro ba zhes byab ram pa'i rtsod pan
87a2(rgyud): rdzasa? ni b.lag pa g.yas pa mchog sbyid pa 'thung ba 'dzid ga/ lag pa gzon pas spyi ru blugs 'dzin cing skol mngon du phyogs pa bzhin cung zad srog nyer dang bcas pa bre bar bya'o// 'jug pa'in
87a3(rgyud): cod pan 'chang ba/ lag pa g.yon pa na dbyig pa dang spyi'u blugs 'dzin
87a4(rgyud): dab g.yas pa nide mchog sbyin pa phreng ba 'dzin pa bzhin cung zad khro gnyer dang ldan pa skol mngon du phyogs pa bri'o// seng ge'i khri'i 'og tu chos kyi 'khor lo bur du 'bar bas khyab pa/ de'i 'og tu
87a5(rgyud): rin po che'i gzhal med khang de la gnas pa bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzhon nu re gzugs can sku mdog dmar skya zhi ba'i gzugs dang / 
87a6(rgyud): dzes pa'i gzugs can cung zad zhal 'dzum pa/ phyag g.yan pa na ud pal sngon po bsdams pa phyag g.yas pa na bil ba bsnams pa/ byis pa'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gtsug phud rdzas te
87a7(rgyud): bar mdzes par gyur pa mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir thogs pa dang ba'i stod ga pogs mnabs pa dar gyis na bzas slad g.yogs mdzad pa 'od kun nas 'phro ba 'bar ba'i phreng bas kun nas khyab pa
87a8(rgyud): ra'i gdan la nye bar zhugs pa khro bo'i rgyal po gshin rjegashed la gzigs pa dkyil 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgol mngon du phyogs pa bltan sdug pabri bar bya'o// de'i g.yas phyogs kyi ngos kyi bar
87b1(rgyud): ba'i 'og spro bo'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed bri bar bya ste/ mi sdug pa chen po'i gzugs can kun nas 'bangar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ bka' len cing 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phyogs su
87b2(rgyud): ba g.yon phyogs kyi ba pa'i 'og tu gnas gtsang ma'i sa kyi ste'i bu'i gzugs cas byung chub 'ams dpa' sna bri bar bya ba la 'di sa ste/ shin du dri bad dang byin du dul pa dang dag pa dang blan mi pa da
87b3(rgyud): dusnang ba'o// de dag thams cad kyang gnas gtsang ma'i gzhal med khang na 'dug pa/ rin po che du ma 'bar ba'i rdo'i steng dang 'dra ba kun nas 'bar ba me tog sna tshogs kyis bcal bkrab pa shin du mdzes pa
87b4(rgyud): bar bya'o// phyi rol 'khor yug tu zung bzhi'i rnam par byas te/ rta babs bzhi dang ldan pa phyogs bzhin sa nam pa sna tshogs pa'i tshon sna sngags pa bas ri mo shin du drang ba dang ldan pa nang gi dkyil 'khor
87b5(rgyud): / brebar bya'o// shar gyi bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i steng du ri mo dbus su me tog kun nas skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs cung zad chung
87b6(rgyud): bar bya'o// 'od ku napa 'ab 'i phreng ba sbya ba/  sbyi kyi b+h+ya dun pa/ rnamam nga sa bzla swA/ de'i sa smrag ci gtong ba'o 'ob sgyur ba'i byug tu bri ba b+h+yo/ 
87b7(rgyud): daphung po'i phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi steng du ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyag rgya bre bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das 'phags paspyan ras gzigs dbang
87b8(rgyud): ga steng dang / shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa'i phyin rgya regams su bcom ldan 'das 'od dpag tu med pa de bani gshegs pa'i gzugs can bya ste/ phyag mchog sbyin pa/ pad po'i gdanas bzhugs pa
88a1(rgyud): kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa/ de'i pang g.yas phyogs su ni lhung bzed dang chos gos kyi phyag rgya bya'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis 'jug pa'i gnas la ni pad ma'i phyag
88a2(rgyud): bcor ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal po'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i g.yon phyogs su gtsug tor gci brjid daphung po'i phyag rgya bri ste kun nas 'od 'bar ba'i phreng bas kyu
88a3(rgyud): rtson su na kyi tog tu na ma ma na zug sa da 'o da dang ldan pa rtog 'byur ba'i 'od
88a4(rgyud): dpa 'od dang ldan 'bri bar bya'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su rgyal pa'i gtsug tor gyi phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su chos kyi 'khor lo'i phyag rgya kun nas 'jas
88a5(rgyud): 'dang ldan 'bri'o// de'i yang g.yon phyogs su ma 'ang ba'i la dbu spyi'u thugs dang phreng ba dang bzang ba'i gdan gyi phyag tu bri'o// ra khyi gro'i gnas bu rdo rje me gsum pa gnyis kwa la yang gan nas 'bar/ 
88a6(rgyud): bri'o// bcom ldan 'das 'jab dpa' gnon dur gyur ba'i 'og tu phyag rgya chen po bcug phud lnga zhes bya ba dang / u pa pa'i phyag rgya kun nas 'bar ba 'di gnyis par rgyur 'brel ba bya'o// 
88a7(rgyud): laror kun nas sgo bri bar bya'o// sgod dag ni rgyab kyis lta ba dang / 'jug pa na ni mdun gyis lta bar bya'o// phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'gyur ba yang kha dog lnga'i tshon shin du gsal bas
88a8(rgyud): lhan sdug pa/ zung ba zhis rnam par 'byes pa/ ta 'bas pazhi'i rnam pa phyogs pa nir khru gnyis cam nang ni dkyil 'asor gyi phyi ros kyi rgor phyogs su sangs pa chen mo bri bar bye// gdong
88b1(rgyud): gos dkar po bgos pa dang stod g.yogs gos dkar po dang / tshangs skud dkar po thogs pas ba dog gser 'dra ba ral ba'i cod par can 'ji
88b2(rgyud): phyogs su 'od gsas kyi lha'i bu bya ste/ mdog gser 'dra ba bsam gtan kyad par can gyi gzugs can/ dar la'i gos bskos par 'i snod g.yogs byas pa/ bzhin shin du gsal ba ral pa'i cod
88b3(rgyud): ngan 'dren pa mchod phyir thegs dkar po can/ skyil mo krung gis 'dug pa lag galas pas mchog sbyin pa de'i gal sa phyobras su 'og min gyi lha'i bu bya ste// rgyan thams cad kyis brgya ga
88b4(rgyud): / rab tu zhi ba 'asapa gtan gyi rnam pa'i cha byad can/ dar la'i gos bgos pa dang la'i gos kyis stod g.yogs byas pa/ skyim mo krung gis 'dug pa lag pa g.yas pas mchog sbyin pa/ mchod phyir/ 
88b5(rgyud): gas dkar pos byas pa/ de'i rim gyis dka' kun dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang 'thab bral dang brgya byin la sogs pa'i lha'i bu bri bar bya ste/ gor po ji lta ba dang
88b6(rgyud): da dang dbye bas co lta ba bzhin du'o// brgya byin gyi 'og tu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ri la rtag tu myos dang / phreng thogs dang lag na gnod thogs dang / 'i 'ang gnyis pa dang sa bla'i lha'i thun
88b7(rgyud): me dze lta ba dang /  byad de/ ba 'anan du bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su mche ba dang / oM gdung ba dang shin du mthong dang gya no pa lding dang / dge chung dang bsod na pas skyes saso
88b8(rgyud): bu byed dang dbyings rtse pa bzhin thabyer bya'o// nubaphyogs dang byad phyonas su yang da bzhin to// de dag ni rim pa 'gam gnyis me brten nyi grobar bya'o// dbyem gangarig nyis bya'i
89a1(rgyud): dkyil 'khor gsum par 'gyur ba la/ mthar gyis phyogs pa ni nga rgyal po chen po bzhi ste/ byang phyogs nas 'jug pa'i g.yas ngos su gter nye bar gnas pa la/ nor sbyin rgyan pa
89a2(rgyud): dkyis brgyan pa/ gtsug phud drung zad 'dud pa gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can/ de'i gabs su nor bu bzang po dang gang ba bzang po gnod sbyin gyi bdag po gnyis bri'o// de bzhid du mdzad kyis pa
89a3(rgyud): sbyiskyen ma chen mo 'phrog ma yang bri'o// de bzhin du mthar gyis nub phyogs su chu lha lag na zhags pa thogs pa dang / klu dga' bo dang nye dga' bo dang 'jog po dang nor rgyas la sogs pa klu'i rgyal
89a4(rgyud): po brgyad bri'o// de bzhin du rim pa gnyis la gnas pa'i mthar gyis gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang mi 'am ci dang lho phye chen po dang drang srong dang grub pa dang yi dgas dang sha za dang nam mkha' lding dang mi dang
89a5(rgyud): pi ma yin pa la sogs pa dang / sran dang nor bu rin po che'i bye brag dang de dang chu bo dang gling dang mthar gyis gcos thams cad bri bar bya'o// skye phyogs su ni gshin rje mamo bdun gyi 'khor dang
89a6(rgyud): ba bye bar bya'o// shar skyo tshams su me rkun nas 'bang ba'i phreng bas khya'ab/ dbyug pa dang skye thugs dang phreng ba lagan the zhes pa/ ral ba'i cod pan 'dzin pa/ gos dkar po gagos pa/ dang
89a7(rgyud): gzigs byis pa/ mchod phyir dkar po thogs pa/ mdog gsar 'dra ba thal ba'i thig legs mi byas pa/ de bzhin du rgyan dang / mtshon cha dang cha byad dang dbyibs dang / kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs bya
89a8(rgyud): gnyis la brten te bri bar bya'o// thams cad kyi dkyis 'khor du 'jug pa'i sgo'i phyi rom du dga' zlog gi bdag po rgya ma chog sa non pa/ la gan mdud rtsi gsum thog se blta mod
89b1(rgyud): skyog sa kha dog sa tshogs brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ smin drug gi bum bya'i kun la 'dug pa madrang thogs pa/ gnon nu gzugs can gdong drug pa lus dpar por snang ba/ gos sed po 'go pa/ 
89b2(rgyud): go'i ser po'i snong g.yogs rgyan lag pa gapon bun drim bu dang bdan dmar po thogs pa/ sashar gyis b+h+ring gar ti shin du ring ba 'dra ba dang / tshogs kyi bdag po chen po dang / dga' byed dbang phyug/ 
89b3(rgyud): dang nag po chen po dang / ma mo bdun po rgyan dang mtshon ci dang / 'don dang dbyings ci lta ba bzhin bri bar bya'o// nor lha brgyad dang drang srong bdun dang khyab 'jug mag pa bzhin 'khor lo dang dung
89b4(rgyud): dang ral gri thogs pa/ gdan nam mkha' lding rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gza' brgyad dang rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa bdun dang / gang yang nye ba'i gza' brgyad sa steng gi dkyil 'khor na rab tu rgya
89b5(rgyud): par bri bar bya'o// mthar gyis chos grangs bco lnga dang yang ngo dang mar ngo'i phyogs dang / khyim bcu gnyis dang dus drug dang rna ba bcu gnyis dang po tshig pa dang / sring mo ba ni zu ma zhon pa dang ming bau tra
89b6(rgyud): thul zhon zhing tshul gnas pa ste/ mdor na phyag rgyar bzhag par bya ba yang yin no// lha mod dag mthar gyis rim pa gnyis pa la brten te bya ba yin no// slob dpon bdag nyid phyi rol du bya
89b7(rgyud): 'khor de la g.yas su bskor ba byas te/ mdor na dkyil 'khor gsum gang dkyir 'khor la brten cing bye bar bya ste/  dkyil 'khor gsum car gang gru ba nir rnam par gnas par bya ba yin no// 
89b8(rgyud): mdor na 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sems can nams kyi ma gan la zhi sapa 'gre bar bya'o// bdi sa regs 'phags pa spyan ram gzigs dbang phyug kyang nges par bri bar bya'o// 
90a1(rgyud): rigs 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje yang nges par bri bar bya'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gtso bo 'phags pa kun du bzang po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// 'jam dpalag
90a2(rgyud): rurang gyur pa yang nges par bri bar bya'o// lpags rnams ni ci ltar rnam par bzhag pa bzhi da phyag tu bri bar bya'o// 'di ni nang gi dkyil 'khor ro// dkyi 'khor ba dab la yang shar phyogs m+b+ha ni la
90a3(rgyud): kyi bdag po tshangs pa bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du 'od gsal ba ni lho phyogs su'o// 'og min gyi gzugs can rnams lha'i dkyil 'khor gyi rnam par ro// 'du shes med 'du shes med min gyi
90a4(rgyud): mched kyi bar ni brjod par mi bya'o// byang phyogs su brgya byin lha'i rgyal po dang / rab 'bab bral dang / yongs su dga' ldan dang / rab 'phrul dga' dang / gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang / 
90a5(rgyud): rgyang la sogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams nges par lha'i rgyal po ri re bya'o// lhag pa rnams ni phyag rgyar gnas par bya'o// de bzhin du dkyil 'khor gsum par yang byang phyogs su 'byung po'i bad/ 
90a6(rgyud): poda'ang ldan dka' thub bzlog pa dang bcas pa ngas par bri'o// 'jam dpal gyi sgo gnyis pa'i sgo'i drung du ni srid drug gi dzu rba b+ha'i stan yod pa lag ra mdung thogs pa/ lus kyi kha dog da
90a7(rgyud): gros ser pos stod g.yogs dang gos byas pa lag pa g.yas par dril bu dang padan thags pa/ gzhon nu'i gzugs can rje 'khor la lta ba'o// shar phyogs su ni na ma mkha' lding 'dab chags
90a8(rgyud): kyigazugs can dang / drang srong gi nang nas mang kaN Da nges par bri bar bya'o// lcag ma ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// shar lho ni gzhon nu ma bzhi dang / ming po gzhon nung
90b1(rgyud): bcas pa dru'i gzhon pa la gnas pa/ rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par rgyu ba dang / me lha'i rgyal po yang nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho phyogs su ni srinam ma bdag po las ni
90b2(rgyud): bib+hi shar shing pi tsum dal gnas pa dang / dzaH b+hal rgya dbang zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi gzugs can byang chub sems dpa' nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du mas gyis gakrin rje'i rgyal po yi dgas
90b3(rgyud): na po nges par bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du sha za'i rgyal po rnam par ga yongs byed ces bya ba nges par bri bar bya'o// lhag pa ni ji ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgya bri bar bya'o// de bzhin du lho nung
90b4(rgyud): mu ni klu'i gtso bo dga' bo dang / nyo dga' bo nges par bri bar bya'o// gza'i gtso bo nyi ma bri bar bya'o// nub phyogs su ni drang srong thub pa'i mchog gcer bu pa mu stegs kyi mchog gcer bu'i gzugs bri bar
90b5(rgyud): bya'o// lcug ma ni ci ltar gnas pa bzhin phyag rgyar bri bar bya'o// rub byang mtshams su ni gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po mchog sbyin dang / dri za'i rgyal po gtsug phud lnga pa dang / mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ldod pa nges pade ni
90b6(rgyud): bar bya'o// lhag sa ni gnas nge sa ba dang / dbyibs ji ba ni du phyag sngar bri bar bya'o// kyi 'khor ba'i po phyi rom du mo ldang bkod de/ byug rgya'i phreng bas nye bar mngob par byas gzung bzhin
90b7(rgyud): rta babs pa ni dang rgyal po chen po bzhis brgyan pa/ ci ltar gnas bol 'di lta ste/ phyog rgyar 'gyur ba ni sgong 'dzag pa la ud pa la sngon po bri'o// gabs dang g.yon gyi phyogs su ni pad ma rdo rje dgra sta/ 
90b8(rgyud): ral gri mdung dang mdung rtse gsum pa dang / gang+ga dang 'khor lo dang sa tika dang / bum pa dang nya dang dung dang gdub kor dang phyi'u thugs dang / kyam mtshan dang ba dan dang zhags pa dang dril bu dang chu gre
91a1(rgyud): gzhu dang thob dang / 'di dag rnam pa 'di dag 'dra ba'i mngon pa'i dachogs phyag rgyas dkyil lakhod kyi phyogs kun nas khyab par bya'o// de nas phyi rol gyi phyogs bzhir rgya mtshatshan na
91a2(rgyud): bzhag par bya ste/ byang phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gru pa ni byas te/ snatshogs rdo rje gsum yod pa kun nas 'bar ba bya'o// shar phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor gzhu'i dbyibs can byas te bzhag la
91a3(rgyud): kun nas 'bang ba'i pad ma'i phyag rgyas mtshan pa'o// lho phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zur gsub byas te kun nas 'bar ba'i lhung bzod kyis mtshan pa'o// nub phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor kun
91a4(rgyud): byas te ud pa la sngon po sdong bu dang 'dab ma dang bcas pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// phyogs mtshams pa nir yang phyag rgya bri bar bya ste/ nub byang gi phyogs su ni dkyil 'khor zlab pa
91a5(rgyud): zhags pa kun das 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// lho nub 'tshams su ni dkyil 'khor ga'u 'dra ba bya ste dbyug pa kun nas 'bar bas mtshan pa'o// shang lho mtshams su dkyil 'khor gru gsum pa t+yai/ 
91a6(rgyud): dgra sta 'od zer kun nas 'bang bas mtshan pa'o// byang shang mtshams su ni ral gri 'od kun nas 'bar ba bzhag par bya'o// de ltar thams cad bris nas steng dang 'og dang thang kar phyag rgya gsum da
