91b1(rgyud): pa dang yan lag thams cad mdzes pa dang / bra ba dang rgyal rigs dang rje'u rigs dang dbang rigs dang / byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang / theg pa chen por zhugs pa'i rang bzhin can dang theg pa dman/ 
91b2(rgyud): pa mi 'dod pa'i ngang tshul can dang / sems dpa' chen po dang dad pa dang ldan pa dang / dge ba'i chos can dang rgyal po chen po mngon par 'dod pa dang longs spyod chung ba la smod pa dang / longs spyod che
91b3(rgyud): bangon par 'dod pa dang ldan pa dang / bzang bdag dang dul ba dang ldan pa dang / tshul khrims ldan pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge bsnyen dang dge bsnyen ma rnams yang dag par sdom pa la
91b4(rgyud): bar gnas pa dang / gas sbyong la nye bar gnas shing sdom pa la gnas pa dang / byang chub sems de 'chen po ma ni ma spang ba dang / phyogs chen po dang rigs mthod po dang rang bzhin nyid kyis cho byeng
91b5(rgyud): ba dang dag gcig spang ba byas pa dang / gos gtsang ma bgos pa dang sgra drizhim pa dang / dus gsum du zhus byed pa dang / de'i nyin zhag phag zur dang gu gum dang li sheb yang ge'i dri zhim pos kyi
91b6(rgyud): byas pa/ rtag tu nye po rig dang ldan 'a dang / ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa dang 'asrung ba'i chog byas pa dang / tshangs par spyod pa dang bden pa dang ldan pa dang dus mtshams las rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor
91b7(rgyud): rom de nyid du ha cang yang mi nye ha rtsed ma ring bar bzhag par bya'o// shin du gtsang ba dang shin du gtsang phra dang ldan pa gcig nas brgyad kyi bar te de las gzhan ma yin pa de dag kyang phan tshun ga rten
91b8(rgyud): 'brel ba/ rgyal ba tu mngonas skye sonas dbang bsrung ngo'i ma pachen po dag gi 'u gnon dus 'am gzhon dum grong gi chos mi shes pa'o// deba'i phyir nan/ bcom ldan 'das gnon du sa
92a1(rgyud): can byang chub sems dpa' 'jab dpal ni byis pa'i skye 'o dka bar byed ga gzhon nu'i rol 'am dgyes pa des na dang po nyid du gzhon nu nang du gzhug par bya'o// rgyal
92a2(rgyud): mngon par 'phel ba dang tshe dang nad med pa dang / dbang phyug dang skal ba chen po mngon par 'phel ba phen te/ khyad bar du byis pa rnams la nges par sngags grub pa gnas pa yin te/ de dag tu
92a3(rgyud): bzhag pa byas dus/ grogs tho bgayod pa pa zang ba dong lda pas/ dkyil 'khod kyi slob dpon gyis gzur gyi bdug pos bdugs te/ rgyab kyi phyogs pa ma yin pa'i phyi rol tu byung
92a4(rgyud): nas dus dang ci ltar 'thun pa'i chu legs par gtsang sbra byas pa dang / srog chags med pa la rtsa ba'i sngags brgyartsabargyad mngon par bzlas te/ gtsug phud lnga'i phyag rgya chen pos phyag rgyar
92a5(rgyud): pa'i chus khrus byas la nyi reg byas nas/ gos gtsangs bgos pa'i gtsang bas me thab kyi drung du song ste/ ku share khres la 'dug nas byang shar gyi phyogs su mngon par bltas te/ mar
92a6(rgyud): gzung dang tha~M tshum dang / 'ad dang bsres pa'i sto brgyad bya'o// nga ba shad pa tshigs na drang dang gshegs la pa sa te/ ya kyil 'khong du dzug par bya
92a7(rgyud): yang bum pa gang ba brgyad ngas gtsang ma'i gos dang ldan pa/ shing a pra'i mo ma dang 'bras bu dang ldan pa gseng dang / dngul dang rin po che dang / 'bras dang 'bru dang du bcug po gcig 8
92a8(rgyud): 'das shAkya thub ba la dpung po// gnyes pa ni 'ang sa rgyas thams cad pa'o// gsum pa ni dang 'des rgyas bams cad dang 'phags pa rtan thos lagon pa ni pa byid rgyas sema'apa'
92b1(rgyud): / bora'o// lnga pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 'jam dpal la'o// drug pa ni lha thams cad la'o// bdun pa dang brgyad pa ni dkyil 'khor gnyis pa'i sgo khang la bzhag par bya ste/ gcig ni lA
92b2(rgyud): po thams cad pa'o// gcig ni sems can thams cad kyi thun mong du gyur par bsngos nas bzhag par bya'o// de bas na sngar bshad pa'i tshogs spyan drang bar bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dang bdug pa dang
92b3(rgyud): dang / mar me dang lha bshos kyang sngar bstan pa nyid kyi las kyis dbul bar bya ste/ thams cad kyi thams cad du go rim bzhin du
92b4(rgyud): pa dang 'phags pa ma yin pa thams cad la lha bshos zhes smos pa ni/ 'bras sA lu'i chan zho dang bcas pa dang sbrang rtsi dang ldan pa'i 'o thug khyad par can gyis nye bar sbyar ba'i mar la bcos pa'i
92b5(rgyud): khur gyi 'breng bu la sogs pa dang / khaN Da la sogs pa'i bza' ba thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul bar bya'o// mar gyis gang ba dang tsad dan gyi thang chu sbrang rtsi'i snying po dang
92b6(rgyud): ra bcos pa'i bza' ba ni rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thob dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang / 'phags pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// de bzhin du gaspyod
92b7(rgyud): lo ba ke re ga dang / khyad par du sngam krur gyi yo byad 'byung ba thams cad dang / sems can thams cad la sngags dang ldan pa'i tshogs sbyin par bya'o// de bzhin du me tog dri zhim pa gna'i mi'i tshe
92b8(rgyud): dang rgya spos dang / klu'i me tog dang me tog pun naka la sogs pa sngar bstan pa sangs rgyas dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po dang 'pha
93a1(rgyud): ba dang 'phags pa ma yin pa'i lha thams cad la dbul bar bya'o// khyad par du ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la ni gna' ma'i me tog dang / pad ma'i rigs la ni me tog pad ma
93a2(rgyud): de bzhin du rdo rje'i rigs la ni me tog ud pal dang / lha gzhan dag la ni gzhan gang yang rung bas dbul bar bya'o// ga bur gyi bdug pa ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la'o// tsan dan ni
93a3(rgyud): ma'i rigs la'o// de bzhin du gu gul ni gsang ba'i bdag po phyag na rdo rje la shes par bya'o// lha gzhan thams cad ni bdug pa tha mal pas bya'o// bar gyi mar me 'phags pa rnams/ 
93a4(rgyud): cad la ni dbul bar bya// 'phags ma'i lha ni thams cad la// dri zhim 'bru mar dbul bar bya// cho ga ji bzhin rim pas ni// bdug pa mthong ba'i rgyu yis so// de ltar gsungs pa de bzhin
93a5(rgyud): sngag rnam sa kun la rtag tuH/ spyan ras gzigs la gang gsungs dang // gang gsungs phyag na rdo rje la// rang rang gi ni sngags dag gis// sngags spyod don du bsgrub pa'o// cho ga gcig pu
93a6(rgyud): na gyis sngar mthong ba'i tshogs spyan drang ba dang / mchod pa dang bdug pa la sogs pa byas nas/ gtsor 'thun pa'i
93a7(rgyud): des bdug pa dang spos dang me tog dang phreng bas brgyan pa'i phyogs bzhi mtshams brgyad steng dang 'og dang thad ka thams cad du dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rom du bskor ba bya zhing / 'byung po thams
93b1(rgyud): pa'i gtor ma rgya char gtor bar bya'o// de nas khrus byas te yang no dang skad rtsi dang / mar gyis 'asgom pa'i shA ru dang / 'bras rdzunas pa'i spyod 'jegs pa'i ldan pa ge drug pa dang snying pos
93b2(rgyud): rtsabargyad bya'o// sbyin 'asreg byas nas dkyis 'a tsha la rjes su bcug cing thar bzhag pa'i sems dpa' chen po la 'asrung ba byapha na pa/ dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyi slob ma nyid du khas bla
93b3(rgyud): ba/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa gso sbyong byas pa/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la bdag nyid kyi lus phul ba/ dngo 'grub kyi sems can thams cad kyi nye bar longs spyod pa dang lo
93b4(rgyud): su longs spyod bathun mong du gyur pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi snying po gnon par bya ba dang / thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas thob par bya ba la dkyil 'khor
93b5(rgyud): bstan par bya'o// bstan pa tsam nyid kyis sdig pa'i rnyog pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur te/ mtshams med pa lnga byed pa'i skye bo yang de ma thag tu grol bar 'gyur ro// de nas dkyil 'a
93b6(rgyud): slob dpon gyis ras ma nyams pa zag mas brtags ma thag bsgra med pa la/ rtsa ba'i sngags kyis lan gsub bzlas te/ dri zhim po'i tsan dan dang gur gum gyis bsgos pa'i ras kyis
93b7(rgyud): g.yogs par bya'o// dang por byis pa lo gsum nas lo bcu drug pa'i bar zur phud lngas nye bar mdzes pa 'am/ gtsug zud gcig gis nye bar mdzeb pa 'am/ gtsug pud gsum gyis nye bar ba
93b8(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ rgyal po'i bu spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba 'am/ rgyal rigs kyi bu 'am gzhan bdag nyid chen po rgyal po chen po 'dod par dkyil 'khor du bcukra par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gnyis pa la phyir pa
94a1(rgyud): gdong g.yog par bya ste/ uta pa la'i phyag rgya bcings nas/ 'jam dpal gnon nur gyur pa'i rtsa ba'i sngags lan gcig brjod du gzhug ste/ me tog dang dri nim btsun dang
94a2(rgyud): kur gum dang bsreg pa shin du gtsang bar byas pa/ lag pa gnyis su byin la me tog 'dod du gzhug go// gang du de'i me tog babs pa der de'i sngags sbyin par bya ste/ sngags 'di ni de'i yi
94a3(rgyud): papar bstan te/ skye ba brgyud pa nas de dang rjes su 'brel pa yin te/ de nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen byang chub kyi snying po la gnod pa/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po thams cad mkhyen pa'i

94a5(rgyud): yang chos thams cad la yang the tshom med par bslab par bya ba 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du mthar gyis dngos grub 'dod pas brgya rnyed kyi bar du bya ste gzhan la ni ma yin no// 
94a6(rgyud): dgal ce ltar sdig pa blang ba'i phyir dam tshig tsam sbyin par bya'o// dkyil 'khor gyi slob dpon gyis dbang bsrur na/ dang por re shig dkyil 'khor gyi phyi rol dzA ha cang yang mi nye ha cang

94a8(rgyud): dge 'dun la dad cing dad pa dang / slo ba chen po dang ldan pa dang / byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral ba dang / theg pa chen po la zhugs pa dang / dkon mchog gsum sa phan par byed pa dang
94b1(rgyud): dbang po ma tshang ba med pa dang ma smad pa dang / tshe 'di nyid la sngags grub par 'dod pa dang / bsam pa bzang ba dang sngags kyi spyod pa la spro ba dang / blta bar 'dod pa'i rang bzhin can dang sad par
94b2(rgyud): pa'i phyir yang sngags kyi don la rnam par rtog pa med pa dang / der gtad pa'i yid dang gcig la sogs pa nas lnga'i bar du dbang bskur bar bya'o// lhag ma ni spang bar bya'o// shes rab can dang skyo
94b3(rgyud): rmongs pa med pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa la dbang bskur bar bya'o// gzhan dag ni ma yin no// de nas rgyal po thams cad dbang bskur ba bzhin du yo byad thams cad bsogs te/ slob dpon ma
94b4(rgyud): nyes na/ de nas bla re chen po bris te/ rgyal mtshan dang be dan mthon pa bsgreng zhing gdugs dkar po dbul 'dzin pa dang / rnga lab dkar pos g.yob ba dang / bkur sti chen pos dung dang / rnga na

95a1(rgyud): la blta zhing / dang por re zhig rig pa'i dbang bskur ba byin de phyag rgya chen po datsug phud ching du gajug par bya'o// de nas rang 'dod pa'i sngags gang dang gang yang
95a2(rgyud): bgro ga'i 'dab mal 'gi wang zhes bri bar bya ste/ bris nas kyang tsan don dang lur yu kyi chus lag pa dang ma pa la sbyar 'grus la/ de nas gro ga'i 'dab me de kham por kha sbyar

95a4(rgyud): snga ma nyid du bzla bar bya'o// de nas ku sha'i khres la 'dug pa la dbang bskur bar bya ste/ phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor la gang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du gyur pa'i bum pa gang

99a8(rgyud): dgongs su gsal nas byas nas/ bdug pas bdug pa de'i dus bum bya dang / krung krung dang ngang ba dang band dang ngur ba nasab sna tshogs bya dag babang la gnas pa 'am/ chul spyod pa rnams nas/

99b2(rgyud): rnams kyis bdag garas srung 'di la byin gyis brlabs te/ bdag gi skye ba dam pa ni legs par 'chab yid te/ bdag gi sngags srab pa 'bras bu med par mi 'gyur ro// je baT ha dang rdza
99b3(rgyud): rnga dang dung dang pi bangar dang glang bu dang khar rnga dang rdzarnga chen po'i sgra zas pa'am/ bud med dang khye'u 'am/ tha mo'am skyes pa rnams bcos ma 'am bcos ma ma yin pa de'i dus su kr-i bur du 'di skad ce
99b4(rgyud): dang kun pa dang sbyin pa dang phyin pa dang khyer cig ces dang / dpal dang 'bras bu dang sa bu nyi pa dang / chog dang brgya byin dang mang po dang de dag la sogs pa'i zhe na rab tu dge 'a 'dzin
99b5(rgyud): dang dga'a'o/  na/ des na reg pa 'dzin pas shes par bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byin byas parlab pa ni 'di yin te/ don mo
99b6(rgyud): 'an da ma yin na zhes so/ de'i ngas su ma rungs pa'i tshig 'don pa khyad cigazi shog tu sheg/ nyams pa rnam par nyams pa/ kye nad reng bshin du re ba da
99b7(rgyud): dmahe da rgya da dang bang 'a dang kyil dang / 5dpa rkang sa rkang 'ang pa'i sa 'don par gyur na/ des ni ba pa pos bdag
99b8(rgyud): med pa yin na nas shes par bya/ de tshul bar bya zhing yang ldam bzhin du yar brtsam par bya// de bzhin du lan bdun gyi bar du byas la/ bdun pa'i las 'i bya la ma
100a1(rgyud): 6/ la byas pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas sgrub pa pos gzhon nus de bsrung ba byas la ku sha'i khres la banan par byaH/ shar ram b+hang phyogs su phyogs par banan la bdag
100a2(rgyud): bsrung ba dang lha la dbul ba'i khazas su sbyin no// sngar sbyang ba byis pa'i ku sha'i khres la de nyid kyi tshogs ras bal la yang bya'o// dog pa de 'jam pa dang legs par bsgrims pa dang sngar bsrabs pa
100a3(rgyud): bu mos yang dag par blangs te/ gcig dang gsum dang lnga dang brgyad la sogs pa nas bcu drug gi bar ram/ kar sha'i grangs legs par bgrangs pa dang ldan pas bya'o// de la rab ni bcu drug
100a4(rgyud): de bzhin brgyad ni bar ma ste// phrad tshigs las la sgrub pa ni// gcig dang lda ni tha ma'o// las rnams kun la sngags rig pas// ci ltar nus pa bzhin du bya// de nas btsams te gang cung zad// TIH
100a5(rgyud): pa sngar ni byas pa dag/ dogs par sems kyis dmigs pa na// de'i mod la 'jig par 'gyur// dog pa 'di dag yang dag blangs// gtsang ma'i sdor du gshug par bya// de nas bzhag pa byas nas de// 
100a6(rgyud): gabur gyi ni bdug pas bdug/ srog chags yan lag 'byung ba 'am// gur gum tsan dan la sogs dang // me tog ma la tsam pa ka/ dri zhim sogs pas yongs su bsgo// bsrung ba'i cho ga byas nas ni/ 
100a7(rgyud): gtsang ma'i phyogs su yang dag bzhag/ sngags rig las kun shes pa yis// shin du mnyam bzhag bzlas par bya// de nas thag par song nas// ci 'dod pa yi ren sbyin no// rang dbang yan lag mnyams
100a8(rgyud): dang // dkar po'i chos la rtag tu dad// rgan min nad kyis gdungs pa min// lud pa dbugs mi bde ba spangs// man smad pa ma yin dang // 'phye bo ma yin spa dkar spangs// kun gyis bkur pa
100b1(rgyud): ldan// rab bsngags blta na sdug pa dang // blo dang yang dag spyod pa dge/ 'jig rten pa yi tshal la brten ka dngos grub 'dod pas de la ni// ras bzang btags pa'i ched du bskus// grogs po rigs
100b2(rgyud): bzang rab bsngags shing // hU~M ldan pa rtson mams pa dang // shin du khyad par mchog kur pa'i// ras zag pa ba la bskal par bya// ras ni rab la rab tu bya// 'bring ni 'bring la bsgrib par bya// ya la tham
100b3(rgyud): tshogs las la ni// dman pa nyid ni thams cad la// bzo bo ci ltar smra ba bzhin// rin de de ltar sbyin par bya// dang po'i tshig ni yang dag 'byung // bzo bo lani ldanas rigs pas// de nas myur du rin byan pa// da
100b4(rgyud): bo'i tshong zhes de la brjod// don du gnyer med de la ni// rin du klu byed sgrub pa 'o// 'di ni myur du 'grub byed pa'i// rab ni bzang po bla ni med// las kun byed cing mchod pa ste// lha dang mi ge bde basbyin/ 
100b5(rgyud): 'byung po kun gyi dalal 'gyur zhes// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas kyis gsungs/ di nas rig pa 'dzin pas ma ga pa la rgyas babang po ma/ oM 'phrul gyi zla ba phyed dam nyin nag dge ba'am
100b6(rgyud): dge' bltas ten sa sbyong ston/ yang na dus kyi mchog byed kyi sa kyin pa par byed ma gang ma pra'i me to// skyes shing shi gis gnams kyi ma lag dang maton rgyas pa de'i dus 'tshamasas/ 
100b7(rgyud): 'char ba la sngar bstan pa'i tha ga pa zhal dbul bar 'os pa'i kha zas bstan cing / gos gtsang ma bgos la mdol cod pan bcings nas khrus legs pa
100b8(rgyud): yang rung bas lus phyugs nas gapur gyi dris kha la bskos te/ yed dka' ba dang bkres pa dang skom pa med par byas te/ bags kyi la ga bzhi pa la sogs pa'i yo byad thams cad kyang sar pal
101a1(rgyud): sa dang ba lang ge lci bas bkrus te/ yang pa'i rnam lngas bkru bar bya'o// de nas srog chags med pa'i chus kyang bkru bar bya'o// tsan dan dkar po dang gur gum gyi chus kyang gtor bar bya'o// 
101a2(rgyud): gtsang ma'i sa phyogs su tsa co med cing skye bo dang bral ba dben pa'i gnas su bkab pa dang gsang bar me tog gis mchod do// de nas sgrub pa pos pang dag pa dag par byed pa'i gas kyis brgya
101a3(rgyud): par bsngags pa'i khungs kar gyis phyogs bzhi steng 'og phyogs mtshams su gtor bar bya'o// de nas thag pa la yungs kar gyis gtir bar bya zhing / phyag rgya chen po gtsug phud lnga bcings ste/ gtsug
101a4(rgyud): phrad lnga bcings pa byas na bzung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro// gal te ras ris rab yin na ni// zur bzhir zheng du khwa bani chur khru brgyad de/ thag pa pa de tsam la yongs su noms par bya'o// 'bring ni na
101a5(rgyud): do khyer khru lnga pa'o// Tha.a na nang du bde bar gshegs pa'i mtho gang chur ni khru brgyad kyi byed do// da la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi mo gang la ne lul dbus kyi skyes bu tshad dang ldan pa'i khru gcig ste/ 'di
101a6(rgyud): 'de bar gshe shes pa'i mtho zhes bsgrags te/ tshad 'dis tshad du bstan po yin no// ras ni rab kyis dngas grub mchog/ 'jig rten gang dag mchog gis gsungs// thub pa mya ngan 'das ldog tu/ 
101a7(rgyud): sred 'dod la bar ma yin// longs spyod che 'dod skyes bu dang // lha me lha yin gdengs can ni// tha ma la ni grub par bshad// 'bring gis 'bring ni grub pa'o// las rnams phran tshogs dag la ni// ras na tha
101a8(rgyud): mas rtag tu 'grub// rdzas rnams kun la rtag tu ni// las rnams thams cad 'bru' par 'gyur// ras gsum gyis kyang bsnyen pa de// skam 'di mil 'grub pa yin/ 
101b1(rgyud): la'ang // cog nyams na 'grub mi 'gyur// chog yang dag ldan na ni// mi li skye ba tha ma la yang // sa sa rnams thams cad 'bad med par// myur ba nyid du 'grub par byed// rgyal ba rgya mtsho sras dag gis// la
101b2(rgyud): 'di dka ni yang dag bstan// phongs pa mgon med drug pasngal pa'i// sems can kun ma legs sbyin pa'o// byang chub sa man ma lus kyang // de nyid gzigs pas bstan pa ste// byang chub rgya le chos 'di ni/ 
101b3(rgyud): sngags kyi khams kyis bstan pa yin// 'jig rten dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // 'jig rten 'das pa'ang 'grub 'gyur te// dkyil 'khor gang dag bstan pa yis// 'bad pa med par sngags rnams 'grug// gang
101b4(rgyud): 'ag byang chub tu 'dod pa// de la rtag tu dngos grub 'gyur// 'gro la phan sems tag med pa// gzhan la 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// bdag nyid chen po 'jam dpal ni// gzhon nur gyur pas khyad par du byang chu
101b5(rgyud): pa'i khyod sems la// ras res 'grub par gsungs pa yin// bya ba myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// thams cad 'dir ni thob pa yin// de nas mthar gyis bzo bo ni// ras ni 'bad pas btags par bya// nyin naka lnga dang brgyad
101b6(rgyud): dang gi/ bcu drug gnyis dang bzhi dang ni// ken nug gcig gis myur du ni// myur par ras ne zag bya// thub pa mchog ni 'dod pa yig// nyen zhag gcig pa dge ga san// gtsang sgra'i snod pa bun sum tshogs/ 
101b7(rgyud): byin brlabs ldan// gnas nas thag ring song nas ni// be shang dang gtso ba yongs su dor// de nas gos bcas khrus byas te// gos gzhan dag kyang bag bya zhing // gos dkar phreng ba ldan par 'chang // yang nga
101b8(rgyud): yang du ga rigatu// lus decan dan dkar pos byu dang // bza ba po lag pa gnyis kyang thug/ lags 'ang su rtag tu dri med par// 'bad pas kyang ni zag bya// de sa mags pa'i sbyor ba'am// gzhanan gyi
102a1(rgyud): 6/ gsum pa dang / rnam dpyad rang bzhin 'bad pa yis// ras ni ma lus tha ga bya// ras kyi tha ga zin pa dang // sngar gsungs las kyis legs byas pa// tshad ldan nyams pa med pa ni/ 
102a2(rgyud): nyin zhag bdun la blta ba ste bzhag/ yar ngo'i shin du bzang po la// de la sngags ni gzhug par bya// ras ni yongs su gsal byas pa// 'tshar mthar ni mdud ma dzes bya// 'od ma'i shing la
102a3(rgyud): tags nas ni// de nas ras ni blangs te 'gro// bzo bo bde legs byas nas ni// nor mang pos ni bgo ba shA bya// brtul zhugs bzang po legs spyod pa'i// sngags pa ci ltar 'dod song
102a4(rgyud): me tog dri zhim gyis mchod de// gtsang ma'i phyogs su bzhag par bya// 'di nyid kyi ni sngags kyis su// bsrung ba'i cho ga rab tu bya// sngon ni ras bal gang de yis// lan mang du ni longs spyad
102a5(rgyud): bdag nyid dang ni ras dag la// de nyid kyi ni bsrung bar bya// dpa' bo chen po 'jam dpal gyis// sngags kyi bzlas pa gsungs pa dang // 'das pa'i sangs rgyas mang po dang // ngas kyang nga
102a6(rgyud): gsungs pa yin// de nyid sngags ni thams cad kyi// sngags kyi ngo bos rnam par spyod// bsngon 'grub che zhing gzi brjid zhe// sngags kyi don kun sgrub byad pa// cha byad rnam pa sna tshogs
102a7(rgyud): skyob pa rnam pa sna tshogs rgyu// 'dzam gling gnas pa'i sems can rnams// rmongs pa spyod cing tsams pa med// ma dang phyin ci log par byed// 'og spyod shin du bcwam chags kyis// rdzas
102a8(rgyud): lus med / gas mas kyis kyang 'grus kyad//  tsun 'am na zhin rtso na la bas sa// ga yang ga di da che// da na
102b1(rgyud): dka'// sngags rnams kun la spro ba dang // rtag tu 'dzin dang 'chang ba dang // bdag nyid chen po dngos grub 'dod// slob che zhing gze brjid de// rgyal ba'i gsungs pa'i sngags dag ni// 'bad pa med pa
102b2(rgyud): 'grub par 'gyur// dad pa med pa'i skye bo la// dkar po'i chos rnams mi ste/ sa bed na skor btab pa ga/ stu bu skye ba med pa bzhin// dad pa'i rtsa ba rtag tu chog// chos don gzigs pas gsung
102b3(rgyud): chos don spyod pa de dag la// sngags rnams rtag tu 'grub par gsungs// de nas sgrub pa pos bzo bo lags par bslab pa'i ri mo mkhan nam/ bdag nyid 'dri ba la mkhas pas/ tshon ma 'dres shing kha dog
102b4(rgyud): rtsi rnams blangs te/ sngar tha ga pa la byas pa'i cho gci lta ba de nyid kyi mtshan nyid dang ldan pas/ ri mo mkhan la snga ma bzhin sbyar bar bya ste/ sbur ce ltar thag pa la byas pa de nye
102b5(rgyud): ras pa ri mo 'dir gzhug ga// yang na bdag nyid kyis bye bar bya'o// gzur dang can dan drang gung bum las zhes pa'i dris tshon rtsel pa sgo bar bya zhing 'dug smos bsregs te/ de nyid kyi sngags kyis
102b6(rgyud): brgya rtsa brgyad 'khor dang bcas pa la yang bzla ste me tog nA ga ge sar dang bu nan ga dang bkul dang tsam pa ka dang dbyar kyi me tog dang d+hA nu na ri dang mU la ti'i me hog la sogs pas ra
102b7(rgyud): byas la/ shar du mngon par phyogs pas ku sha'i khres la 'dug ste blo legs par gnas pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' la dmigs pa'i sems kyis pir phra bo lag par blangs nas/ 
102b8(rgyud): 'brug pa med pa'i sems kyis ras de la bri bar bya'o// dang par reshig bcom ldan 'das shA kya thub pa bre bar bya bya/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu
103a1(rgyud): gnyis kyis mtshan pa/ sku dpe byad bzang po brgyad cas nye bar mdzes pa rin po che'i pad ma la bshugs pa kun nas 'od 'a'ang ba/ sku 'od 'dom gang gis nye bar mdzes pa
103a2(rgyud): bzhin pa/ sgra dang shing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa/ dbus na gnas pa'i bdam bai DUr+ya'i/ sdong bu can 'og na ni klu'i rgyal po gnyis kyi gdan chen po'i pad ma'i sdong bul la
103a3(rgyud): de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba/ lag pa g.yas pas phyag 'tshal ba/ mdog dkar po rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i ming dang 'dra ba phyed sbrul gyi gzugs can dga' bo dang nye dga' bring
103a4(rgyud): kun nas pad ma'i mtsho pad ma'i 'dab ma dang me tog cung zad la bya ba dang / rnam par kha bye ba dang chu las skyes pa'i srog chags rnams dang bya dang nyalas zhes pas khyab pa yangs shing mdzes par bya
103a5(rgyud): pa bre bar bya'o// gang bcom ldan 'das rtsa ba'i pad ma'i sdong bu de las 'phros pa'i yal ga las pad ma'i me tog dam mthar gyis mtho ba bya'o// g.yon gyi phyogs pad ma'i me tog brgyad byas te/ bong
103a6(rgyud): mde dka la byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad kyi gzugs bzhugs pa bri bar bya'o// dang po re shig 'phags pa'aja ma dpa 'a cung zad ma dog pad sa'i gas bzhin du ser skya'am gur
103a7(rgyud): gser gyi mdog 'dre ba gzhon nu'i cha byad byis pa dang / kye'u yi gzugs can skra zung phud lnga dang ldan pa/ gnon nu'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na yud pal sngon po bsdams pa/ lagapa/

103b1(rgyud): khyab pa bri'o// pad+ma gnyis pa la 'phags pa zla ba'i 'od shin du gzhon gcan de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni nor bzangs so// bzhi pa sa ni sleb pa rnam par sel ba'o// lnga pa la ne
103b2(rgyud): // drug pa la ni sa'i snying po'o// bdun pa la ni sdig med de// brgyad pa la ni spyan pazong yin to// de dag thams cad kyang gzhon nu khye'u mi cha byed can/ gzhon nu'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa bri bar bya'o// 
103b3(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yas phyogs su ni/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brgyad byams pa ma gtags pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ 'phags pa byams pa ni bcom ldan 'das dang nye bar
103b4(rgyud): bya ste/ tshangs par spyod pa'i cha byad 'dzin pa/ mgo ral pa'i cod pan bcings pa/ mdog gser 'dra la ga sha dmar po gyon pa/ dang la dmarang ba'i stong 'alogs byas pa/ thal ba'i thig pa gzhun
103b5(rgyud): gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa dbyeg pa dang spyi'u blugs 'dzin pa kr-iSha sa ra'i pags pa thal gong g.yon par bgos pa/ lag pa g.yon pas/ brang ba 'dzin cing de bzhin gshegs pa la phyag bya
103b6(rgyud): gtong ba'i lha ba sems kyi skyed pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can no// bad pa gnyis pa la 'phags pa kun du bzang po mdog me tog pri yang ku ltar sngo bsangs/ lus rgyan thams cad kyis
103b7(rgyud): lag pa g.yon pa na der bu rin po che thogs pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na bil ba thogs shing mchog sbyid pa/ gzugs mdzes pa dang ldan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gsum pa la ni 'phags pas
103b8(rgyud): zegs dbang phrag 'dam bu'i mdog 'dra ba/ h+yan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ ral pa'i cod pan 'chang ba/ mchod phyir thogs dkar pos byas pa/ 'phags pa 'od dpag med gzugs ma 'i
104a1(rgyud): yid du 'ong ba/ stobs bcu dang ldan pa/ ral pa'i mthar phyib kung gis bzhugs shing cod pan du byas pa/ lag pa g.yon na pad ma bsdams pa/ lag pa g.yas na mchog sbyin pa/ 
104a2(rgyud): sems kyi spyod pa bsam gtan la dmigs pa'i rnam pa can/ lus kun nas 'od kyis gsal bar byas pa'o// bzhi pa la ni 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje lag pa g.yon na dro rje 'dzin pa/ lag
104a3(rgyud): dbil pa thigs pas mchog sbyin pa mdog gser 'dra ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ gzugs mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i lta ba dang ldan pa/ dra ba dang dra ba phyed pas lus nye bar dkris pa mu tig gi rma
104a4(rgyud): chod phyir thogs byas pa/ cod pan rin po che 'bar bas rnam par 'phro ba gos g.yo ba dang ldan pa bgos pa dang la dkar po'i stod g.yogs byas pa'o// 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug
104a5(rgyud): dang kun du 'azang po'i na bza' stod g.yogs kyang 'di bzhin du bya'o// cha byad ni ci ltar sder bstan pa bzhin bya'o// de bzhin du pad ma lnga pa la ni 'phags pa blo gros chen po// drug pa 'ani
104a6(rgyud): so pa/ bdun pa la marnam par spang mdzad sbeng po// brgyad pa la ni ngan song srong ba ste/ byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag bri ba bya ste/ dril pa'i 'bras bu dang glegs pam lag ni zag
104a7(rgyud): mas cad kyis shin du mdzes pa/ der las sade g.yogs bya ba pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ g.yo ba dang ldan pa'i gos bgos pa'o// de dag gi steng du yang rang sangs rgyas brkyang
104a8(rgyud): byaste/ dge slong gi cha byed 'dzin pa lus skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/ chos gos dbang po gyon pa/ skyel mo krung gis nye bar gnas pa/ rin pa che'i ut+pal 'dug pas byed zhi ba'i bdag
104b1(rgyud): nyid gu nas 'od 'gro bor kya bag me ton dri na ba pas bcal bkram pa la 'di sa ste/ me hog mA le ta dang dbyar gyi me tog dang / d+ha nun rig dang pun na ka dang rAg ge sar la sogs pa'i me tog gis ra
104b2(rgyud): nges kun nas bcal bkram par bri bar bya'o// bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa'ajas dpal gyi ster du rin po che dums nye bar smras pa/ shin du yangs pa'i gzhal me
104b3(rgyud): rang gi dkyil 'khor brag gi tshogs kyis shin du nye bar mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ut+pa las shin du bkab pa ri'i rnam pa lta bu bri bar bya'o// gnas der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das brkyang
104b4(rgyud): par byas/ 'din sto na can gtsug tor can rin bache ba DU r+ya'i 'dinam par 'phral kun nas 'das gang ga rin poche bdas rAg dang yin nI pa dang / ma ga la sog lnga dang / baiDUrgyad pa
104b5(rgyud): gang D+ha la sogs pa nor bu rin po che chen po'i bye brag kun nas 'od 'phro ba dang ldan pa nyi ma 'char ka'i mdag 'dra ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lhung bzed dang chos gos dang bla gos dpa
104b6(rgyud): krung gis bzhugs shing chos 'chang ba/ na bza'i ser po mnabs pa/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gyis skul khyab pa/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad rgyus sku nya bar mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i na
104b7(rgyud): dang ldan pa/ rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can bri bar bya'o// gnyis pa de bzhin gshegs pa me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i dbang po'i
104b8(rgyud): po khe dag gser 'dra ba bre bar bya'o// gsum pa pad ma'i gtsug tor pad ma'i ge sar dang 'dra ba chos 'chang ba bri bar bya'o// bzhi pa spyan bzang po yang bri bar bya'o// lnga pa po sen par dga' bar
105a1(rgyud): drug pa rgyal ba rnam par snang mdzad dang / bdun pa sman gyi bla bai DUr+ya'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang / brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa'i spyan gyi rgyal
105a2(rgyud): kri bar bya'o// 'di thams cad kyang gser gyi mdog can de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku'i gzugs su bri bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag go steng gi phyogs su g.yas g.yon nas sprin gyi gas
105a3(rgyud): nas gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gnyis lus mi snang bar me tog gi char 'babs pa bri bar bya ste/ bar snang la gnas nas sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
105a4(rgyud): 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la phyag 'tshal pa bri bar bya'o// rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'og tu nyan thos chen po brgyad byang chub sems dpa'i mgo la 'dug pa spangs te bri bar bya ba la 'di la
105a5(rgyud): nas brtan shA ri'i bu dang mau gal gyi bu chen po dang 'od srung chen po dang / rab 'byor dang sgra gcan 'dzin dang / dga' bo dang bzang ldan dang / ka pi na'o// rang sangs rgyas dag kyang 'di lta ste/ 
105a6(rgyud): ngad ldang dang dman pa dang nye ba'i 'chi ltas dang / dkar po dang dkar ba'i tog dang / mu khyud dang mu khyad bzang po'o// 'di dag thams cad kyang shin du mdzes pa/ zhi ba'i cha byad kyi bdag nyid
105a7(rgyud): na du dul ba'i cha byad can no// nyan thos chen po dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la lta ba'o// steng du gnas gtsang ma'i lha'i bu gzhan gnyis nye bar kun nas kos kyi bla ra
105a8(rgyud): dede yang ba shin du mdzes pa 'dzin cing sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams kyi steng du lha'i gos dang phreng ba 'dzin pa bri bar bya
105b1(rgyud): bcom ldan 'das shAs thub pa'i steng dbu'i steng du mu tig gi phreng ba dang / thag gu dmar po pad ma rA ga dang / in dran lal sogs pa'i mdud pa byas pa rin po che'i thag gu tshogs bya'o// de la yang na
105b2(rgyud): ze re shin du legs par kun nas bkod pa dang / mu t+tag ga phreng ba 'byung bas mangs pa bri bar bya'o// sangs rgyas pacom ldan 'das kyi 'og tu ni bad ma'i mcho las 'phags pa'angs dpal gyi na
105b3(rgyud): dang nye ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po nya dga'i phyogs su rin po che chen po'i ri bo'i pad ma'i mtsho las mngon par 'thon pa rin po che'i myu gu dang phug dang ri sra pa dang byi ru'i lal ka dang rin po che'i shing gis
105b4(rgyud): bzor ga drang dri chen po'i gnas dang grub pa dag gis del brten pa/ ri'i rtse mo'i steng du dro za'i rgyam tho gshin rdeg shed shin du mi bzang pa'i gaspo sa can lag pagams pa namapa lags pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ba
105b5(rgyud): zhin sroganyer dang ldan pa/ bka' nyan cing 'phags pa'ajam dpal la phyogs te lta ba gsus pa/ 'phyang ga d+hA rgyun du rjes pa/ mag ldan nag po dang sprin nag po 'dra ba// klu se
105b6(rgyud): ba da ra ga/ sa pa rtogs sna kyis bldan pa// TIg gi bags pa man bas pa gags thams cad 'joms par byed parab tum pa zadapa chen cig pa'i rgyam mcheni bkun
105b7(rgyud): 'bar ba khro ba'i rgyal po gshin rje gshed dri bar bya'o// re de'i 'og tu rdo'i steng na 'dug pa/ lus sa la btud de spos kyi snod lag na thogs pa/ cha byad dang dbye bas ce lta ba bzhin rtags 'dzin pa
105b8(rgyud): star rjes su 'thun pa'i spyod pa dang 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rjes su lta ba'i sgrub pa bo bri bar bya'o// klu'i rgyal po dka' bo dang / nye bar bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i 'og de'i g.yas
106a1(rgyud): 5/ su bad+ma ma'i mtsholas mngon par byang ba'i rin pa che'i ri'i rgyal po// ji sa slar ri'i rgyal por bstan pa de bzhin du bri bar bya'o// gro ba rgyal po gshin rje gshed med pa lnga'i
106a2(rgyud): gis khyab pa bri bar bya'o// ri de yang 'phags bskyed ras gzigs dbang phyug gi 'og tu bri'o// ri de yang shin du mthe ba rin po che pad ma rA ga'i them skas 'dra ba/ bai nur+ya'i rang bzhin rtse mo myu ru
106a3(rgyud): bri bar bya'o// de la brten pa'i lha mo 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje'i ngo bo 'phags ma sgrol ma rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ dar la dmar pos sdod g.yogs byas
106a4(rgyud): dog rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i gos can/ bud med kyi rgyan thams cad kyis lus brgyan pa/ lag pa g.yon pa na ut+pal thogs pa/ gser gyi kha dog can rked pa pra ba ha cang yang mi skem hA
106a5(rgyud): yang mi sgom ha cing yang mi rgan/ sems bsam gtan la zhugs pa/ bka' nyan cing 'dug pa/ kun nas 'bar ba'i 'od kyi phreng bas yongs su bskor ba/ der yang bai DUr+ya rin po che'i rtse mo la shi

106a7(rgyud): pa de nyid kyang shin du kha dog sna tshogs pa byi ru'i myu gu'i 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi ngo bo'i tshon 'ab ba na/ lha mo sgrol ma mngon du phyogs shing lta ba bri bar bya'o// lha mo bgegs na
106a8(rgyud): ma lus 'joms// 'jigs pa sel bar byed pa'i mchog/ sgrub pa po ni lung don du// des ni dam pa sbyin ning dge/ stabs bcu ldan phras thugs rje ni// bud mid gzugs 'chang sam
106b1(rgyud): yin// 'byung po kun gyi dpal don dang // mchog sbyin byed pa bri bar bya// 'jam pa'i dbyangs can 'od chen ni// gzhon nu'ang lnga po 'di la dgyes// bgegs rnams thams cad bsal ba'i phyir// sgrub
106b2(rgyud): kyang yang dag bkur// ma yi bdag pa zung don dang // dpal sgrub byor ya sa // khro ba'i rgyal po gang yin te// de mang ban/ bris pa// bgegs rnams thams cad gni ga pa'i phyir/

106b4(rgyud): dang // bgegs rnams thams cad sel bar byed// mi bzang khro bo'i dang tshul can// sngags kyi lha dag 'gugs par byed// shin du mi bzad drag po'i gzugs// brtse ba me pa thams cad 'a
106b5(rgyud): sdig dang drag por spyod pa rnams// dbang du mi 'gyur dbang du byed// mkha' spyod sa la spyod pa dang // sa 'og spyod pa bams cad kyi// thub pa'i bstan la 'gal byed gang // ma rungs thams
106b6(rgyud): bir byed// ras ni kun nas grub zhi dang // zur bzhi dag tu bri ba yin// ras kyi 'og tu tha mar ni// chu bo rgya tsho'i gnas bya ste// klu'i gdongs ka yan lag can// gcig ni kun dbya ba yin//

107a1(rgyud): / klu rgyal chen por rnam par grags// 'jig rten kun la phan par brtson// sangs rgyas bstan la rab tu zhugs// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam gzhig phyir// chu bo la brten
107a2(rgyud): 'a8bya// ras kyi tshig dam pa 'di// rgyal ba rnams kyis gsungs pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pas sngon gsung ba / rgyas pa ston ngas ni mdor bsdus yin// mchis pa gang zhig 'dri byed pa//

110a2(rgyud): nang na bzhugs pa/ ra'i srod kyi mkhang pa brtsegs pa 'dra ba bri bar bya'o// ras ris kyi kyi khor lug ra'i rnam pas yongs sul khor ba bri bar bya'o// steng gi ras kyi mtha' gnyis la gnas
110a3(rgyud): tshogs 'thong ba'i gnas gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha'i bu dag pa dang rnam par dag pa zhes bye ba gnyis snga ma bzhin du bri bar bya zhing /

110b5(rgyud): ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so// rig pa thams ca
110b6(rgyud): kyi brtul zhugs spyad pa'i don dang / phan pa dang bde ba dang 'jig rten la snying brtsa ba'i phyir dang / byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la 'khas pa ston pa/ phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i
110b7(rgyud): mya ngan las 'das pa'i grong khyer du 'gro bar byed pa/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rkang nges par byang chub sgrub par byed pa/ sngags kyi spyod pa thams cad kyi don skye par byed pa/ 
110b8(rgyud): bdag gi gsang sngags 'di skye bo thams cad la rgyas par byed par 'gyur ro// ma 'ongs pa'i dus na 'jig rten gyi rnam 'das pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma rigs nub pa dang / 
111a1(rgyud): gra / sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad spangs pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / 'phags pa nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi/

111a3(rgyud): kyis 'jig rten na yongs su ma zin pa dang / sems can gyi khams thams cad 'byung bar 'gyur te/ le lo can dang dran pa nyams pa dang / ma dad pa dang mi srun pa dang mi dge ba'i bshes

111a5(rgyud): tshol zhing yid ches par mi 'gyur ro// log pa'i lta ba skye zhing bsod nams ma yin pas 'phel bar 'gyur ro// mtshams med par gzhol zhing shin tu mi bzad pa'i yang shin tu mi bzad
111a6(rgyud): 'thob pa sdug bsngal ba de dag gi don dang dbang med pa la da'ang du bya ba'i don dang / dbang du gyur pa mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa'i phyir dang thabs mkhas pas bsdu ba'i sbyor ba/ sngag
111a7(rgyud): kyi ras kyi ri mo'i cho ga gang de'i dus la bab par mkhyen na bcom ldan 'das kyis bshad du gsol/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas 'jab dpal gzhon nur gyur pa
111b1(rgyud): rdzogs pa bad/  la kran gyur ba na 'azhin shegs pa ba thams pa sngags so lags so// la rgyud la spyod kyimachog sngags/ 
111b2(rgyud): b.rig pa'i brgyal thugs spyod pa le'u ras sa ma tshig rapa khyam pyod de/ snying po mcho ga rnams kyi don mchog tugasang ba dam padon chen po sngags sems cad kyi chogs
111b3(rgyud): gyur pa drug po 'di dag yi go drug gi snying po mchog/ the tshom med pa de'i tshe 'grub par 'gyur te/ sems can de dag gdul ba'i phyir dang / thabs la mkhas pa la yang dag par rab
111b4(rgyud): hU~M rmugs pa'i phyir dang / sra pa yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'i phyir// sangs rgyas bye ba phrag bdun du rtsa drug gis sbyar gsungs shing da ltar yang ngas bshad de/ ma 'ongs
111b5(rgyud): spro ba'i tshogs la phan pa'i phyir legs par nyon pa yi ma zung shig dang / dam bshad par bya'o// de gang zhe na/ de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pas sngags gsungs pa
111b6(rgyud): oM kyai dzas/ yo kyi shegs/  'jam/ oM 9la/ oM das/ de ltar 'di dag 'jam dpal gnon du gyur pa khyod
111b7(rgyud): sngags drug dang yi ge drug pa mthu chen po dang stobs mnyam pa/ snying po dam pa mchog tu grub pa/ sangs rgyas bzhin du 'byung ba sems can thams cad kyi don gyi phyi
112a1(rgyud): sangs rgyas thams cad kyis rab tu gsungs pa/ dam tshig nyams pa dang dam tshig g.yos pa rnams kyi las thams cad byed pa/ byang chub kyi lam
112a2(rgyud): rjes su ston pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sngags kyi mchog tu gyur pa/ mchog dang 'bring dang tha ma gsum la rab tu sbyor ba/ legs par snang ba'i las kyi 'bras bu
112a3(rgyud): rnam par smin pa sbyin pa/ bstan pa nub pa'i dus su yang dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// las kyi tshul dang bcas pa la yang dag par gzhol ba la/ skad cig gis don bsgrub pa
112a4(rgyud): 'gyur ba de dag myur du shin du myur bar de'i tshe dang de'i dus su 'grub par 'gyur ro// nyam sad pa'i phyir yang snying po dam pa 'dri dag bsgrubal par bya ste/ mdor na ci lha ji ltar rab tu
112a5(rgyud): bde lta de ltar 'grub par 'gyur ro// des na ras ris kyi cho ga 'di bya ba yin te/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'jig pa chen po dang / snyigs ma la sems can bsod nams chung ba 'byung ba
112a6(rgyud): 'gyur te/ grags pa chung ba dang / tshe thung ba dang longs spyod chung ba dang / chos spyod pa chung bas shin du rgya che ba'i ras res kyi cho ga las sgrub pa la sogs pa rtsom par mi nus te
112a7(rgyud): dag gi phyir shin du mdor bstan par bya'o// dang por re shig dpa' bo'i tshong gis dog pa srung cig gam srang phyed kyis nos pa ma mu ba khrug / sheng du khwa phyed tsam gyi ras kha cher dang
112b1(rgyud): bcas pa zug pa la phrag tu gzhug go/ yang na sgra med pa'i ras kyi dum bu sar pa gzhan stong dang 'og tu na myur 'dod pa khru gnyis dang bzhi dang drug dang lnga dang bcu dang brgyad pa'i ras blangs te/ 
112b2(rgyud): ci ltar 'dod pa'i rimo pas rim gro bar bya'o// tshan ma 'dres pa dang tsan dan dang ga pur dang / gur gum gyis bsgos te/ ras kyi can dan dang ga pur dang / gur yum gcig tu byas pa srog
112b3(rgyud): chags med pa'i chu rdul med pa dang bsres te/ snod sar pa'i nang du bkrus la zhag gsum gyi bar du legs par bkab ste/ bzhag nas gtsang ba'i phyogs su bsrung ba byas shing bdag gi
112b4(rgyud): kyang gtsang bar byas te/ zla ba yar ngo'i tshes bco lnga la ras snod kyi mdun du shar du mngon par phyogs te/ ku shi'i khres la 'dug nas/ sngags kyi tshig lan brgya rtsa brgyad brjod par bya
112b5(rgyud): 'dris/ ga ban bahu ru pa d+ha ra di byA na She a be lA kA ya a ba la ka ya/ mA sA ma ya ma rda s+pha ras mar rub d+ha ri Ne/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa kany+tsi/ rA ya saM hUM swa Te swa rbe swAhA/ sngags
112b6(rgyud): rnas pa byas la de rje dang nyal bar bya'o// gnyed log pa'i rmi lam du 'grub pa 'am mi 'grub pa 'am ston par 'gyur ro// de nas langs nas mi lam du grub pa'i mtshan ma mthong ma
112b7(rgyud): ma thogs par ngas ri' bri bar bya'o// gal te grub pa'i mtshan marmi lam du ma mthong na/ ras de snod de las phyung la nyi ma la bskams nas yang snod sar rab gzhan du bcug la/ shin
112b8(rgyud): da dben par chags par bsrung ba byas la banag// de nas yang snang mchog de dag las gang yang drang ba'i sngags grangs sa/ gang 'ad pa'i mi gau drug pa yang yi ga 'brum ba
113a1(rgyud): bya'o// des na ras mi dge ba yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dang por shig ras de blangs la cho 'phrul cim phyen dam/ yang ngo'i nyin zhag la rgyu skar babang po dang ldan pa'i tshes
113a2(rgyud): grangs bzang po la/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal byis kye'u 'i gzugs can mgo zur phud lnga dang ldan pa/ byis pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa mdog gser 'dra ba/ na bza' sngon po g.yo bzhin pa
113a3(rgyud): mnabs pa/ na bza' dang la sngon pos stod g.yogs byas pa/ chos 'chad pa seng ge'i khri la skyil mo krung phyed pas bzhugs pa/ zhabs g.yas pas rin po che'i zhabs brten la bzhag pa/ 
113a4(rgyud): g.yon pa seng ge'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa bzhin drung rudra 'dzum pa dang bcas pa/ sgrub pa po la lta kha bri bar bya'o// g.yas phyogs su 'phags pa kun du babang po ngam
113a5(rgyud): kar po g.yo 'a ba/ pri yang ku'i mdog ltar sngo bsangs lag pa g.yon pa nor bu rin po che thogs pa/ yan lag thams cad mdzes pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ na bza' sngon po g.yo ba
113a6(rgyud): na'as pa/ mu tig gi phreng bas mchod phyir bogs pa/ pad+ma dkar ba'i gdan la 'dug pa bri bar bya'o// phags pa'ang sa dpal gyi g.yon phyogs su 'phags pa spyan ngas gzigs kyi dbang phyug ston ka'i
113a7(rgyud): dog sta /  gan pa 'an pa gso 'ban pa la gsan sa gsams cad pa phrag rgyan pams dkyis brgyan gsusheg gi slong pa'i mtshad byer bags byas pa/ lag pa g.yon pan brligs
113b1(rgyud): pa/ lag pa g.yas pa na rdal ba gsar kyi lu ba can dkar 'phags pa/ pa'i rna byad 'phags pa 'jam dpar la gyu / de bzhin du 'phags pa kun du ba rang po pad+ma dkar po la gnas pa/ gnyi ga yang
113b2(rgyud): lhur bri bar bya'o// de nas sdong bu gcig las skyes pa'i pad+ma gsum la dbus kyi rtsa ba'i pad+ma'i gres rab ni 'phags pa'ang ma dpal gyi seng ge'i blo dang rin po che'i zha pas brten no// gnyis pa'i
113b3(rgyud): nide'aphags pa kun du bzang po'o// gsum pa'i pad+ma la ni spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang phyug go// pad+ma'i sdong bu mdzes pa rin po che'i mnad 'dra ba/ pad+ma'i me tog du ma kha ma bye ba dang / phyed tsam bye ba dang
113b4(rgyud): ba dang ldan pa/ mchi chen po madros pa las skyes pa kru'i rgyal po dga' bo dang nyed dga' gnyis pad+ma'i sdong yul 'dzin pa/ klu'i rgyal po de dag gi kha dog dkar ba/ gdings ka bdun gyis nye ba
113b5(rgyud): pa/ lus h+yad thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ lus kyi stong mi la sbrul gyis gdengs kas mtshan pa/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal la lta ba/ lus phyed chu'i nang du rub pa nor bu rin po che dang gos kyis
113b6(rgyud): ra mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// mtsho chen po dun gyi 'og tu sgrub pa po ras ris kyi g.yas phyogs kyi mtha'i bur du 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal gyi dkyil 'khongs lta ba/ spos snod lag na
113b7(rgyud): yagro dang pus mo'i lhang 'dud pa/ cha byad dang / khadog snga ma ni lta ba bzhin bre bar bya'o// 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi steng ngas kyi 'ur gnyis su lha'i bu me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin pa na mkha' la lde
113b8(rgyud): dkyi nang nas byung ba/ me tog gi tshogs chen po 'thong 'azhin du mdzes pa bri bar bya'o// sa ris kyi mo g.yo chug tu me tog nA ga zhes nga la sogabs par du gtor bar breb bya/  lta 'dod pa ga 'dre da kyi
114a1(rgyud): da l+yan/ 'phags pa'angam dpal chos 'chad pa dang 'phags pa kun du bzang po dang 'phags pa spyan ram garigs la kan rdul la g.yol pa bri bar bya'o// yang na sgru pa po tsha
114a2(rgyud): bzhin du maris kyi gzugs nges par bri bar bya ste/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i cha byad dam/ ci ltar 'dod pa'i dbyibs sam/ sgrub pa pa ci lta ci ltar 'dod pa de sgra de ltar bri bar bya'o// dbus su 'phags
114a3(rgyud): pa 'jam dpal g.yas g.yon du 'phags pa 'jig rten dbang phyug dang / kun du bzang po ci ltar 'dod par nges par bri bar bya'o// yang na ci rnyed pa'i ras kyi dum bu mtho gang ngam/ khru gang la bar
114a4(rgyud): nyid dam gzhan gyis sam/ ri ma mkhan gso sbyong byas pa 'am/ dad pa'am ma dad pa'am/ gtsang ba'am me gtsang ba'am/ tshul khrims dang ldan pa'am tshul khrims 'chal pa'i ri mo mkhan
114a5(rgyud): bar bya'o// bdag nyid dam sgrub pa pos nges par sngon du bsnyen pa byas pa dang / dada' dang byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ni nges par bya'o// de ltar byas na sngags 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzha
114a6(rgyud): pa'i las can gyis ni mi 'gyur te/ de ltar dad pa dang de ltar gyur pas bsgrub par bya'o// sngags kyi rgyal po dang sngags kyi lha dag 'dir dad pa dang ldan pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi gzhan dag gi

114b1(rgyud): rten 'das pa daspyad ldan kun la 'grub 'gyur to// gro pa dad bral ra na sa sa/ 'dadan slo rungs 'grub s+ho// gzhan mo tra // / g+h+nAn
114b2(rgyud): pa rnam par bzlog/ ras ni chung dang chen po dang // 'bring du nye bar bsgrags pa yin// las rnams kun la grub pa ni 'ad ni rab tu bstan par bya// byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal ba che theg/ 
114b3(rgyud): na pa gan du rgyam pa'i mang yis/ 'phags pa 'ang ma pa'i phyin par chog bdun pa'i le'u ba 'bras las/ ra kyi chog bzhi pa'i le nu ra 'brum rdzogs s+ho// de nas bcom ldan 'ad
114b4(rgyud): shAkya thub pas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la bka' stsal pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nu yang khyod kyis bstan pa'i sems can de dag gi phyir/ me'u yi rab 'byam 'di thabs skabs
114b5(rgyud): par 'byung ba ngas kyang bstan te/ de dag ni don gyi snying yon tan rgya che ba'i bye brag ni suM ba/ las rnam par 'byed pa sems can thams cad kyi don gyi byi yang dag par bshad par bya yi gu de las
114b6(rgyud): ba shin d+ha ba tu nyon cig dang pa shad par bya'o// de nas 'jas dpal gzhan n+yang thung byos/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di gad ces gsol to// bdag ga chog gi rnam pa gsal bar mdzadu ga
114b7(rgyud): ldan 'das ma thub pa thams ca dang ldan pa'i 'kho la gcigs te 'dzum pa da// de nas pam ldan 'das kya sa pa menas kyi nonas 'od pa ldan po dang / mi sa
115a1(rgyud): dang shas kya dag lta bu blang / 'di ba dbyung ma thag tu thams cad dang ldan pa'i dkyar 'khor snang bar byas nas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi
115a2(rgyud): thams cad zil gyis gnan nas/ rtsugar gyi 'od dang re ba'i tshogs thams cad kyi 'od dang / gang 'di zla ba dang nyi ma rdzu 'phrul che zhing mthu che ba de dag gi 'od kyang zil gyis mnan te/ mi gsal shing
115a3(rgyud): 'od med par 'gyur ba dang / rnam par mdzes par mi 'gyur zhing gsal bar mi 'gyur ro// nor bu thams cad dang / sngags dang sman dang / rin po che'i 'od thams cad 'od med par byas na

115a5(rgyud): nga 'khod par gyur pa de stan las langs nas/ rings pa'i tshul gyis zhabs gnyis la btud de/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu ma
115a6(rgyud): nam mchis pa 'dzum pa mi mdzad na/ bcom ldan 'das 'dzum pa mdzad pa'i rgyu gang lags/ rkyen gang lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub se
115a7(rgyud): dpa' phyag na rdo rdu la ba/ ka/ 'a stsal pa/ phyag na rdo rje de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ ci skad smras pa de bzhin no// bcom ldan 'das ni rgyu med pa dang / rkyen med par 'dzum pa mi mdzad de/ 
115a8(rgyud): rkyen yod do// gang zhig mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga rig pa'i spyod pa rjes su bsgrub pa las sgrub pa'i thabs la yang dag par gzhol ba/ chos kyi
115b1(rgyud): na pa la yang dag par 'jug cing rjes su 'brang bar byed pa dang / 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang / klog par 'gyur ba dang / dad par 'gyur ba dang / glegs bam la 'dra ba byas nas mchod par 'gyur ba dang / can
115b2(rgyud): phye ma dang thug pa dang / bdug pa dang / phreng ba dang / gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang ba dan rnam pa sna tshogs pa 'am/ tshig gi bye brag gis sam/ sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / pheg rdob pa dag
115b3(rgyud): ma tha na rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i sems chud la thob pa 'am/ ba spu ldang bar byed pa 'am/ rigs pa'i mthu thos nas dga' ba skyes pa'am/ rjes su yi ring bar 'gyur ba 'am/ spyod patha
115b4(rgyud): ra 'gyur ba de dag ni ngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ba lung bstan te/ des na rgyal ba de ltar 'dzum pa mdzad kyi gzhan du
115b5(rgyud): pa yin no// 'dir dang po re shig cho ga'i rgyal po 'di la dam tshig mthong ba sngon du bya ba rnams byas pa dang dbang bskur ba thob pa/ rtsa ba'i sngags sam snying po 'am nye ba'i snying po 'am/ sngags
115b6(rgyud): yang rung ba bzung nas yi ge gcig pa 'am/ gang 'dod pa dkon pa chen por song ste 'bum phrag gsum bzla bar bya'o// 'bras bu dang chus 'tsho ba 'am/ rtsa ba dang / lo ma'i baba' ba byas na/ 
115b7(rgyud): sngon du bya ba byas par 'gyur ro// de nas ri'i rtse mor 'dzegs nas ras ris chen pa'i tshad nub phyogs su mngon du la kha gzhag pa byas la bdag nyid shar du bltas te/ ku sha'i khres la
115b8(rgyud): 'dug nas/ pad ma dkar pol can dan dang gur gum gyis btags te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa dang / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cid dang / rang sangs rgyas dang
116a1(rgyud): nyan thos dag la 'bum phrag/ ra ma'i ras ras kyi 'og tu dbul bar bya'o// ga pur kye bdug pa yang ci 'byor pas 'dug go/ lha'i bu dang klu rnams la yang ci rnyed pa'i me tog
116a2(rgyud): gis mchod par bya'o// de nas mtshan phyed kyi dus su cho 'phrul kye zla phyed kyi zla ba nya ba la/ ras ris kyi mdun du pad+ma'i rnam pa lta bu'i me thab byas pa la/ tsan dan dkar po'i shing gis
116a3(rgyud): spang dag gur bum dang ga pur bsres pas bsreg blugs ci 'byor pas stong rtsa brgyad sbyin sreg bya'o// de nas bsrung ba bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa las 'od zer byung
116a4(rgyud): rus kyi ri mo'i 'khor yug nas gcig tu 'bar bar 'gyur te/ sgrub pa pos gur gum dang tsan dan gyis btags pa'i tsan dan dkar po'i me tog gis mchod lan dbul lo// de nas sgrub pa
116a5(rgyud): nges pa'i tshul gyis ras ris la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang / rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang 'phags pa nyan thos rnams la bya
116a6(rgyud): byas nas/ sgrub pa pos bris pa'i ras ris kyi mtha' ma'i phyogs nas 'jigs pa med pas ras ris gzung bar bya'o// de nas bzung ba tsam gyis 'phur te/ se gal gtogs pa rtsom
116a7(rgyud): satshangs pa'i 'jig rten du phyin par 'gyur te/ me tog can gyi 'jig rten gyi khams su rab tu gnas par 'gyur te/ gang du bcom ldan 'das me tog yang dag par skyes pa'i rgyal
116a8(rgyud): po'i dbang pa de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhugs te/ 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to// 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang mngon du mthong ngo // chos kyang zos so// byang chub sems dang
116b1(rgyud): du ma dag kyang mthong shing / de dag la bsnyen bkur yang byed de bskal pa chen pa steng du rga ba dang 'chi ba med cing gnas par 'gyur ro// ras ris kyang de na gnas par 'gyung ngo ro// sangs rgyas dang
116b2(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// de dag gis byin gyis brlabs par yang yang dag par shes so// sangs rgyas kyi shing stong yang 'da' bar byed do// lu
116b3(rgyud): stong yang ston par byed do// rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu du ma yang 'byin par byed do// 'phags pa 'jam dpal yang dge ba'i bshes gnyen du 'gyur ro// nges par byang chub la gzhol bar 'gyur ro// 
116b4(rgyud): byang chub sems dpa'i sde snod pal po che theg pa chen po rgya che ba'i mdo las/ 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rtsa ba'i cho ga nib mo rab 'bum sgrub pa'i thabs mchog gi las kyi le'u brgyad
116b5(rgyud): pa las dang po rdzogs s+ho// // de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lha 'dus pa rnams la bka' stsal pa phrogs po dag byed cag
116b6(rgyud): nyon cig/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i sbyong ba'i dkyil 'khor sngags sgrub pa'i thabs kyi las byed pa/ sgrub pa po bsrung ba'i phyir/ mchog tu gsang ba dam pa snying po dam pa de bzhin
116b7(rgyud): gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa rig pa'i rgyal po chen po bzlas pa gang gis sngags thams cad bzlas par 'gyur te/ kye lha'i tshogs dag 'di ni 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te/ rig pa
116b8(rgyud): rgyal po 'di ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yang rig pa'i rgyal po 'dis 'gugs shing dbang du byed la/ 'byor pa med par byed na byang chub sems dpa' gzhan lho smos kyang rtse dgos/ 
117a1(rgyud): / 'jig rten dang 'dzag tan las 'das pa'i sngags thams cad dang / bgegs thams cad kyang 'jig par byed de/ 'di ni stobs che ba dang mthu che ba dang dbang ba gcig pa dang snga
117a2(rgyud): thams cad kyi mchog gcig tu bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig pa rnams kyi nang na gcig par bstan pa dang / yi ge gcig pa don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ bya ba thams cad byed pa sngags
117a3(rgyud): thams cad gcod par byed pa/ ma rungs pa'i las rnams kyi sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig par byed pa/ sngags thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa/ dge bar byed pa 'jig rten
117a4(rgyud): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sngags rnams kyi gong nas gong du 'dug pa/ thogs pa med pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i ba
117a5(rgyud): de gang zhe na/ oM nI grogs pa dag 'di nyid ni mchog tu gsang ba dam pa las thams cad byed pa/ yi ge gcig pa zhes bya ba rig pa'i rgyal po 'da' bar bya ba ma yin pa/ sems can thams
117a6(rgyud): kyis thub par dka' ba 'byung po thams cad kyi bkra shis pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad sgrub par byed pa/ sngags thams cad kyi mnga' bdag 'jig rten thams cad kyi dbang phyug/ rnam pa
117a7(rgyud): drang ba rnams la byams pa'i bdag nyid dang skye bo thams cad la snying brtse bar byed pa/ bag gas thams cad 'jig par byed pa ste// mdo na ci lta ci ltar rab tu spyad pa de lta de kAr las byed de/ 
117a8(rgyud): bsgrubs pa med kyang las grub par 'gyur ro// sngags 'di bzlas la dge bas de dbang du 'gyur ro// kos la sngags nas gyon na skal pa babang por 'gyur ro// sa shing la sngags
117b1(rgyud): saM nid nye bar zhi bar 'gyur ro// ka ra bA ra dkar po'i sa gang la lan bdun sngags te zas na don du ma gnyar ba yang kha zas 'byung bar 'gyur ro// mig gi nad la rgya mcha btags te lan ba
117b2(rgyud): mngon par sngags la meg bkang na mig gi nad sel to// rna ba'i nad la 'brug sgrogs pa las skyes pa'i rna tshwa trig zhes bya ba/ glang po che'i rgyab tu reg par bya sa la/ rang gi la ma'i nang du
117b3(rgyud): btums nas me chung ba la bsregs te shin du 'jam par byas la/ rgyas tshwa'i phye ma chu dro 'jam tsam dang sbrus te lan bdun sngags pas rna ba bkang ba dang / skad cig de nyid la na ba na ba nye bar gyi
117b4(rgyud): 'gyur ro// bud med pa 'byung ba'i dus su mngal nas mthon te/ na ning nyams thag pa la ni shing An+da ru sha ka'i rtsa bsrog chags med pa'i tshul pa
117b5(rgyud): zhi bar 'gyur ro// mtshon nang du lus pa'i skyes bu la ni mar rnying pa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par sngags te/ btung ba 'am blags na phyogs de nas de'i skad cig la zug rngu med par 'gyur ro// 
117b6(rgyud): ma zhu ba dang gsung ba dang / 'khru ba'i nad la ni lan tshwa nag pa'am/ rgyam tshwa'am cha gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun sngags te bos na nad de las grol bar 'gyur te/ de nyid kyi nyin par bde
117b7(rgyud): legs su 'gyur ro// ldan pa'i nad kyi chad par 'bru ba 'am/ lakru pa la ne ma du yang ka'i rtsa ba btags te/ lan gcog gam gnyis bzlas pa byas nas srog chags med pa'i chu dang 'thungs na gnod
117b8(rgyud): pa med par de las grol bar 'gyur ro// bud med mo gam bu mi skye ba skye bar 'dod na/ a shwa gan d+ha'i rtsa ba mar bzang po dang lhan cig bskal la/ ba'i 'o ma dang lhan cig bskol che ba'i 'o

123a2(rgyud): rgyal ba'i ring bsrel gnas pa'i sa// thams cad don gyi gnas dga'// der ni sngags rnams myur du bkrug/ mchod rten chen po rdo rje gdan// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor dang // thub mchog gi
123a3(rgyud): bar rab gshegs pa// der yang grub par rab tu snang // lha las 'bas pa'i mchod rten dang / na ka sa dang cho 'phrul brtan// grong mchog par bya zhes bya dang // nags tshal lum bi nir 'khrungs la/
